58a6(sgra skor): thI rA maHs+yai Sha rA dzA yu d+hiSh+Ti raHsaM Sha kar+Ne ma hA tu gI/ sau Sha b+hi mo ma hA ba laHde pad skad du/ de 'di shing rta bcu pa'i bu dga' byed/ de 'di rgyal po g.yul ngor brtan pa'o// de 'di gtong ba chen po rna ba can/ de 'di 'jig
58b1(sgra skor): pa stobs ni chen po'o// zhes pa ste rkang pa'i dang pa rnams/ saM Sha zhes byung ba lta bu'o// a ti pA Ni nI byA ka ra Na s+yA san+teHsu tra ta pany+tsa san+na yaHsa mAp+tAHzhes pa pA Ni nI byA ka ra ti'i mtshams sbyor gyi mdo las mtsham sbyor lnga pa rdzogs
58b2(sgra skor): de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA NI nai byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi ge don cha ga dpe brjod sogs zin brisu bkad pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las mtshams sbyor lnga pa'i cho ga sbyor btang
58b3(sgra skor): dmigs gsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// // bla ma dang 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// de ltar mtshams sbyar gyi cho ga rnams bshad zin nas nga ni ming las tshigs
58b4(sgra skor): tu bsgrub pa su la sogs pa'i rab tu bya ba rnams 'chang par bya ste/ ar+tha ba da d+hA tu ra pra t+ya yaHprA ti pa ngi kaM/ byings min pa rkyen meng pa don dang ldan pa ming ngo // byings ma yin pa ste byings la kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen sbyin pas 'gyur
58b5(sgra skor): grub po/ su sogs dang ti sogs kyi rnam dbye'i rkyen med pa'i don dang ldan pa ni/ rtags sam/ ming ngam/ sku 'am/ prA ti pa dI ka zhes bya ste/ su la sogs pa rnams 'jug pa'i yu lo// pra t+ya yaHpA rAsh+tsa/ rkyen pha rol la 'ang ngo //
58b6(sgra skor): su pa la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams ming gi pha rol tu sbyin par bya'o// su la sogs pa ni 'di rnams te/ su o dzas/ am oT shasau/ D+ha b+hI b+his/ de b+huM b+h+yas/ nga si b+hU ma b+h+yas/ ngas oMs Am/ ngi os su pa/ rnam dbye 'di rnams
59a1(sgra skor): gcig tshig gi u dang / mang tshig dzAs k+Shi dza/ gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig gi Ta/ mang tshig gi sha/ gsum pa'i gcig tshig gi Ta/ bzhig lnga gadrug pa/ bdun pa rnams kyi nga rnams dang
59a2(sgra skor): lnga pa'i nga si'i i/ bdun pa'i mang tshig pa rnams don dang bcas pa'i gre ba'i ming can ne// bi b+hak+ti sh+tsa/ rnam dbye'o// geng du bshad pa'i su la sogs pa rnams dang / 'og nas 'byung ba'i ti la sogs pa rnams la rnam dbye zhes
59a3(sgra skor): bya'o// su la sogs pa nyer gcig po 'di rnams kyi'ang / su o dzas dang po don tsam brjod pa/ a ma o shas gnyis pa las kyi ngan/ Ta b+hU ma b+his gsum pa byed pa po// de b+h+yAm b+h+yas bzhi pa ched du bya ba/ nga si b+h+yAm
59a4(sgra skor): byas lnga pa byung khung / ngas os A ma drug pa 'brel pa/ ngi os su pa bdun pa gnas gzhi rnams la 'jug/ de rnams las dper na dang po'i gcig tshig su dang / gnyis tshig oM/ mang mig dzas lta bu thams cad la
59a5(sgra skor): gtsog che sa chog mang tshig ste gsum gsum du gnas so// suM pyA suM p+ta'o// sus+ya zhes smras pas sne sa r+yA badz+ra bu'i brda ste dang pa'i gcig rlig spru lo bdun po'i mang tshig gi pa sbyar bas su nus pa'i bar gyi rnam
59a6(sgra skor): dbye bdun gsum nyi ku rtsa gcig po thams cad go bar byed do// d+ye ka yo rdi ba tse naM ka ba tse ne/ e ki dI ngag gi gcig tshig gnyis tshig dag go// gcig gi skang do e ka la rnam phye rnams kyi gcig tshig kho na dang / gnyis
59b1(sgra skor): kyi skad dong dri la gnyis tshig kho na 'jug/ ba hu ShAb tu ba can/ 'phrul mang chigo// mang po'i sgrub tu zhes pa lta bu la mang tshig kha na 'jug go/ nga ni rtags dang rnam dge sbyor ba'i chos rnams ldan par bya ste/ rtags de yang po rtags ma
59b2(sgra skor): rtags ma ning gi rtags dang gsum du yong la/ rtags gsum pa nga la'ang a tsa'i mtha' can dang hal gyi mtha' can gnyisu gnas po las/ dang po aH'i mtho'i can pho rtags a thung mtha'o can las/ ra ma zhes pa'i
59b3(sgra skor): rtags sam ming la dper brjod du byA ste/ rA ma la su/ de dbyi 'os u phyis/ sa sa dzuSha sogs kyi mangs sar/ khar sogs kyi mdos ra rnam bcas byas pas/ rA maHrA ma la gnyis tshig/ o pra tha ma yoHpUrbas bar+NaHdang
59b4(sgra skor): po ngag la snga ma 'dra ba'o// ming e kaM so sor bsdu ba'i mtha' con gyi pha rol tu rnam bye dang po dang gnyis pa ngag gi an+da dang po can rnams byung na/ de'i snga ma rtogs mthi sa a/ a tsa de dang 'dra ba'i ring por 'gyur bas skabs 'dir
59b5(sgra skor): yang a ring por bsgyur ba thob kyang / de'i dmigs bsal/ nA di tsi/ ata i tsa lo ma yin no// aka gri nang tshan yin kyang rtags mtha' a yig la pha rol itsa snga ma 'dra ba'i ring por mi 'gyur bas e ring por mi bsgyur/
59b6(sgra skor): e tsa la 'phel ba 'os gnyis dag gis gcig 'phel bar bsgyur bas rA mo// a kyangs/ rA ma la mang tshig dzas/ tsu Tu/ tsu Tu dag go// rkyen gyi thog ma'i tsu ste tsa sde dang Tu ste Ta sde rnams 'gro ba'i ming can te dza phyis/ na bi b+hak+ti hu~Mm+b+ha
60a1(sgra skor): rnam dbye'i tu swa ma rnams ma yin no// rnam s+ye ri ta sde dang / shas lta bu'i sa dang / a ma lta bu'i ma rnams ni 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin no// dang po dag la snga ma 'dra ba 'os ring po/ sa sa dzu
60a2(sgra skor): sogs kyis sa ra/ khar sogs kyis rnam bcad byas pas/ rA mAHsl-i k+Sho byA tsA ne saM bud+d+hiHgcig tshig la saM bud+d+ha'o// khong pa'i don du sbyin pa'i rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig la saM bud+d+hi zhes ming 'dogs byed do// rA ma la bong
60a3(sgra skor): pa'i don gyi sku/ ed d+hA swAt+ma pUd+d+he/ thung ngu dang snying las saM bud+d+he // oM tsaM thung bu rnams dang / engs sbyor bsdu ba'i mtha' can las pha rol gyi sau byAd+d+hi byi bar bya ste/ sa prad+hi phyis/ bong tshig rnam dbye byin pa'i rtog sa te sngon du banas
60a4(sgra skor): pas/ he rA mA/ gnyis tshig dang mang chog gong gi rnam dbye dang pa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ he rA mo/ he rA mAHrA ma la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig a maM/ a me pUH/ ama? la snga ma'o// rtags mtha' aka so sor
60a5(sgra skor): bsdu ba'i tsha / yi ge yin na rnam dgyi gnyis pa'i yum gyi a yig snga ma'i gzug su 'gyur te/ na ni/ cig kyim / sa kyim pa gnyis tshig dang po'i gnyis tshig ltar bsgrubs pas/ rA mo/ rA ma la mang tshig shas/ la shA kra tat+tiH/
60a6(sgra skor): depon ma yin pa la la sha gu rnams so// de phan gyi rkyen ma yin de'i rnam dbye dang / byings sgrub pa li la dang / kr-ita sogs gang la'ang rkyen gyi thog mar gnas pa'i lo yig dang / gces ye sha yig dang / kuste kA sde rnams 'dra
60b1(sgra skor): ba'i ming can te/ sha phyis/ dang po dag la snga ma 'dra 'os ring por bsgyur/ tasmAts+tsha son/ puM si/ de las shas kyi na skyes pa la'o// skyes pa'i rtags 'dra ba'i cho ga byas zin pa'i pha rol gyi shas kyi sa yig ni na yig tu 'gyur
60b2(sgra skor): tes nAr bsgyur bas/ rA mA na/ raShA b+hU no Na se mAn pa de/ raSh+Ta dag lwa na'i Na rkang pa mtshungs pa la'o// rkang pa mtshungs pa la'o// rkang pa mtshungs pa ste tshig rkang gcig tu gnas pa'i ra yi gA da bAlA yig ngag las pha rol gyi
60b3(sgra skor): na yig ni Nir 'gyuraro// ga tsha rnams[]/ auT ku prA num+b+ha bA yeHpi/ AT ku pu Ang num rnams par na yod kyang ngo // tshu rol ra yig dang Sha yig ngag las pha rol gyi na yig ni aT sa sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang / ka sde dang /
60b4(sgra skor): pa sde dang / nyer bsgyur Ang dang num A ga ma rnams bar na yod kyang Nar 'gyur bas/ spyir btang na Nar 'gyur ba thob kyang de'i yang dmigs bsal ni/ na pa dAn+ta swa/ tshig mtha'i ma yin no// rgyu mtshan gong du smos pa de
60b5(sgra skor): rnams tshang yang tshig mtha'i na srog med ni Nar mi 'gyur bas na nyid du gnaso// rA ma la gsum pa'i gcig tshig TA sbyin/ yas+sa ta prat+ya ya bi d+hi sA dA di prA d+yA yAd+h+waM/ gang rkyen gyi cho ga rkyen de'i snga ma la ang+ga'o// gang rkyen gyi gzhi
60b6(sgra skor): 'am snga ma ste rtags de la pha rol rkyen gyi cho ga 'byung ba'i phyir/ ang+ga'i ming can zhes brda cheng byed do// TA/ nga si nga sI ma nASh+TaHTA nga si ngas rnams kyi i ne ata s+ya rnamaso// rtags a yig mtha' can ang+ga zhes brda
61a1(sgra skor): chad byas pa de'i pha rol rnam dbye gsum pa'i gcig tshig TA ni i na dang / lnga pa'i gcig tshig pa si ni a ta/ drug pa'i gcig tshig ngas ni s+ya rnamasu 'gyur te/ TA/ i na/ a las yon tan nos e/ ra Sha dag la
61a2(sgra skor): zhes pa'i mangs/ na Na/ r-I me Na/ rA ma lA/ gsum pa'i b+h+yAM/ su pi tsa/ su pa la' // rtags a thung mtha' ang+ga'i ming can las// su pa la sogs pa'i rnam dbye yanya so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge byung na rtags mtha' ring po 'gyuraro// /
61a3(sgra skor): rA mA b+h+ya/ rA ma la/ dag byed kyis/ gsum pa'i// b+his/ a taM b+hi sa aMs/ ata las b+hi sa'i aMsa'o// rtags a thung mtha' ang+gi'i ming can las/ rnam dbye gsum pa'i mang tshig b+his ni ais ru bsgyuro// ai tsa las 'phel
61a4(sgra skor): ga bye ga gis pa dang / swa swa dzuSha sogs kyis/ rA maMHrA ma la/ bzhi pa'i de/ deHyaH/ de la'o// rtags a thung mtha' can ang+ga'i ming can las pha rol gyi daM ni ya ru 'gyur te/ de ya ru bsgyur/ su pa la'ang ngos rnying po/
61a5(sgra skor): rA mA ya/ rA ma la bzhi pa'i b+h+yAM/ su pa la 'dos/ dag byed rnams kyis/ rA mA b+h+yAM/ rA ma la bzhi pa'i mang tshig b+h+yas/ ba hu pa tsa ne dz+nyA l+yeta/ mang tshig la dz+hal la e ta'o// rtags mtha' a thung ang+ga'i ming can las/ rnam dbye mang tshig dz+hal
61a6(sgra skor): dad byed kyi ched du/ gyi yi ge dang po can gang byung yang / rtags mthA dag rnyi dag gi cheng du/ e yig tu 'gyur te/ rA me b+h+yaHe ta/ des byed rnams kyi dang / zhes bshad pa ni ta yig de'i dus kyi'o// zhes pa'i don no// rA ma la/ lta po'i nga si/ TA nga
61b1(sgra skor): sings rnams kyi i na ata s+ya rnam so zhes pas/ nga si ata/ aka 'dra ba sogs kyis/ rA mAta/ rA ma la/ lnga pa'i b+h+yAM dang b+h+yas/ gong gi bzhi pa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ rA mU b+h+yAM/ rA me b+h+yaHrA ma la/ drug pa'i ngas
61b2(sgra skor): D+ha nga si sogs kyi mdos/ rA ma s+ya/ rA ma la/ sa kyi sa gnyis tshig os/ o si tsa/ o sa da []/ la 'ang ngo // rnam dbye os pha rol la rtags ang+ga'i ming can de e ru 'gyur ro// she bye se dge khyod rnams la/ e tsa'i a ya so Da
61b3(sgra skor): dang / sa su dzuSha sogs kyi mdos/ rA ma yauHrA ma la/ drug pa'i A ma/ tra swa na d+ya po nuT/ thung ngu na dI A pa rnams laso nuTa'o// rtags mtha' thu'u rnams dang na dI mang can te bud med kyi rtags I U gnyis dang A pa ste ma
61b4(sgra skor): rtags A ra ngi mtha' can rnams las la kyangs pa/ pha rol rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshag Am la nuT A ga ma ster te/ Ta yig TI ta sogs kyi don u brjod don/ rA ma/ nA ma/ nA mi/ nA ma la'o// nA ma pha rol la rtags mtha'i atsa
61b5(sgra skor): gang yin kyang ring por 'gyur te/ rtags mtha' ring po aT ku pu sogs kyi mdos/ nA NA/ rA mA NAM/ rA ma la/ bdun pa'i ngi/ nga 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/ a la yan tan nas/ rA me/ rA ma la bdun pa'i os/ gong drug
61b6(sgra skor): bipi'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ rA ma yo dgang bye dag la/ rA ma la bdun pa'i mang tshig su pa po gi byed rnams ma/ so sor bsdu ba'i don yin pas phyis/ mang tshig la dz+ha la la e ta 'os/ rA me su/ rag bying la/ A de sha pra t+ya ya yoHkun nas
62a1(sgra skor): bsgyur ba dang rkyen dag la'o// tshu rol iN so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang ka sde yod la/ pha rol Sha sar bsgyur zin pa lta bu kun nas bsgyur ba dang / rkyen gyis tshig mtha' min pa rnams Sharu 'gyur te/ rA meSh+Ta
62a2(sgra skor): tshig mtha' yin na mi 'gyur te/ ha ristA tra/ zhes pa lta bu la tshu rol in so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge i mthong yang pha rol sa Shar mi 'gyur bar sa nyid du gnas pa lta bu'o// de ltar a tsa mtha' can skyes pa'i rtags las da
62a3(sgra skor): spyir btang a thung mtha' can gyi cho ga rnams pa/ kyis/ shad zin nas a thung mtha' can las dmigs bsal sarba la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams bshang par bya ste/ sar+b+baM dI ni sarba nA mA ni/ sarba la sogs pa rnams la sarba'i ming can no//
62a4(sgra skor): sorba la sogs pa ni 'di rnams te/ sarba/ bi shwa/ u D+hA ya/ Da ta ra/ Da ta ma/ i tA ra/ a n+ya/ a n+ya ta ra/ tAta/ tA/ ne ma/ sa ma/ si ma/ pUR+YA/ paM ra/ a wa ra/ dak+Shi Na/ ut+kA ra/ a pa ra/ a d+ha ra/ s+yA
62a5(sgra skor): an+ta ra/ t+yang/ tad/ yang / e tang / i dam sa pa rnamams/ / a ngas/ e ka/ dI/ rasang pe / 'an/ gnan dang gnan/ khyod/ r-i/ tshums/ mnyam gas cha ma ma la 'bas/ shing ngam bdun sa ldan/ ba3/ yuSh+mang / a smang // b+ha ny+dzata ces gzhan na na/ dam duM/ mtho res
62a6(sgra skor): sa/ @do k+She ma rnam so// Da ta ra dang / Da ta ma ro gnyisani ming min yang rkyen de gnyis gang la sbyar ba'i ming de sang sarba'i ming can du shes para'os bya'o// ra 'di rnams ni rtags gsum chog
62b1(sgra skor): thams cad 'jug rung yin no// sarba la rnam dbye dang po'i su dang au gnyis gong spyir btang a thung mtha' can rA ma'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ sar+b+baHsan+tau/ sarba la/ dzas/ dza sa/ shrI/ dzas kyi kI'o// a thung mtha' can sarba'i rtags la rnam
62b2(sgra skor): dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas ni shI ru 'gyur te/ sha 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/ a las zhes pa'i mangs satsa/ rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams gong rA ma'i skabs ltar/ sar+b+baM/ sar+b+bo/ sar+b+ban/ rnam dbye gsum pa rnams kyang gong bzhin/ sarbe Na/
62b3(sgra skor): sorbA b+h+yA/ sar+b+baMHsarba la bzhi pa'i nges/ sarba nAm+b+haHsme/ sarba'i ming can las smai'o// a thung mtha' can sarba'i ming can te sarba sogs la rnam dbye bzhi pa'i de ni smai ru 'gyuraro// sarba smai/ sarba la bizho pa'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gnyis
62b4(sgra skor): gong rI ma'i skabs ltar/ satwa b+h+yAM/ sarbab+h+yaHsarba la lnga pa'i nga si/ da si d+d+ho s+yAt+ma no/ nga saM bi dag gi s+yAta smin dag go// sarba sogs la rnamo dbye lnga pa'i gcig tshig d+ha si ni s+thAta dang / bdun pa'i gcig tshig ngi ni sprin du
62b5(sgra skor): 'gyur ro// sarba smAta/ sarbA dz+dzaH/ sarbe b+h+yaH/ sarba la drag pa'i ngas dang os gnyis gong rA mA'i skabs ltar/ sarba s+ya/ sarba yo/ sarba la/ rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshig Am/ A mi sarba nAma?HsuT/ Amra la sarba'i ming
62b6(sgra skor): can rnams las suTa'o// a thung mtha' can sarbe sogs la rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshig Am la suT A ga ma 'jug go/ sarba sAM/ mang tshi go la/ zhes dang / kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyi mangs/ sarbe ShAM/ sarba la/ ngi/
63a1(sgra skor): nga si/ ngi ngag gi zhes pa'i mdos/ sarba smin/ gnyis tshig dang ming tshig spyir btang dang 'dra bas/ sarba yoHsarbe Sh+Ta/ kun tu bod pa'i don can rnams he sarba/ he sarbo/ he sarbe/ zhes pa ltar bi
63a2(sgra skor): shA sogs sarba'i ming can a thung mtha' can rnams la cho ga 'di kho na bzhin bsgrub pa'o// sarba'i ming can gyi nang tshan/ u b+ha la ni/ su sogs gcig tshig bdun dang dzas sogs mang tshig bdun mi 'jug/ gnyis
63a3(sgra skor): tshig bdun po kho na 'jug pas/ rnam dbye dang po la/ u b+hau/ gnyis pa la/ u[:]b+hau/ gsum pa la/ u b+hU b+h+yAM/ bzhi pa la/ U b+hU b+h+yAM/ lnga pa la/ u b+hA b+h+yAM/ drug pa la/ u b+ha yoHbdun pa la/ u b+ha yoHde rnams
63a4(sgra skor): rnam dbye rnams kyi gnyis tshig kho nas grub pa'o// sarbi'i ming can gyi nang tshan/ pUrba sogos la/ rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig gong ltararaM/ pUrbaHpUrbo/ mang tshig dzas kyi skabs yang na ba ste/
63a5(sgra skor): pUpArba[:]la/ dzas/ pUrba pa rA wa ra dak+Shi Not+ta rA pa rA d+ha rA Ni bya wastA yA ma saM dz+ha yAM/ pUr+tha/ pa ra/ a wa ra/ dak+Shi Na/ ut+ta ra/ a pa ra/ a b+ha ra rnams rnam par bzhag pa ste ming ma yin pa la'o// sarba'i nang
63a6(sgra skor): chen/ pUrba sogs tau pUrba nas/ a d+hA ra'i bar rnams la rnam par bzhag pa ste ming ma yin na sarba nA ma'i cho ga dang / ming yin na spyir btang a thung mtha' can rA ma'i cho ga ltar bsgrub pa'o// pUrbe/ pUT+Ta de bzhin sa
63b1(sgra skor): sgra la dzas/ sU dz+nyA ti d+ha nA khA yaM/ sA la gnyen dang nor dag la ma yin no// sarba'i nang tshun sA la gnyen dang nor dag dang sbyor ba'i tshe sarba'i ming can ma yin te/ sarba sogs kyi cho ga ltar dzas shir mi 'gyur bar spyir btang a thung
63b2(sgra skor): mtha' can kho ni'i tsho gas bsgrub pa'o// sA dz+nyA ta yA[]an+ta ra la dzas/ an+ta raM ba hin+d+ho go pa saM b+hA na yaHan+ta ra lA phyi dang sbyor ba gon pa ngag laso// sarba'i ming can an+ta ra'i sgra la/ phyi dang sbyor ba dang gos gyon pa'i sgra sbyar
63b3(sgra skor): ba'i tshe/ sarba nA ma'i bya ba mi 'jog par/ rI mi'i cho ga nas bsgrubs pas/ an+ta rAHdang / phyi dang gon pa'i don ma yin na sarbi'i ming can ltar bsgrubs pas/ an+ta re/ purbA di b+h+yo na wa b+h+yA bA/ pUrbo la sogs dgu las/ yang na'o//
63b4(sgra skor): pUrba la sogs pa dgu las/ rnam dbye lnga pa'i gcig tshig nga si dang / bdun pa'i gcig tshig gnyis ni yang na ba ste/ spyir btang a thung mtha' can rA ma'i cho ga dang sarba nA ma'i cho ga gang rung 'jug pas/ lnga pa la/ pUrbAta/
63b5(sgra skor): pUrba smA ta/ bdun pa la/ pU che/ pUrbo sr-in lta bu'o// de bzhin du/ pa rAta/ pa rasma ta/ lnga pa/ pa re/ pa ra smin/ bdun pa ste/ de ltar pUrba nas/ an+ta ra'i bar thams cad rigs 'grel/ sarba'i ming can rnams la nyer bsgyur sbyor ba dang /
63b6(sgra skor): mong dang / sa me la mnyam pa'i ngan/ sa la nar dang gnyen gyi don/ an+dA ra la phyi'i don rnams sbyor ba la sarba'i ming can ma yin te/ sarba nA mi'i cho ga rnams mi 'jug par spyir btang a thung can gyi skabasu bshad pa ltar bya'o/
64a1(sgra skor): de yang dben/ a ti sarbAHzhes nyer bsgyur a ti yod pa'i sarba la dzas shrIr mi 'gyur bar rA ma ltar bsgrubs pa lta bu'o// na ba hu brI ho/ 'bru mang po la ma yi no// sarba sogs la 'bru mang po'i tshig sdud gnas pa la
64a2(sgra skor): yang sarbanA ma'i cho ga rnams mi dam tshams 'jug ste/ dper nA/ pri ya sarba la/ nges byin pa sma ru mi 'gyur bar/ ngo yar bsgyur bas/ pri ya serbA ya/ tri tI yA sa mA se/ gsum pa'i tshig sdung la'o// gsum pa'i tshig sdung
64a3(sgra skor): ces pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i khyad par rnam dbye gsum pa tshig sdud kyis phyis kyang 'dra ste/ rtags sarba'i ming can rnams la sarba'i d+ya ga ga tham sa cad kyi chad du/ ba mi 'jug par spyir btang a thung mtha' can gyi cho ga byed pas/
64a4(sgra skor): dper na/ ma so pUrbA ya/ ma sne no pUrbA ya/ lta bu'o// dAn+d+hA tsa/ zlas dbye la 'ang ngo // rtags mtha' a yig sarba'i ming can tshig sdud kyi khyad par zlas dbye gnas pa las kyang sarba nA ma'i bya ba rnams mi 'jug pas spyir btang gi
64a5(sgra skor): cho gas bsgrub pa'o// mtshungs pa'i sngon// pUrbe pa rA wa rA NAM/ su Ta mi 'jug nuT 'jug pa lta bu'o// bi b+hU ShA dza si/ dzas la gdam pa'o// sarba nA ma las/ zlas dpe'i tshig sdud gnas pa la sarba'i ming can gyi bya pa dang spyir btang a thung
64a6(sgra skor): mtha' can gyi cho ga rnam dbye dang g-i mam gas nams kyi/ po'i dzas la gang ma da byA stAM/ shI ru 'gyur ba dang aka 'dra ba'i cho ga gnyis ka 'jug pa'o// bar+m+mo pra me ta riHbar+Na shra me ta rAHlta bu'o// pra tho ma tsa ra ma ti yASh+ma d+ha ka ti ba
64b1(sgra skor): ya ni mAsh+tsa/ pra tha ma/ tsa ra ma/ tI ya/ alka/ ar+d+ha/ ka tI pa yu/ ne ma rnams la yang ngo // pra tha ma sogs la yang rnam dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas ni sarba sogs kyi skabs ltar shI ru 'gyur ba dang spyir btang a thung mtha' can
64b2(sgra skor): ltar ka 'dra de ma'am chogs/ bags pa/ pa'i cho ru / ga gnyis cas khrims/ kar 'jug pas gang ma nga'o// pra tha me/ dra tha mAHtI ya'i rkyen sbyar ba ni/ dI tI ye/ dwi trI yAHlte bu'o// pra tha ma sogs la dzaM sa ma gtogs rnam dbye
64b3(sgra skor): lhag ma gzhan thams cad rA ma'i skabs dang 'dra'o// 'grel par lung drangs pa/ tI ya s+ya dit+su bA sarba nA ma dang pa nams/ tA bA ts+tsha/ tI ya'i nga 'gro ba nAmAM gnyi la rnams la sarba'i ming can du yang na bshang ngo // tI yi'i rkyen la yang nga
64b4(sgra skor): 'gro ba'i ming can rnams sarbi'i bya ba dang / rA ma'i bya ba gnyis gang ma pa can yin pas gnyis kyi 'jug ste/ rnam dbye bzhi pa'i nge la/ dwi tI yasmai/ dwi tI yA ya/ lnga pa/ dI tI yasmata/ bdun pa/ dwi two ya smin/ dwi tI ye/ lta bu'o//
64b5(sgra skor): lhag ma rnams rA ma dang 'dra'o// dz+wa rA yA dza ra sa n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ dza rA'i dza ras yang na'o// dza rA'i sgra la rnam dbye ta la to gsal byed theg ma can rnams la/ dza rA/ dza ras zhes pa'i bsgyur ba'o// su la nirdza raHa tsa la/ dza ra su
64b6(sgra skor): bsgyur bas/ nirdza ra so/ nirdza ra sa gnyis pa la/ nirdza ra saM/ nairdza ra so/ nirdza ra saHnirdza ra la/ rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA/ 'dir 'grol par gzhan nas lung drang pa/ ke tsi dAdA be nA tA wA dze shA bi tshan+taM/ []la/ la yar snga ma e na/
65a1(sgra skor): ata ngag tu kun nas bsgyur bar 'dod do// des byung bas/ nirdza rA zhes pa'i rtags 'di / dza ras/ dza ra sa/ dza ra se na/ rnamasu 'gyur bas/ nirdza ra sA/ nirdza ra se na/ nirdza ra se ne na ste gzugs gsum 'byung ngo // TA
65a2(sgra skor): man chad rnam dbye thams cad la gzugs gsum du byed pa dang / gzhung nyid kyi bshad pa ltar/ a tsa thog ma can rnams la dza ras su bsgyur/ ha la thog ma can rnams la/ dza rA nyid du gnas pa 'ad ma ka can du bya'o// ni rdzi ra ste/
65a3(sgra skor): nirdza ra sA ya/ nirdza ra se na ya/ zhes pa lta bu thams cad la rigs 'gre'o// pat+san+do mAs dr-in+di sha sar+b+bA Sha na do Sha ya kany+dza kan+na dan+na san+d+hi smA b+h+r-i ti Sh+Ta/ shas la sogs pa rnams la pad ngata nas mAs hr-ing ni sha a san
65a4(sgra skor): pU Sha na do Sha na ya kan shwa kan u dan A san rnamaso// pa nga la sogs pa 'di rnams la rnam dbye dang po gsum dang / gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig rnams gong a thung mtha' can spyir btang rA ma'i skabs
65a5(sgra skor): dang 'dra/ rnam dbye gnyis pa'i mang tshig shes nas brtsams te/ bdun pa'i mang tshig sub kyi bar rnam dbye rnams gang byung yang / pA ta/ ni/ pad/ dan+ta ni/ data/ nA si ka nI/ nas/ mA sa ni/ mAs/ hr-i da ya ni/ hring / ni sha zhes
65a6(sgra skor): pa/ naM shA/ a sr-idz+r-i ni/ ti chog a sana?/ ma byi pa/ du ShA ni/ ka pU Sha na/ do Shu/ nya sa ni/ de Sha na/ ya kr-id/ bau kyaipa ni/ ya kar+ra/ sha kr-i tAM na ga rlas ni/ sha kan tshig/ u da ku/ da u/ ni/ mnyam pa ma ma sum la/ u dan ti/ a san nI tshong ba
65b1(sgra skor): A san rnams yang na 'gyur zhing / skabs 'gar bu brgyud kyi rkyen la'ang 'gyur te/ pa da ya/ la shas/ ba da ya/ pang du 'gyur drangs/ pa daHgrub/ de bzhin du bsgrub pas/ pa dA/ pad+d+haM/ pad+d+hiHnga taHda tAHdad+h+waM/ na saHna sA/ no g+h+r-i/ mA sa
65b2(sgra skor): mA sA/ mA b+h+yAM/ hr-i daHhr-i dA/ hr-id+b+h+yAM/ ni shaHnai shA/ niny+tsau/ a sa naHa sa nA/ a sa b+h+yAM/ pUSh+TaHpUSh+Ta/ pU Sha b+h+yAM/ doSh+TaHdoSh+Ta/ ngoSha b+h+yAM/ yak+ShA/ yak+ShA/ ya kab+h+yAM/ shak+ShAHshak+tAM/ sha ka b+h+yAM/ ud+YAHud+b+ha/ uH b+hU/ Is+dzaH
65b3(sgra skor): As+dza/ A saM b+h+yAM/ zhes pa lta bu thams cad la rigs 'gre'i// hring sogasu ma 'gyur ba'i phyogs rA ma dang 'dra'o// su Da na puM se ka s+ya/ suT me ning ma yin pa'i'o// rnam phye dang po'i gcig tshig su nas gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig
65b4(sgra skor): o Ta'i bar lnga pi nA ma ning ma sne ba stem ning por bri skyes pa'i rta DA so ga la su Ta so sor bsdu ba 'am/ su Ta'i ming can nam thams cad gnas pa'i mang can+da zhes dgos pa'i cheng du brda chang byeng ngo // swA di ShAs bAnA ma stA no/ su sogs rnams la thams
65b5(sgra skor): cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa la'o// su sogs nyi shu rtsa gcig las gong du bshad pa ltar rnam dbye dang po'i su nas gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig oTa'i bar lnga po rnams thams cad gnas pa'i ming can dang / lnga po rnams bor ba'i
65b6(sgra skor): shes nas sub kyi bar rnams la thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa zhes dgos pa'i dbang gis ming 'dogs byed de// dgos pa ni/ shas sogs thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa rnams kyi lnga me'i ming de la rnam
66a1(sgra skor): 'gyur byung ba'i phyir pa da zhes ming 'dags byed de 'og nas ci rigs pa 'byung // ya tsi b+hA/ ya an la b+ha'o// yA'i rkyen dang shas sogs thams cad gnas pa'i mang can ma yin pa rnams kyi rnam da atsa sde dbyangs thog
66a2(sgra skor): ma can rnams kyi snga ma'i ming ngam rtags de la b+hA zhes dgos pa'i tshod du ming 'dogs byed do// oMwo po na/ na'i ata dbyi'o// rtags b+ha'i ming can gyi pU Sha na zhes pa lta bu'i pha rol tu shas sogs thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa
66a3(sgra skor): atsa thog ma can pha rol la rtags mtha' na sogs med kyi snga ma'i a di da'o// pU Shan la/ shasa? a phyis/ ra Sha sogs kyi mangs na Na drangs/ preSh+TaHpU Sha na laM b+h+yAM/ na lo paHpra ti pa dI kI ta s+yo mong mtha' nA dbyi'o// ming mtha'i na
66a4(sgra skor): srog med ni rnam dbye ha la thog ma can rnams la dbyi ste na phyis/ pU Sha b+h+yAM/ pU Sha na la/ bdun pa'i dbyin/ bi b+ha ShA ngi sh+yoHpi shI dag la gdam nga'o// rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi dang shr-I ste/ ma nang gi rtags la i shIr bsgyur ba gnyis kyi
66a5(sgra skor): snga ma'i rtags mtha' na srog med gnas pa'i a dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba gang rung 'dam ka can du bya ste/ pUSh+Ti/ pU la Nau/ saM khyA bi sA ya pUrba sAh+ma s+yA he na n+yo ta ra s+yai ngo / grangs pa sA ya snga ma'i at+ma'i A han ngi la yang na'o//
66a6(sgra skor): grangs rnams dang nyer bsgyur ba dang / dgong mo'i skad dod/ sA ya rnams snga ma'i ah+ma'i sgra ni rnam dbye bdun pa'i gcig tshig ngi la a ha ne zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ grangs thog ma can la/ dI a hA la ngi sbyin pas/ d+ha tA/ d+hA ta naM/
66b1(sgra skor): d+hab+h+yo/ ba~M thig mar bzhag pa la/ byAd+d+he byA ha ni byASh+TAM/ sA ya thog mar bzhug pa la/ swA swA hU~M/ swA yA ha ne/ s+thA yAt+ma/ zhes+t+ra pa lta bu'i gzugs gsum gsum byung ba'i sa ma rnams na'o a ta bya'o zhes pas bsgrubs pa'o// zhes pa
66b2(sgra skor): nyam de rnams ni skyes pa'i rtogasanyiH/ las thung mtha' can rnamaso// skyes pa'i rtags A ring mtha' can la/ bi shra pAM/ zhes pa'i rtags la dper brjod na/ bi shwa pA zhes pa la/ rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig/ su/ de dbyi 'os
66b3(sgra skor): u phyis/ sa sa dz+ri Sha sogs dang / khar sogs kyi mangs bsgrubs pas/ bi shwa paHau dang dzAs la/ dIr+m+ma dz+nyA si rnam 'thung ci/ ring po las dzas itsa la'o// a yig ring po'i mtha' las pha rol gyi rnam dbye itsa so sor bsdu ba
66b4(sgra skor): dang po can rnams dang dzas la/ dang po dag la s+thA ma 'dra ba'o// zhes pa'i mdo'i cho ga 'jug pa ma yin te/ e tsa'i 'phel ba dang / aka 'dra ba la ring po byas pas/ bi shwa pau/ bi shA p+tAHgnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/ am la swa
66b5(sgra skor): ma 'os/ bi shwa pAM/ gnyis tshig la/ bi shwa po/ mang tshig shas la/ A to tA to/ dbyangs kyi Ata kyi'o// rnam dbye gnyis pa'i shas nas brtsams te/ bdun pa'i supa kyi bar gyi rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can gang byung yang / rtags
66b6(sgra skor): byings kyi A ring mtha' can yin pa'i A de dbyi ste/ A phyis pas/ bi sa paHrnam dbyo lhag ma'ang bshang mi thag pa'i cho ga ltar gyis bsgrubs pas/ gsum pa la/ bi shwa pA/ bo shwa pA b+h+yAM/ bi wa pAr+t+tiHbzhi pa la/ shwa pe/
67a1(sgra skor): bi shwa pA b+h+ra/ be+e sh+ma pA b+h+yAHlnga pa la/ shA paHbe shrA prA b+hU/ !shwa pA b+h+yaHdrug pa la/ baM bA paHba ka paHbi shra pA/ bdun pa la/ thaM shra pa/ thaM shwa pa swa pA su/ bang tshig la/ he dzaM shwa pAHhaH thA \u0f7fta ba Ta pyAH
67a2(sgra skor): de bzhin du/ so ma pA/ kI lA la pA/ shaM kha d+h+r-i/ hA hA/ D+hA/ sna la sogs kyi mang po dag kyang bi shwa pA dang bya ba 'dra ba'o// zhes pa skyes pa rtags kyi A ring mtha' can gyi bya ba bshad zin to// da ni skyes pa'i rtags i thung mtha' can gyi
67a3(sgra skor): bya ba rnams bshad par bya ste/ sum su lu / \u0f7f/ ha ri laM/ rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig/ su/ sa sa dzuSha dang khar sogs kyi mangs/ ha riHha ri la/ oM/ dang po dag la/ zhes pas/ ha rI/ ha ri la dzas/ dza si tsa/ dzas la'ang ngo // ikA
67a4(sgra skor): so sor bsdu ba thung ngu rnams kyi pha rol rnam dbye dang ya?ka A/ po'i mang tshig dzas mthong na rtags ang+gi'i ming can de yon tan du 'gyur te/ ha re/ dzas/ dza phyis/ e tsa'i a ya awa sogs kyi mdos/ ha ra yaHha ri la/ kun tu bod pa'i
67a5(sgra skor): gcig tshig sau bud+d+ha'i mang can/ su/ hra sA s+ya gu NaHthung ngu'i yon tan no// i ka thu du rnams saM bud+d+hi la yon tan du 'gyur te/ he ha re/ su/ thung ngu dang eng la zhes pas/ su phyis/ he ha re/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gong rnam dbye/
67a6(sgra skor): dang po dang 'dra bas/ he ha rI/ he ra yaHha ri la/ gnyis pa'i am dang / au/ am la snga ma'o zhes pa dang / dang po dag la zhes pas/ ha rau/ ha rI/ ha ri la/ shas sha phyis/ dang po dag la zhes pas/ ha rIs/ de yang shas kyi na
67b1(sgra skor): skyes pa la'o// zhes pas sa srog med na/ hA rIn/ ha ri la gsum pa'i/ TA/ she Sho kyA sa khi/ sa khi ma yin pa la lhag ma g+hi'o// na dI ming can dang rtags e ka so sor bsdu ba thu du rnams kyi nang nas sa khi ma yin pa ste/ sa khi'i sgra bor ba'i
67b2(sgra skor): aka thu'i mtha' rnams kyi pha rol tu rnam dbye lhag ma ste/ dang po dang gnyis pa ma yin pa'i rnam dbye gsum pa'i D+ha nas brtsams te/ bdun pa'i sub kyi bar pha rol tu byung na rtags mtha'i dbyangs de la g+ni zhes ming rtags byed de dgos
67b3(sgra skor): pI ched du'o// A ngo nA s+t+ri yaM/ bud med ma yin pa la Ang gi nA'o// rtags mtha' b+hi'i ming can gyi pha rol Ang ste/ TA ni bud med kyi rtags ma yin pa la nAr 'gyuraro// ha ri NA/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la bya ba lhag po med pas/ hA ri dz+yA/
67b4(sgra skor): ha ra b+hiHha ri la/ bzhi pa'i be/ g+he rdi ti/ g+hi'i nga 'gro ba laso// rtags mtha' g+hi'i ming can de pha rol rnams dang phrad na rtags mtha' b+hi'i ming can de yon tan du 'gyur bas/ ha re/ ngi/ nga phyis/ e tsa'i a yau sogs kyi mdos/ ha ra ye/
67b5(sgra skor): ta b+h+yAM/ ha raM b+h+yaHha ri la/ lnga ba'i nga saM/ ha ri/ dA si/ bshad ma thug pa'i mangs/ ta re/ as/ ngasi nga soHtsa/ nga si ngas dag gi yang ngo // rtags mtha' ang so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na pha rol rnam dbye lnga pa'i nga si dang / drug
67b6(sgra skor): pa'i ngos gnyis kyi nga 'gro ba'i ming can phyis pa'i a de ni snga ma eng gi yi ge gang mthong ba da'i gzugasu 'gyur te/ ha reHha ri b+h+yAMHha ri b+hu/ ha ri la/ drug pa'i/ ngas/ lnga pa dang 'dra bas/ ha reHha raM/ os/ ika gi zhes pas/
68a1(sgra skor): ha ri/ Am/ thung ngu sogs kyi nuT/ ra Sha ngag la zhes pas/ na Na/ rnam la 'os rtags mtha' ring por 'gyur/ ha rI NaM/ ha rI la/ ngi/ ats+tsha b+heHg+hi'i ata yang ngo // rtags mtha' g+ha'i ming can gyi pha rol tu rnam
68a2(sgra skor): dbye bdun pa'i di byung na/ rtags mtha' g+hi'i ming can de ata du 'gyur la/ yang gI sgras ngi o ru 'gyur te/ ha ra/ o/ e tsa la 'os/ ha ro/ han+d+hoHha ri ShA/ de bzhin du/ shrI pA ti/ ak+Sh+No/ ra bi/ ka l+r-i la sogs pa mang po dag kyang
68a3(sgra skor): ha ri dang bya ba 'dra'o// sa khi'i sgra la cung mi 'dra ste/ sa khi la rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig su byan/ sa khi/ su/ a nang so/ su la a nang ngo // so kho'i sgra la kun tu rangs kyi la// gim/ na pas/ bod pa'i don du sbyin pa'i saM bud+d+hi
68a4(sgra skor): ma yin pa'i su la shas gartags mtha' ang nang du 'gyur te/ sau kha na/ su/ a lon+mAt+sarba u pa d+hA/ al mtha' las snga ma u pa d+ha'o// rtags mtha' al te gsal byed dam skabs 'gar dbyangs kyang rung ste mthi'i
68a5(sgra skor): snga ma'i yi ge dI ni u pa d+hA'i ming can no// sarba nA mas+thA ne tsA sa bud+d+ho// saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i thams cad gnas pa'i ming can la yang ngo // rtags mtha' na yig srog med kyi u pa d+hA'i a tsau de ni bod pa'i don du sbyin pa'i su/ saM bud+d+ha'i ming
68a6(sgra skor): can ma yin pa'i thams cang gnas po'i ming can gyi rnam dbye rnams la ring por 'gyur ro// sa khAn su/ a pr-ik+ta e kA la pra t+ya yaHrkyen al gcig pa a pr-ik+ta'o// rkyen al gcig pa ste yi ge srog ldan dang gnyis gsum
68b1(sgra skor): lta bu ma yin pa'i gsal byed srog med gcig po daM la/ a pr-ik+ta'i ming can+da zhes dgos pa'i dbang gis ming 'dogs byed do// ha la d+hA b+hU dAr+g+hAta su ti s+ya prAk+taM ha la/ ha la dIpa/ Apa/ ring po rnams la su ti si a pr-ik+tA'i ha la'o// rtag
68b2(sgra skor): mtha' la hal te gsal byed srog med dang / bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen dI pa dang Apa kyi mtha' dang ring po rnams los/ su dang / ti sogs kyi ti dang / se rnams kyi u dang i phyis pas/ ha la atsa med pa'i yi ge gcig pa/
68b3(sgra skor): a pr-ik+ta'i ming can de d+ha bau bar bya ste/ su phyis/ sa khAn/ mong mtha'i na dbyi'o// zhes pas/ na phyis/ sa khA/ sa khyAr saM bud+d+ho/ sa khi las saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa la'o// sa khi'i skabs 'dir kun tu bod pa'i don gyi gcig tshig saM
68b4(sgra skor): bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i dang po'i su nas gnyis pa'i o TA'i bar gyi rnam dbye lnga po sngar thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes brda chad byas pa de rnams la skabs 'dir Ni ta ste/ Na 'gro ba'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i ched du ming 'dogs
68b5(sgra skor): byed do// sa khi la/ dang po'i o dang dzas/ gnyis pa'i am dang au rnams sbyin/ a tsuny+dzi ti/ nya Nu 'gro ba la atsa'i 'o// pha rol tu nya NA 'gro ba'i mIng can byung na rtags mthe'i a tsa ste dbyangs de 'brel bar 'gyur bas
68b6(sgra skor): skabs 'dir yang o so Da bzhi la Na yig 'gro ba'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byas pa'i dgos pa ni 'di yin pas rtags mtha' 'phel ba/ e tsa'i a ya a wa sogs kyi mdos/ sa kho yo/ sa kha yaHsa kha yaM/ sa
69a1(sgra skor): khA yo/ sa khi la/ kun tu bod pa'i su sbyin suM bud+d+hi ma yin pa zhes pas skabs 'dir bshad ma thag pa'i bya ba mi 'jug/ gong ha ri'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ he sa khe/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig bshad ma thag pa'i rnam dbye dang
69a2(sgra skor): po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig ltar bsgrubs pas/ he sa khA yo/ haM sa khA yaHgnyis pa'i mang tshig shas kyi skabs ha ri dang 'dra bas/ sa khIn/ gsum pa rnams la/ sa khya/ sa khi b+h+yAM/ sa khi b+hiHbzhi pa la/ sa l+ye/ sa khi b+h+yAM/ sa khi b+h+ya
69a3(sgra skor): sa khi la/ lnga pa'i/ nga si sbyin/ khya t+yat+sa ra s+ya// bi ti dag las pha rol gyi i'i 'o// rtags mtha' khi ring po dang thung ngu ti ring po dang thudu rnams kyi pha rol rnam dbye lnga pa dang breg pa'i nga si dang ngas gnyis kyi ba phyis pa'i a de ni u ru
69a4(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ sa khyAHsa khi b+h+yAM/ sa khi b+h+yeHsa khi la rnam dbye drug pa rnams/ sa khyAHsa khyoHsa khI nAM/ sa khi la/ bdun pa'i ngi byin/ au ta/ au 'o// rtags na dI'i mang can dang g+ha'i ming can ma yin pa'i i thung dang u thung dag las
69a5(sgra skor): pha rol gyi rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi ni au ru 'gyur te/ au/ ika gi atsa la/ yaN/ sa khyo/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ sa khyoHsa khi Shu/ pa tiHsa mA sa e wa/ pa ti tshig sdud med pa 'di bzhin no// ba tau'i sgra tshig
69a6(sgra skor): sdud med pa ste/ b+ho ti zhes pa lta bu la sa kha'i sgra kho na'i bya ba rnams 'jug la/ tshig sdud dang 'brel ba ni/ dper na/ pU dz+nyA pa ti lta bu la naM gyi'i ming can yin pas spyir btang i thung mtha' can ha ri'i skabs dang cho ga
69b1(sgra skor): thams cad 'dra'o// i thung mtha' can ka ta'i sgra la ni mang tshig kho na 'jug la gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig dag mi 'jugo/ kha hu ga Na ba t+yA Da ti saM khya/ mang du 'dren pra bA tu Da ti rnams saM khyA'o// mang du 'dren pa sde mang tshig kho na thob pa
69b2(sgra skor): rnams dang / ba tu dang / Da ti'i rkyen rnams la saM khA'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i dbang gi ming 'dogs byed do// Da ti tsa/ DA ti la yang ngo // gang du bshad pa'i saM khyA'i ming can de rnams kyi nang nas kyang ka ti lA bu Da ti'i rkyen mtha' can
69b3(sgra skor): de la Sha Ta'i ming can zhes slar yang ming 'dogs byed do// pra t+ya ya s+ya luka shU lu paHrkyen gyi lukr-i shU lu pa rnamaso// pha rol gyi rkyen dbyi ba de la luka 'amo shru'am lu pa zhes zer ro// dper na/ dzas/ lu kaM zer ba 'am/ dzas shru
69b4(sgra skor): zer ba 'am/ dzas lupa zer ba lta bu gang byung yang / dzas de dbyi ba kho na'o// ka ti la/ rnam dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas dang / gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas gnyis byin/ Shats+tshe luka/ ShaT rnams las dbyi'o// Sha Ta'i ming can gyi rtags
69b5(sgra skor): las pha rol rnam dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas dang / gnyis pa'i mang tshig nga/ shas rnam dbyi ste/ ka ti'i sgra ShaTa'i ming can yin pas/ dzas shas ngag phyis/ ka ti/ ko ti zhes pa grub/ pra t+ya ya lo pa pra t+ya ya la k+Sha NaM/ rkyen
69b6(sgra skor): phyis pa la rkyen gyi mtshon nyid do// pha rol rkyen phyis kyang rkyen byin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rkyen gyi bya ba thob bo zhes rtags mtha'i i er 'gyur ba'i spyir btang thob kyang / na lu ma tAM ga s+ya/ phyis pa la ang+ga'i ma yin no// zhes dmigs
70a1(sgra skor): bsal luka 'am shu 'am lu pa zhes pa'i sgras rkyen phyis zin pa de la/ ang+ga te/ rtags de la bya ba med pas/ ka te zhes mi 'gyur bar ka ti nyid du gnas so// rnam dbye gsum pa'i mang tshig la/ ka ti b+hiHban pa la//
70a2(sgra skor): tib+h+ya lnga pa la/ ka ti b+h+yaHdrug pa la/ ka tI nAM/ bdun pa la/ kA tiSh+Tha/ bod tshig la he ka taM/ zhes pa lta bu'o// i thung mtha' can d+hA'i sgra la yang grangs bgrang ba'i sgrub su mang tshig kho na sbyor bas/ tri la/ rnam gyi dang pa dang / gnyis pa
70a3(sgra skor): gsum pa/ bzhi pa/ lnga po rnams kyi mang tshig rnams byin/ gong ha ri ltar bsgrubs pas/ tra yaHtI na/ tri b+hiHtr-i b+ha/ ti b+h+yaHtro la/ drug pa'i mang tshig Am/ trer+Natra yaHtri'i tra ya'o// rnam dbye drug pa'i !/ Am pha rol la tri zhes pa'i
70a4(sgra skor): s+thA ni tra ya zhes par 'gyur te/ tri tra ya/ thung zhes pas nATu/ rnam la'os rtags mtha' ring paM/ ra Sha sogs ky-i mangs/ na NaM/ tra yA nAM/ bdun pa la/ triSh+Ta/ bong tshig/ he tra yaHi thung mtha' can dI'i sgra la yang grangs bgrang
70a5(sgra skor): ba'i skabasu gnyis tshig kho na sbyor ro// t+ya dA dI nA maHt+yang sogs rnams kyi a'o// t+yang la sogs te t+yad nas dri'i bar brgyad po rnams pha rol rnam dbye gang mthong yang rtags mtha' a ru 'gyur te/ dI la/ rnam dbye dang po dang
70a6(sgra skor): gnyis pa gnyis kyi gnyis tshig/ oM/ dro'o a a mtshams sbyor bas/ dr-i dzo/ rnam bye gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa rnams la/ dA b+h+yAM/ dA b+h+rUM/ dA b+h+yAM/ drug pa dang / bdun pa la/ dA yoHdA yoHdr-isgral ming dang nye
70b1(sgra skor): bsgyur thog ma can rnams la dI'i i ar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam dbye yang sA nus pa'i bar thams cad 'jug la de'i tshe cho ga yang spyir btang i thung mtha' can ha ri'i skabs dang 'dra'o// de yan gyis skyes pa'i rtags i thung mtha'
70b2(sgra skor): can gyi sde tshan sbyor btang dmigs bsal dang bcas rags pa rnams bshad zin to// da ni skyes pa'i rtags I ring mtha' can ni/ b+hU ta pyA mI la/ su/ sa sa dzuShi' mdo dang / khAr sogs kyi mangs/ bA ta pra mIHbA ta pra mI la/
70b3(sgra skor): au dang dzas ikaM gi a tsa la yaN 'os/ bA ta pra myo/ bA ta pra mya[:]rnam dbye gnyis pa la// bA te pr-i mAM/ bA ta pra myo/ bA ta prA mIn/ gsum 9\u0f7f/ pa la/ bA tA pra mya/ bA ta pra mI b+h+yAM/ bA ta pra mI b+hiHbzhi pa la/ b+hU ta pra myaM/ bA ta/
70b4(sgra skor): pra mye/ bA ta pra mI b+h+yAM/ bA ta pa mI b+hUHlnga pa la/ b+hU ta pra myaHpA ta pra mI b+h+yAM/ pU ta pra mI r+d+haHdrug pa la/ bA ta pra myaHb+ha ta pra myoHbA ta pra mAM/ bdun pa la/ bA ta pra mi/ b+h+re ta pra myoHbA taM pra mA Sh+Ta/ bod tshig/ he b+hU ta pra mIHhe prA ta pra
70b5(sgra skor): mo/ rnge b+hU tA b+h+ra m+b+ha rnams grub ste tshi gA go bder// de basbyin du/ de dzA/ oM ti la~M k+Sh+mI/ lnga sogs pa ma po drug chog 'dra ldan dang 'dra'o// I rIng mthu' can byings gnas pa rnams bye bcung mi 'dra s+t+waM/ sud+d+ha la/ sku
70b6(sgra skor): suMd+d+hiHsud+d+hi la/ oM dang / dzis/ a tsi shU d+hA tu b+hU wI yA ro ya~M du wa~M / a b+hu byings b+hU rnams kyi i u ngag gi i ya u we dag go// pha ral a tsho ste dbyangs gang mthong yang rkyen g+hu dang ma
71a1(sgra skor): byings kyi i ring thung u ring thung / b+hU'i sgra rnams kyi i rnams i ya dang / u rnams uwa ru 'gyur zhing / spyir btang ika gi ya nA'o zhes pa thob kyang / na b+hU sud+d+hi yoHb+hU sud+d+hi dag la ma yin no// b+hU dang sud+d+hi
71a2(sgra skor): dag gi I U dag atsa pha rol la ya Nar 'gyur ba ma yin te/ i yar bsgyur bas/ sud+d+hi yo/ sud+d+hi yaHrnam dbye gnyis pa rnams la/ sud+d+hi yaM/ sud+d+hi yo/ sud+d+hi yaHgsum pa laM/ sud+d+hi yA/ suMd+d+haM b+h+yAM/ sud+d+hi b+hiHlta buM ste/ rnam
71a3(sgra skor): dbye lhag ma rnams la yang ha la thog ma can rnams la bya ba med/ a tsa thog ma can rnams la i yar bsgyur ba kho na yin pas gro bde'o// de bzhin du/ su shrI/ ya wa gr-I sogs kyang rig par bya'o// pr-i d+hi la/ su/ pra dz+nyI/ bA d+hi la/
71a4(sgra skor): oM/ dzas/ e ra ne kA tso saM yo ga pUrba s+ya/ I'i a tsa mong po'i sde ma brtsegs pa ma yani pa'i'o// rtags mtha' byings kyi I yig dang A gzugs mdzes som ngas las kun gyi ni lab 'dis rgya na dzang / yog a tsa gcig pa ma yin pa
71a5(sgra skor): ste dbyangs gnyis sam mang po yod pa sngon na yi ge mang po brtsegs pa med pa de ni atsa pha rol la yaNar 'gyur to/ pra dz+nye/ pra d+h+yaHgnyis pa la/ pra dz+yAHpra dz+yoHpra d+h+yAHgsum pa/ pra d+h+yA/ pra d+hI b+hU/ pra d+hI b+hIHrnam dbye lhag
71a6(sgra skor): ma rnams kyang rigs 'gre'o// 'di dang 'dra ba ni/ dI d+hI/ \u0f7f/ su d+hI rtog la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo // a tsa mang po zhes pas dbyangs gcig pa la bshad ma thag pa'i bya ba mi 'jug ste/ dper na/ nI zhes pa sa nau pa a tsa
71b1(sgra skor): gcig pa yin pas pra d+hI'i bya ba rnams mi 'jug/ rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi ma gtogs cho ga thams cad sud+d+hi'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ nIHni yau/ ni yaHlta bu rigs 'gre/ bdun pa'i d+hi lA cung mi 'dra ste/ nI la ngi/ de rAM na d+yam+b+hi b+h+yaHngi'i Am/
71b2(sgra skor): na dI A pa ni rnams las// rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi ni bud med kyi rtags/ na dI ming can rnams dang / A po kyi mthar rnams dang / nI'i sgra rnams la Am du 'gyur te/ ni yI/ grA ma NA yang rnam dbye bdun pa'i gcig tshi gau ngo ma gtogs pa
71b3(sgra skor): d+hI'i skabs dang 'dra/ ngi la bshad mo thag pa ni dang 'dra ste/ grA ma NIHgrA ma N+yo/ grA ma N+yaHsogs dang / bdun pa la/ grA ma Ni yI/ se khI dang pa tI ring po'i mtha' can yang rnam dbye lnga pa'i nga sa dang / drug pa'i ngas ma gtogs rnam
71b4(sgra skor): dbye gzhan thams cad la cho ga pra d+hI dang 'dra zhing / ngis/ ngas gnyis la sa khI dang / pa tI la/ nga si dang ngas byin/ khi ti dag las pha rol gyi i'a'o zhes pas ba si dang ngas kyi a u mtshams sbyar/ sa khyAHpa t+yuHdrug pa yang
71b5(sgra skor): gzugs dang bsgrub tshul gnyis ka 'dra'o// lU nI'i sgra yang rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi la ni'i skabs dang 'dra zhing / ngi ma yin pa'i rnam dbye gzhan thams cad la pra d+hI'i skabs kyi cho ga dang 'dra'o// de ltar skyes pa'i rtags las I ring
71b6(sgra skor): mtha' can sbyar btang dmigs bsal dang dpo sa kyad/ bcas pa rigs pa bshad zin to// \u0f7fda ni skyes pa'i rtag u thung gi/ bya ba rnams bshad par bya ste/ shaM b+hu la/ su/ sa sa dzuSha zhes dang / khar dang zhes pa'i mdos/ shr-I b+h+ya
72a1(sgra skor): shaM b+hU la/ au/ dang po dag gi zhes pas/ shaM b+hU/ shaM b+hU la/ dzas/ dzas la'ang ngos/ u o mtshams sbyar/ shaM b+ha waHshaM b+hU lA/ A ma/ a ma lA snga ma 'os/ sha ma b+h+yAM au gong dang 'dra bas/ shaM b+hU shaM b+hU la shas/
72a2(sgra skor): dang po dag la zhes dang / de yang shas kyi na zhes pas/ shaM b+hAn/ shaM b+hU la/ D+hA bud med ma yin pa lA/ Ang gi nA'o zhes pas/ shr-i b+hU nA/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig shAM b+hU b+h+yAM/ shaM b+h+yo b+haHshaM b+hU la/ de/ g+h+r-i'i nga 'gro ba la so zhes
72a3(sgra skor): pas u o mtshams sbyar/ sham b+ha wa/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ shi b+hU b+h+yAM/ shaM b+hU b+h+yaHshaM b+hU la/ nga si g+hI'i nga 'gro ba zhes dang / nga si/ ngas dgu gi zhes pa'i mangs/ sham b+hiHshaM b+hu b+h+yAM/ shaM b+hu b+h+yaHshaM b+hu la/
72a4(sgra skor): ngas byin/ nga si'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ shaM b+hoHshAM b+h+yoHshaM b+hu nAM/ shaM b+hu laM/ ngi/ g+h+rA'i ata yang ngos/ shaM b+ho/ shaM b+h+yAMHshaM b+hu Shu/ bod tshig/ he naM b+h+yAM/ he shaM b+hU/ he shaM b+ha waHrnams grub ste/ spyir btang u
72a5(sgra skor): thung mtha' can shaM b+hu'i sgra dang i thung mtha' can ha ri'i skabs rnams dbyangs mi 'dra ba'i 'gyur khya phran bu ma gtogs cho ga khyad par med do// bi b+hU/ bA yu/ b+hU nA la sogs te skyes pa'i rtags sbyor btang u thung
72a6(sgra skor): mtha' can thams cad 'di dang 'dra'o// u thung mtha' can gyi nang tshan/ krod+b+ha'i cho ga spyir btang dang dung mi 'dra ste/ kroh+mA la/ haHpo su/ tri dzA ta kreSh+TuH/ rlu.au kroSh+Ta'i tr-i tsa bzhin no// kroSh+TA zhes pa'i sgra ni so
72b1(sgra skor): bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i rnam dbye dang po'i su nas/ gnyis pa'i oTa'i bar thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes brda chad byas pa/ de rnams pha rol tu byung na kr-ita kyi rkyen tr-i tsa'i mtha' can dang bya ba 'dra bas rtags mtha'i u de r-ir 'gyur te/
72b2(sgra skor): kreSh+Ti/ su/ ri du sha na s+phu ra daM shoHne ha sAM tsa/ r-ita u sha nas pu ra daM shras/ a ne has rnams kyi yang ngo // rtags raMta mtha' rnams dang u sha nas/ pu ra daM shas/ a ne hAs rnams kyi rtags mtha' ni saM bud+d+hi ma yin po'i
72b3(sgra skor): su waM a nang du 'gyur te/ na'i a dbang 'gro ba yin pas phyis/ saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i zhes pa'i mangs u pa d+ha ring por song / ha la dI A pa zhes pas su phyis/ ming mtha'i na dbye'os na phyis pas/ kroSh+Ta/ kroSh+Tu la/ dang
72b4(sgra skor): oM dang dzas/ gnyis pa'i aM dang oT rnams byin/ r-i tau ngi sarba nA mas+thi na yo/ rita kyi tI thams cad gnas pa'i ming can dag laso// rtags r-ita mtha' can las rnam dbye thams cad gnos pa'i ming can rnams dang rnam
72b5(sgra skor): dbye bdun pa'i ngi pha rol la rtags mtha' yon tan du 'gyur te/ ri ar du bsgyur/ ab+h+r-in+taM tsa sra sr-i nap+l-i neSh+TaM twAShAM k+Sha tr-i ho tr-i pra shasl-i NAM/ a pa[:]tr-in tr-itsa swa sr-i nap+to[:]niSh+TaM[:]traSh+TaM k+Sha tr-i[:]ho tr-i po tr-i pa shas+t+r-i rnams kyi'o//
72b6(sgra skor): rtags a pa dang kr-ita kyi rkyen tr-in dang tr-i tsa gnyis byin pa'i mtha' dang / rtags sr-i sr-i la sogs pa dgu po ni saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la u pa d+hA ring por 'gyur te/ kroSh+Ta ro//
73a1(sgra skor): kroSh+Ta raHkroSh+Ta raM/ kroSh+Ta rau/ shwas la shaM b+hu dang 'dra bas/ kroSh+TA na/ kroSh+NA la gsum pa'i TA/ bi b+hA ShA tri tI yA di ShA tsi/ gsum pa sogs rnams la atsa la 'das kra'o// kroSh+TA'i sgra la pha rol tu rnam dbye ga sum+ba pa
73a2(sgra skor): sogs te gsum pa'i Te nas/ bdun pa'i os kyi bar itsa thog ma can rnams gang byung yang spyir btang u thung mtha' can shaM b+hu'i skabs kyi bya ba dang / bshad ma thag pa bzhin rtags mtha' rir 'gyur ba'i phyo gos gnyis
73a3(sgra skor): kA thog pas 'dam ka tsan du bya ste/ kroSh+NA/ kroSh+TA nA/ kroSh+Tu b+h+yA/ krony+tsu b+hI/ dra zhi pa la/ kr-iSh+TaM/ kroSh+To wa/ kroSh+Tu b+h+yAM/ kroSh+NA b+h+ya/ kr-iSh+Tu la lnga pa'i/ nga si/ shi b+hu ltar bsgrubs pas/ kroSh+Tor-ir 'gyur ba'i phyogs la/ r-i ta u
73a4(sgra skor): rita las ura'o// rtags r-i ta mtha' can+da la phi rol rnamAM dbyi lnga po'i nga si dang / drug pa'i ngase dag gi au dang rtags mtha'i r-i gnyis 'dus par ur du 'gyur te/ kroSh+Ta/ u re sa?/ zhes pa la/ rAtwo s+ya/ ra las sa'i'o//
73a5(sgra skor): ra yig srog med las pha rol gyi sa yig srog med ni dbye bar bya ste/ sa phyis/ ra rnam bcad byas pas/ kr-iSh+NA b+h+yAm b+h+yas la/ kroSh+NA b+hU/ kroSh+Tu b+h+yaHdrug pa'i ngas yang bya ba lnga pa'i nga si dang 'dra bas/ kroSh+ToHkroSh+Ta
73a6(sgra skor): o sa la/ kroSh+ToHkreD+hAHkrony+dzA la drug pa'i A ma shaM b+hu wAr bsgrubs pas/ kroSh+Ta nAM/ lugs gcig la/ nu ma tsi re tr-i dzA d+d+ha be b+h+yo nuTo/ ra a tsaM la nu ma tr-i tsa bzhin 'gyur pa rnams kyi nuTa'o// rtags mtha' ra yog
73b1(sgra skor): atsa dang ldan pa num A ga ma thob pa rnams dang kroSh+TA tr-i tsA bzhin du 'gyur ba'i pha rol rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshig A ma la nuTA A ga ma nges par 'jug ste/ nuT A ga ma byin pas/ kroSh+Tau NAM/ rnam dbye bdun pa'i bi la/ kroSh+Ta
73b2(sgra skor): kroSh+To/ o sa la/ kroSh+ToHkr-iShoHsu pa la/ kroSh+NA Shu/ bod tshig/ he kr-iSh+TaM/ he kroSh+TA rau/ he kroSh+Ta roHgnyis pa'i shras la yeng na kreSh+TaM na zhes pa 'ang 'byung ngo // de yan gyis skyes po'i rtags kyi u thung mtha' can spyir btang dang don
73b3(sgra skor): bsal rnams bshad zin to// \u0f7fda ni skyes po'i rtags las U ring mtha' can gyis bya ba rnams ston par byed de/ hUM hUM zhes pa'i sgra la dper brjod du bya ste/ dbyangs mi 'dra ba'i 'gyur khyad phran bu ma gtogaso bA ta pra mI dang
73b4(sgra skor): 'dra bas/ hUM hUM la/ rnam dbye dang po rnams byin/ gong ltar gyi tshogs bsgrubs pas/ To hU hUMHhUM hriM/ hUM hAHgnyis pa la/ hUM hUMHhUM hU~MHgsum pa laM/ hUM hUM/ hA hUM b+h+yAM/ hUM hUM b+hiHlta bu ste/ atsa thog ma can rnams la/ u
73b5(sgra skor): war 'gyur/ he la thog ma rnams la bya ba lhag po med pas go bde'o// de bzhin du/ a tau tsa mU la sogs pa spyir btang u ring skyes pa'i rtags thams cad cho go 'di dang 'dra'o// u ring mtha' can kha la pU la su byin/
73b6(sgra skor): kha la pUHkha la pU la/ au/ oHsu pi/ u'i su pa la'o// byings kyi U rnam dbyi nan tu gsos/ dang po'i su nas/ bdun pa'i mang tshig gi pa'i bar gyi atsa thog ma can gang byung yang U dai wa kho nar 'gyur te/ de yang mtha'
74a1(sgra skor): u de'i sngon du yi ge gnyis sam gsum sogs yod pa'i yi ge brtags pa med pa zhig dgos// lA lA pro/ kha la pAHgnyis pa rnams la/ kha la pri/ kha la pr-I/ kha la pAHgsum pa rnams la/ kha la pA/ kha
74a2(sgra skor): l+yA prA b+h+yAM/ kha la prA b+hIHsogs ti bsgrub tshul rigs 'gre'o// su wA la sogs pa yang 'di dang 'dra'o// swa b+hA zhes pa/ sud+d+hi'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ su la swa b+hA rnam da a tsa thog ma can rnams la/ su war 'gyur bas/ skye b+ha
74a3(sgra skor): wo/ sau b+haM wa gnyis pa la/ sab+hA laM/ sab+h+yAM wo/ swa b+hU gsum pa la/ swa b+hU wA/ swe b+h+yA sa sogs pa// kA Ta s+yA/ sA yaM b+h+yAM/ sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o// dzA su d+hI dag la ma yin no//
74a4(sgra skor): pas/ yaNar 'gyur ba ma yin kyang dmigs bsal baR+ShA b+hU zhes pa'i sgra ni b+hU'i mtha' yin kyang yaNar 'gyur te/ su la baR+Sha b+hUHbaR+Sha b+hU la au/ baR+ShA b+hAsh+tsa/ baR+Shi b+hU'i 'ang ngo // bar+N+Na b+hU zhes pa'i sgra 'angs sogs kyi rnam dbyu aH
74a5(sgra skor): thog ma can rnams la yaNar 'gyur te/ U war gyibasgyur bas/ baR+ShA b+haM/ bar+N+Na b+hAHsogs/ kha la pA'i skabs dang 'dri'o// 'grel per/ dr-ig+d+ha/ kA rAM b+hU/ pu na b+hU rna mis kyang baR+Sha b+hU dang 'dra'o zhes byung bas/ 'di
74a6(sgra skor): rnams la yang rnam dbye byin pa'i bya ba thams cad baR+Sha b+hU dang 'dra bas bshad ma theg pa'i tshigs bsgrub pa'o// de ltar u mtha' can las skyes pa'i rtags thal kyis kyi bya ba rnams bshad zin to// da ni skyes
74b1(sgra skor): pa'i rtags ri yig mtha' can gyi cho ga rnams ston par bya ste/ d+ha tr-I la/ su/ r-i tA u shA nas/ pu ru dam shas a ne has rnams kyi yang ngo // zhes pas/ re anang / saM bud+d+hi mA yin pa'i zhes pas u pa d+hA ring po// ha la dI A pa ces
74b2(sgra skor): pasas su phyis/ ming mtha'i na dbyi'os/ na phyis pas/ d+h+r-i tA/ d+hA tri i / la dang po'i au dang dzas/ gnyis pa'i aM dang au rnams byin/ r-ita kyi de thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ngag las so// zhes pas/ r-i a du bsgyur/ a pa tri
74b3(sgra skor): na tr-i tsaM sogs kyi mangs/ u pa d+ha ring po drang / d+hA tA rau/ d+hA tA raHd+hA tA raM[:]d+hA tA rau/ d+hA tr-i ya shas/ dag po dag la snga ma 'dra ba'o dang / de yang shas kyi na skyes pa la 'os/ d+hA twe na/ gsum pa la/ d+hA tA/ d+hA tr-i b+h+yAM/ d+hA tr-i b+hiHbzhi
74b4(sgra skor): pa la/ b+hU tre/ d+hA tr-i b+h+yAM/ d+hA tr-i b+hUHd+hA tr-i/ nga si/ rita las Ur 'o zhes dang / ra las sI'i 'o zhes pas/ d+hA turAd+hU tr-i b+h+yAM/ d+hA tr-i b+h+yaHdrug pa'i gcig tshig kyang nga si ngang 'dre bas/ d+hA tuHes la/ d+hA tr-iHA ma la/ ra aH
74b5(sgra skor): sogs kyis nus/ nA me la 'os rtags mtha' ring po/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ r-i bar+N+Nan+na s+ya Na tAM bA ts+yai/ rI las nA'i Nar brjod do// ra Sha gnyisu ma zad dbyangs r-i'i pha rol gyi na yang Nar 'gyur te/ d+hA tr-i NAM/ bdun pa'i
74b6(sgra skor): ngi la r-i ta kyi ngi thams cad gnas pa zhes pas yon tan/ d+hA ta ri/ d+hA tr-iHd+hA tr-i Shu/ kun tu bod pa'i su la/ r-ita kyi ngi thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes yon tan/ he d+hA taHgnyis tshig dang mang tshig dang po'i skabs
75a1(sgra skor): dang 'dra/ he d+hA tA ro/ hwe d+hA tA raHde bzhin du/ nr-ip+tA/ ho tr-i/ pro tr-i sogs mang po zhig 'di dang 'dra'o// pI tr-i la/ su/ gong bzhin bsgrubs pas/ pi tA/ pi tr-i'i skabs 'dir gzhan cho ga thams cad snga ma d+hU tI'i skabs dang
75a2(sgra skor): 'dra la/ dang po'i au nas gnyis pa'i o'i bar rnams la utsaH/ tsun sreg/ sbyin sreg/ pa d+hA ring por mi 'gyur te/ d+hA tr-i/ zhes pa rkyen tri tsa mtha' cen yin lapr-i tr-i zhes pa tr-i tsa mtha' can ma yin pas so// pa ta ro/ pi ta raHlnga bu'o
75a3(sgra skor): gzhan rnams rigs 'gre'o// dz+nyA mA tr-i/ b+hU tr-i sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o// nr-i tsa/ nr-i'i yang na'o// nr-i zhes pa'i rtags la rnam dbye drug pa'i Am ma gtogs pa'i tr-i'i skabs dang 'dra/ A ma la rtags mtha' ring por 'gyur ba dang mi
75a4(sgra skor): 'gyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ka pa/ tsun Te/ ste/ nr-i NAM 'am/ yang na nr-i NAM lta bu'o// ngo rnams kyis skyes pa'i rtags la r-i yog mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bshang zin to// \u0f7fskabs 'dir r-I ta dang l-itA dang eta rnams kyi mtha'
75a5(sgra skor): can kyi rtags med par gragaso// !o yig mtha' las go'i sgra lnga dper brjod du bya ste/ go to No ta/ go las Ni ta'o// oM mtha' can go lta bu'i pha rol gyi rnam dbye dang po nas gnyis pa'i auTa'i bar sngar thams cad gnas
75a6(sgra skor): pa'i mr-ing can zhes brda chad byas pa de rnams la skabs 'dir Na 'gro ba'i ming can zhes mang 'dogs byed do// go la/ su o dzas rnams/ !Na 'gro ba la a tsa'i 'o zhes pa'i mdos rtags mtha' 'phel ba/ goHgA'o/ gA wa
75b1(sgra skor): gnyis pa'i am dang shus la/ a toHskra so// ota las a ma shas ngag la'o// rtags a yig mtha' can las rnam dbye gnyis pa'i am shas pha rol la rtags mtha' o dang pha rol gyi a 'dus pas U ru 'gyur te/ aH/
75b2(sgra skor): la/ gAM/ o la/ g+hA wo/ shas la/ gA gsum pa rnams la/ ga wA/ go b+h+yAM/ go b+hiHba ni pa rnams la/ ga we/ gau b+h+yAM/ go b+h+yaHlnga pa rnams la/ goHgo b+h+yAM/ go b+hUHdrug pa rnams la/ goHgA g+hoHga wAM/ bdun pa rnam+b+ha
75b3(sgra skor): la/ ga wi/ ga woHga Shu/ bod tshig/ hAM gau/ he gA wo/ he gA waHde bzhin du/ su d+yo sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o// de ltar e mtha' can rnams bshad zin ti// dau ni au yig mtha' can las re'i sgra la dper brjod na/
75b4(sgra skor): la su/ rA yo ha li/ rai'i ha la la'o// ai yig mtha' can rai sgra lta bu'i pha rol tu his/ rnam dbye ha la thog ma can gang byung yang rtags mtha'i ai de A ru 'gyur ro// rAHrA yau/ rA yaHgnyis gas ma na/ pa rnams la/ rA yaM/
75b5(sgra skor): rA yau/ rA yAHgsum pa rnams la/ rA yA/ rA b+h+yAM/ rA b+hiHbzhi pa rnams la/ rA ye/ rA b+h+yAM/ rA b+h+yAMHlnga pa rnams la/ rA yaHrU b+h+yAM/ rA b+hAHdrug pa rnams la/ rA ya/ rA yo rA yAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ rA yi/ rA yoHrA su/ bod
75b6(sgra skor): tshig la/ ha rAHha rA yau/ he rA yaHo yig mtha' can glo zhes pa'i sgra la dper brjod bya ste/ atsa thog ma can rnams la au A war 'gyur/ ha la thog ma can rnams la bya ba lhag po med pas/ rnam dbye dang po rnams la/
76a1(sgra skor): o grA wo/ glA waHgnyis pa la/ glA waM/ glA wo/ b+hA waHgsum pa la/ grA wA/ klo d+h+waMH b+hiHsogs so// la sogs pa rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o// i tI pA Ni ni b+hu ka ra Na s+yA su tra da dz+ran+ta burlid+hAs+thA ma bUd+dA
76a2(sgra skor): zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka rA Ni'i mdo las a tsa'i mtha' can+da skyes pa'i rtags rnams rdzog so// de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra NA gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin brisu bkod pa legs
76a3(sgra skor): bshad ner bu 'dren pa'i shing rti'i zhes bya ba las skyes pa'i rtags atsa mtha' can rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// / da ni bud kyi rtag las a tsa mtha' can gyi cho
76a4(sgra skor): ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ rA mA la/ su/ ha li dApe A pa ring po sogs kyi su phyis/ ra mA/ rA mA la// o/ au nga A paHo'i A pa las so// bud med kyi rtags A pa kyi mtha' can las rnam dbye dang po'i gnyis tshig o dang / gnyis
76a5(sgra skor): pa'i gnyis tshig o gnyis ni tsa[]/ shI ru 'gyur te/ sha 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis mtshams sbyor bas/ ra mAM/ ra mA las dzas dang po dag la zhes pas/ ra mAHrA mA la/ kun tu bod pa'i su/ saM bud+d+ho tsa/ saM bud+d+hi la yang ngo //
76a6(sgra skor): A pa mtha' can ni saM bud+d+hi pha rol la er 'gyur te/ rtags mtha' e/ thung ngu eng sogs kyis saM bud+d+hi phyis pas/ he ra me/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gong dang 'dra ste/ he ra me/ he ra mAHra mA la/ au/ am la snga ma 'os/
76b1(sgra skor): ramAM/ au la/ ra me/ shas la dang po dag gi zhes pas/ ra mAHra mA la/ gsum pa TA/ A ngi tsa pAHApa kyi Ang la'ang ngo // rta Da Apa mtha' can ni Ang ste rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA dang yang gi sgras drug pas dang bdun pa'i as d+ha
76b2(sgra skor): pa rol la rtags mtha' aM ru 'gyur te/ rtags mtha' ai mtsham sbyar/ ra ma yA/ b+h+yAM b+his la/ ra mA b+hUHra mA b+hiHra mA la/ ngi/ yA TA paHA pa las yATa'o// rtogs Apa kyi mtha' las pha rol tu nga 'gro ba'i ming can gyi rnam
76b3(sgra skor): dbye rnams byung na yAT A ga ma 'jug go/ ra mA yA/ e/ A Tash+tsa/ AT las 'ang ngo // yAT lta bu A ga mtha' can gyi A ga ma byung ba de pha rol a tsa thog ma ran dang phrad na 'phel bar 'gyur te/ ra mA yaM/ dz+yA b+h+yaHla/ ra mU b+h+yAM/
76b4(sgra skor): ra mA b+h+yaHlnga pa'i/ nga si/ yAT byin gong ltar bsgrubs pas/ r-i mA yA ra mA b+h+yAM/ ra mA b+h+yaHdrag pa la/ ra mA yAHra mA yoHra ma NAMHbdun pa'i/ di yAT/ bi'iri A ma na dI A pa nA rnams las sos// di A ma/ ro mA yAM/ aisaM
76b5(sgra skor): ra ma N+Do rA mA su/ de bzhin du/ gong+ga/ durbA/ am+b+ho/ kA sogs mang po 'di dang 'dra'o// mo rtags sarbA'i sgra la/ rnam dbye dang po rnams dang / bod tshag rnams dang / gnyis pa rnams bshang ma thag par mAM dang 'dra/ sar+b+baHsarbe/
76b6(sgra skor): sarbAHhaM sarbe/ haM sarbAHsarbA/ sarbe/ sarbA \u0f7f ba pa/ yi/ rig ga ci la/ gsum pa yang 'dra bas/ rbA yA/ sar+b+ba b+h+yAM/ sarbA b+hiHsarbA la/ ngi/ yarba nAma? prA TA swash+tsa/ sarba nA ma las swaT ste thu 'ang ngo // sarba'i ming can
77a1(sgra skor): A pa mtha' rnams las pha rol tu rnam smye 'gro ba rnams byung na sAT+Ta sA ga ma 'jug cing rtags mtha' thu ngur 'gyur// sarba s+t+waM/ b+h+rUM b+h+ya sa la/ sar+b+bats+tsha/ sar+b+ba b+h+yaHnga si la/ sarba sUHsar+b+ba b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hUHdrag
77a2(sgra skor): pa la/ sarba swAHsarba yoHsar+b+ba sAM/ bdun pa la/ sarba s+t+waM/ sarba yo sar+b+be su/ de bzhin du/ bid+hi thA la sogs pa rnams kyang rigs 'gre'o// ud+d+ha ra pUd+h+waM nas pa la rnam dbyu 'gro ba rnams ma gtogs serbA dang 'dre/ nga 'gro ba rnam
77a3(sgra skor): la ra ma'i skabs dang sarbA'i skabs gnyis kar gyi bya ba 'jug pas 'dam ka can no// a uSh+ka ra pU rbA/ ut+tA ra pArbe ut+ta ra pU dzAHha~M ud+d+hi raM pUr+the/ he ut+ta ra paurbaM/ he ung+gi ra pUrtA gnyis pa rnams la/ ud+ha ra pU r+thaM/
77a4(sgra skor): sut+tA ra pUrbaM/ ut+ta ra prAd+b+h+yAMHgsum pa rnams la/ ud+h+ya pUrba yA/ ut+tA rA pUrbA b+h+yAM/ ut+tA ra pUrbA b+hI ut+tA raM pUrba laM/ dza/ bi b+h+r-iSh+Ta di kaM sa mA saM ba tu br-i ho// 'bru mang po'i tshig stong la phyogs la 'dam ka'o// phyogs kyi
77a5(sgra skor): 'bru mang po'i tshig sdud bris pa A pa mtha' can ni rnamo b+h+ring 'gro 'i ma tsanI rnams lA sar+b+ba'i skabs ltar smr-iT A grA ma b+hini/ rtags mtha' tha~M den byung po dang / ra ma'i skabs lngar yA Ta ster ba 'dam ka can no// sa
77a6(sgra skor): ra b+huHsraM/ su b+ha hrI dz+wa la~M/ su d+he pUHdz+dza/ ut+tar pU T+Tab+h+ya/ sogs so// bai Sh+T+ri Sha dzA tAl rmAn+tu/ dzA trA~M yA tra~M s+t+waM dzas las 'das ka'o// dri tri yI hriM dz+wa la gnyis la 'di rnam dbying 'gro ba rnams la
77b1(sgra skor): swaT dam ka can te/ dper na/ bzhi pa'i de la/ dI tI yA ye/ dwi tri ya s+ye/ tr-i tI ya yai/ tr-I tI ya s+yAM/ lta bu'o// am+b+ha zhes pa yang saM bud+d+hi ma gtogs rnam dbye thams cad ra mA'i skabs dang 'dra/ saM bud+d+hi la nung mi 'dra ste/ am+b+ha la/ saM bud+d+hi/
77b2(sgra skor): am+bAR+Wa na d+yoHhra swaHam+ba'i don na dI rnams kyi thung ngu'o// am+b+hi'i sgra dang na dA'i ming can rnams saM bub+d+hi pha rol la rtags mtha' thung ngur 'gyur te/ he am+ba/ ak+ka dang / al+lA yang 'di dang 'dra'o// 'grel par/ am+b+hi'i don can
77b3(sgra skor): kyang de phan gyi rkyen Da dang / la dang / ka gnas pa de la mo rtag su bsgrub pa'i rkyen pa Ta pa byin pa lnga bu la saM bud+d+ha la yang thung ngur mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ dper na/ ni tsun la/ 'bigs byed lta la/ Am+ma DA la/ saM bud+d+hi byin thung ngur mi 'gyur/
77b4(sgra skor): ra mA dang 'dra bas/ he am+b+ha De/ de bzhin du/ te am+bA le/ haM oM mI ke/ lta bu'o// dza rA zhes paSh+Ti s+tha la rnam dbye hwa la thog ma n+dan rnams lA ra mI'i skabs dang 'dra/ atsa thog ma can rnams la dza rA hid dze ras zhes par 'gyur
77b5(sgra skor): ba dang rA mA'i skabs gnyis padam ka can du bya ste/ rnam dbye dang po rnams laM/ dza rA na/ dza ra sau/ dza ra saM/ bong tshig la/ he dza re/ he dza ra so// he dza rA saHgnyis pa la/ dzaM r+ra saM/ dza ra sau/ dza ra saHgrasum pa lA/ dza ra sA/ dza ra
77b6(sgra skor): dza rA b+hiHba ni pa la/ dza ra se/ dza rA b+h+yAM/ dza rA b+h+yaHlnga pa la/ dza ra sa/ dza rA b+h+yAM/ dza rA b+h+yAMHdrug pa la/ dza rA saHdza ra soHdza ra sAM/ bdun pa la/ dza ra si/ dza ra soHdza ra su/ 'di rnams dza rasu 'gyur ba'i phyogs yin la/ ra mA
78a1(sgra skor): dang 'dra ba'i skabs kyi dper brjod go bde bas ma bkod do// nA saM ka zhes pa rnam dbye dang po rnams dang / kun tu bod pa'i don can rnams dang / rnams dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig rnams rA mA'i skab
78a2(sgra skor): dang 'dra/ shas nas brtsams te/ shas la sogs pa rnams la pad+ma tad nas zhes pa'i mdos/ nAM si kA nas zhes par 'gyur bas/ shas la/ nasaHgsum pa rnams la/ na sA/ no b+h+yAM/ no b+hiHbzhi pa la/ na se/ nob+h+yAM/
78a3(sgra skor): no b+h+yaHlnga pa la/ na saHno b+h+yAM/ no b+hu/ drug pa la/ na saHna so/ na sAM/ bdun pa la/ na sau/ na soHna sU/ ni sha/ zhes pa'ang su nas shas kyi baR+Sha ra mA dang 'dra/ shas nas bzung ste/ shas la sogs pa rnams zhes
78a4(sgra skor): pi'i mdos/ ni shA/ ni shra ru 'gyurA/ shas la/ ni shaHTA la/ ni sh+tsa/ nai sha la/ b+h+yAM/ brash+tsa b+has+t+ra sr-i dza mr-i dzi ya dza rA dza b+hA dza tsha shI She/ bra byA b+hAs+t+ra sr-i dza mr-i dza ya dza rA dza b+hA dza tsha sha rnams kyi Sha'o// prash+tsa sogs bdun dang /
78a5(sgra skor): tshA dang shA srog med mong mtha' yon pa de dz+hal sa sor bsdu ba'i yi ga gang+gA ma ya Sh+NA r-i 'gyur ro// dz+nyA sha le dz+wA la rnams kyi dza ga rnams so zhes pas Sha Da drangs/ naid+b+h+yAM/ nid+d+hiHbzhi pa la/ ni kinId+b+ha/ nIn+naHlnga pa
78a6(sgra skor): ni shaHnir+N+NaM/ nir+N+NaHdrug pa la/ ni shaHnau shoHni shaM/ bdun pa'i ngi dang os la/ ni shi/ nA rishiHni shaM/ su/ shai Sha/ Sha Da/ Da las sa la b+huTa'o// zhes pas/ d+huT I ga maM/ khar la tsar 'o zhes pas/ d+ha te/ Na/
78b1(sgra skor): n+te/ mU sa pra tA nA rnams kyang rnam bye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la ra mA dang 'dra/ shes nas bzung 'dam ka can te/ 'grel par ma sa pr-i ta nA sA nu rnams kyi mas pr-ita s+thA rnamasu yang na'o zhes pa byung b+ha/
78b2(sgra skor): rnam dbye shas sogs pha rol la/ mAM sa/ ni/ mAM sa/ pr-I ta nA/ ni/ prita/ sA nu ni/ sU rnamasu yang na 'gyuraro// shas la/ mAM sa/ D+ha la/ mAM sA/ b+h+yAM b+his gnyis la/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi'o/ zhes pas sa phyis/ mAM dz+dza/ maM
78b3(sgra skor): b+hiHsogs so// de bzhin du/ pr-itaHpr-i tA/ br-id+b+h+yAM/ pr-id+d+hiHsogs so// snA ni 'chang 'gyur d+he nA dang 'dra'o// bi hA pA dang / gau pA sogs rA mA dang 'dra'o// de/ rnams kyis bud med du brjod pa a ring mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bsten
78b4(sgra skor): zin to// Dad ni mo rtags au thung mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bshad par byaM ste/ ma ti/ sr-i/ ma taMHmA ti la/ o/ dang po dag gi zhes pas/ mA tAM/ ma tI dzAs/ dzas la 'angangos// ma ta yaHmo ti/ a mA/ a lam+b+ha
78b5(sgra skor): ma zhes pas/ ma ti/ o la/ ma tI ma ti/ shas dang po dag gi mdos/ ma tAM// ma tau/ TA/ 'dir bud med kyi rtags yin pas D+hA nar mi 'gyur/ ma d+hA/ ma ti b+h+yAM/ ma ti d+hiHma ti la/ nge/ ngi ti hra sAsh+tsa/ nga 'gro ba la thunga'i yang naH
78b6(sgra skor): bud med du brjod pa'i oM u thung ngu rnams dang / oM ya yul thob pa'i sI rang A ring rnams kyang rnam dbye ba 'gro ba rnams pha rol la na di ming can gyi cho ga rnams yang na bar bya ste/ Ar+g+ha tsaHna dI las aTa'o// bud med
79a1(sgra skor): rtags na dI'i ming can las rnam dbye nga 'gro ba rnams la AT A gA ma ster ro// ma ti la yang na bar byas pas/ mA t+yaM/ ma ta ye/ ma ti b+h+yAM/ ma ti b+h+yaHlnga pa'i nga si la 'dam kA/ ma t+yA/ ma teHma tAM b+h+yAM/ ma ti b+h+yaHdrug
79a2(sgra skor): pa la'ang / ma t+yaHma taHma t+yoHma tI nAM/ ngi la/ ma tr-i/ ma to/ ma t+yoHma ti Shu/ bod tshig/ he ma te/ he ma tI/ he ma ta yaHshru tI/ smr-i tI/ bud+d+hi rnams 'di dang 'dra'o// tr-i la dzas/ tr-i tsa tu roHs+t+ri ya ti sr-i tsa ta sr-i/ tr-i tsa tur dgo gi bud
79a3(sgra skor): med la ti sr-i tsa te sr-i ngag go/ gsum gyi skad dod tri dang / bzhi'i skad dod tsa tur gnyis ni mo rtags kyi skabs rnam dbye pha rol la tr-i ni/ Nan giH/ ti sr-i dang / tsa tur ni/ tsa ta sr-i zhes par 'gyur ro// tI sr-i/ dza sa/ tsa ta sr-i/ dzas/ a tse ra
79a4(sgra skor): taHr-i ta kyi a tsa la ra'o// ti sr-i tsi ta sr-i zhes r-i ti mthar 'gyur ba'i r-ita de nAm dbyi atsa thog ma can rnam la ra sgrog med du 'gyur ro// ti sra d+hA tsa te sr-i[:]shas la/ ti sraHtsa tA srar+NataM sr-i b+haM/ tsa tA sr-i b+hauHbzhi pa lnga pa gnyis la/ ti sr-i b+ha
79a5(sgra skor): nAta sr-i b+h+yaHdrug pa'i AmA la/ ra a tsa zheswA pA'i mdzes/ nAT+Tan tAM s+yai ts+tsha ta sr-i/ ti s+tho tsa ta sr-i dag la ma yin no// spyir btang nI la rtags mtha' ring po thob kyang dmigs bsal ti sr-i dang / tsa ta sr-i dag nAM pha rol la ring por 'gyur ba
79a6(sgra skor): yin te/ ti sr-i NAM/ tsa ta sr-i NAM/ bdun pa la/ ti sre Shu/ tse ta sr-i Shu/ bong tshig la/ ho ti sraHhe tsa ta sraHpri ya d+hi sa sa zhes pa lta bu ming thog ma can la tri/ ti sr-i zhes par mi 'gyur la/ rnam dbye yang mang tshig tu ma zang thams cad
79b1(sgra skor): 'jug ste/ cho ga yang skyes pa'i rtags ha ri'i skabasu bshad pa dang 'dra la/ nA dang shas nar mi 'gyu ro// de bzhin du/ pri ya tsa tur zhes pa yang / tsa ta sr-ir mi 'gyur te/ dper brjod rgyas pa 'og tu 'byung ngo // yang skabs 'gar mong dang
79b2(sgra skor): bo can la yang / ti sr-i/ tsa ta sr-i/ zhes par 'gyur ba'ang sring ngo // zhes 'grel par bshad do// dI'i sgra la/ tad so[]/ kyai rnam dbye la A/ a la bud med du brjod pa'i TA pa sbyar bas dA zhes grub/ de la rnam dbye rnams kyi gnyis
79b3(sgra skor): tshig rnams byin/ ra mA ltar bsgrubs pas/ oM gnyis la/ dwe/ b+huM gsum la/ dwA b+h+yAM/ os gnyis la/ dA yoHde yan gyis bu med kyi rtags i thung mtha' can rnams kyi bya ba bshad zin to// da ni mo rtags I ring gi cho ga
79b4(sgra skor): rnams ston par bya ste/ go rI la/ su/ ha la dI zhes pas su phyis/ gau rI/ o dang / dza se la/ gan+d+ho/ gaur+g+hAHyUs+t+rA khyau na dI/ I I bud med brjod pa dag na dI'o// I ring dang u ring bud med du brjod pa rnams dA'i ming can zhes bya'o//
79b5(sgra skor): go rI la/ saM budz+dzi su/ am+b+ha'i don na dI rnams kyi thung ngu'o zhes rtags mtha' thung ngur 'gyur/ ing thung du/ zhes pas saM bud+d+hi phyis/ he gau ri/ he goR+YoHhwe gor+b+baHgau rI la/ a ma/ aM la sdo ma 'os/ go r-I/ au lal/ go ts+tsha/ shas la/
79b6(sgra skor): gdang po dag gi zhes pas/ go rIHgsum pa rnams la/ gauR+YA/ gau rI b+h+yAM/ go rI b+hiHbzhi pa'i de la/ na dI las ATa'o zhes pas/ A Ta A ga maM/ kaR+ShI/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas la/ go rI b+h+yAM/ go rI b+h+yaHnga si la/ gor+m+maHb+h+yAM b+h+yaHla/ gau ri b+h+yAM/
80a1(sgra skor): go rI b+h+yaHngas la yang / gon+mAHos la/ gauR+YoHA la/ thung du na dI zhes pas/ nuT/ go rI NAM/ di la/ gon+d+he/ o sa la/ gauts+tshaHsu pa la/ go rISh+Ta/ b+hA nI/ na dI la sogs mAng ba zhig 'di dang 'dra'o//
80a2(sgra skor): lak+Sh+mI zhes/ dIpa kyi rjes ma yin dA sa/ su mi dbyi ste/ lam+b+hiHgzhan ma rnams gau r-I dang 'dra'o// twA nI dang / tan+ti yang / lam+bi dang 'dra'o// s+t+rI zhes pa'i sgra la su/ su phyis/ s+t+ri sti/ tsun can te Ta au/ s+t+ri yAHs+t+rI'i 'o// rnam du
80a3(sgra skor): gnyis pa'i gcig tshig am dang mang tshig shas dag pha rol la sti'i i yar yang na 'gyur te/ s+t+ri yaM/ yang na a ma la snga ma 'os/ stAM/ o la/ s+t+ri yau/ shwas/ bshad ma theg pa'i mangs/ s+t+ri yaHyang na dang po dag
80a4(sgra skor): gi zhes pas/ s+t+rI[:]gsum pa la/ s+t+ri yA/ s+t+rI b+h+yAM/ s+t+rI b+hiHde la/ AT dang / i ya/ s+t+ri yAM/ sti d+hA ma/ s+t+rI b+h+yaHlnga pa la/ s+t+ri yAHs+t+ri b+h+yA ma/ s+t+ri b+h+yAHdrug pa la/ s+t+ri yAHb+hI yoHs+t+ri NAM/ bdun pa la/ sI yAM/ s+t+ri yoHs+thiT/ d+hIHla su
80a5(sgra skor): shrIHshI la/ oM dang dzasaM/ atsa la shU bying saM b+h+r-i rnams kyi zhes pa'i mdos i ya/ shri yaM/ shri yai shrI la saM bud+d+hi byin/ kr-I/ su/ nai ya du wang s+thA nA waMstAM/ s+t+rI ma yin pa'i i ye uwe gnas pa dag ma yi no// /
80b1(sgra skor): s+t+ri ma yin pa zhes s+t+rI'i sgra ni i ya u war 'gyur yang na dI'i ming can yin la/ sti ma yin pa i ya uwa gnas pa ste/ I I yar 'gyur ba dang A uwar 'gyur ba rnams bud med du brjod pa'i skabs 'dir yang na nA dI'i
80b2(sgra skor): ming can ma yin te/ skabs 'dir shrI yang / na dA ming can ma yin pas saM bud d+hi dbyi ba dang rtags thung ngur 'gyur ba segs mi byed/ hi shrIHhe shri yo/ haM shri yaHgnyis pa rnams la/ shr-i yaM/ shri yaHshri yaHgsum pa la/ shri
80b3(sgra skor): yA/ shrI b+h+yAM/ shrI b+hiHshrI laHde/ spyir btang i ya u wa thob pa rnams bud med du brjod pa'i skabs na dI'i ming can ma yin no zhes bkag kyang dmigs bsal/ nga 'gro ba la thung ngu'i yang na'o zhes pa'i 'grel par/ I U dag kyang
80b4(sgra skor): yang na bar bshad pas/ rnam dbye nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la na dI'i ming can gyi bya ba ltar AT ster ba dang I ya u war 'gyur ba gnyis ka thob pas/ shri ye/ shri yaM/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaHla/ shrI b+h+yAM/ shrI b+h+yaHlnga pa'i nga si la/ shri ya
80b5(sgra skor): shrI yAHb+h+yAm b+h+yaHla/ shrI b+h+yAM/ shrI b+h+yaHdrug pa'i ngas laM/ shri ya shre yAHos la/ shri yaiHshrI lA/ Ama?/ bA mi/ A ma la yang na'o// i la uwa thob pa rnams rnam dbye drug po'i Am pa rolA la ni dAM'i ming can yang na'o//
80b6(sgra skor): yI/ na dI'i ming can ldar na/ thung ngu ni dI'o zhes pas/ nuT/ shI NAM/ bdun pa'i ngi la/ kr-i yAM/ shri yi/ os dang su pa la/ shri yoHshrI Shu/ su dz+dza2sa la sogs pa yang 'di dang 'dra'o// pra d+hIts+tsha7/ zhes pa'i sgra mo rtags la
81a1(sgra skor): yang cho ga thams cad skyes pa'i skabasu bshad pa dang khyad par med do// de rnams kyi bud med kyi rtags las I ring mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bstan zin to// nAd na mo rtag smra u thung mtha' can rnams/
81a2(sgra skor): brjod par bya ste/ d+h+ye nu la/ su tad+he nuHau la/ dang po dag gi zhes pas/ d+he mAHd+he no/ dzas/ dzas la'ang ngos/ d+ha nA baHgnyis pa rnams la/ d+he nu/ am/ a ma la snga pA zhes pas/ d+he nuM/ d+he nu/ au/ d+hu nU/ d+he nu/ shasaM/ dang
81a3(sgra skor): po dag gi mangs/ ad+h+we nUHgsum pa rnams la/ d+he nu n+tu/ D+hA nAr mi 'gyur/ d+hi nA/ d+he nu b+h+yAM/ d+he nu b+hiHbzhi pa lA/ d+h+waM nu/ daM de 'gro ba la bruMng prAR+Shi yAng na 'os/ d+he nAM/ d+h+ye nA we/ d+hu nu b+h+yAM/ dz+ha nu b+h+yaHlnga pa'i nga si la/ d+he nAHd+he na/
81a4(sgra skor): b+huM b+h+yAs 'dra/ drug pa'i ngas la/ d+h+we naHd+h+we noHo sa laM/ d+hai nAMHAm la/ d+he nA nA/ bdun pa'i ngi la/ d+he nAM/ d+he no/ oMs la/ d+h+waM nAHd+he nu Sh+Ta/ tshig rnams la/ he d+he no/ he d+he nU/ hit+taM nA wa rnams grub ste atsa mig
81a5(sgra skor): gcig pa'i 'gyur khyad phran tsam ma gtogs gong du bshad pa ma ti'i skabs dang 'dra'o// ta nu la sogs pa yang 'di dang 'dra'o// u thung mtha' can kroSh+NA la bshang ma thag pa dang bya ba mi 'dra ste/ s+t+rI yAM tsa/ bud med la
81a6(sgra skor): 'ad do// kloD+hA'i sgra ni bud med kyi rtags la tr-i tsa bdaM na ri mthar 'gyur bas/ kroSh+Tau 'gyur/ sa wa ka/ rin+ne b+h+yo dI pa/ ri ta na rnams las dIpa'o// rtags r-ita mtha' can rnams dang na mtha' can rnams la bud med du bsgrub pa'i
81b1(sgra skor): rkyen dpe 'gyur te/ dI pa byin/ kroSh+NI zhes par 'gyu ro// cho ga thams cad star mo rtags I ring skabasu bshad pa'i go r-I dang 'dra'o// de rnams kyis u thung mtha' can mo rtags kyi cho ga bstan zin to// ni mo rtags A ri
81b2(sgra skor): mtha' can rnams kyi bya ba brjod par bya ste/ ba dz+yA/ su/ ba d+h+yAHo dang / rjes/ ba d+h+r-iHba d+haHba d+hu la/ sau bud+d+hi/ su/ am+ma'i don na dI rnams kyi thung 'os/ rtags mtha' thung ngur 'gyur// eng thung zhes pas su phyis/ he ba d+hu/
81b3(sgra skor): ba d+hau/ he ba d+hAHba d+hu lau/ am/ aM la sngon []/ ma'i 'os/ ba d+hu/ o la ba d+hau/ shas la/ dang po ngag gi mdos/ be d+huHgsum pa rnams la/ ba d+hA/ ba d+hu b+hUm/ ba d+hu b+hiHngi la/ ba d+h+waM/ ba d+hu b+h+yAM/ ba d+hA b+h+yaHnga sau la/ ba d+h+yAHb+h+yAM
81b4(sgra skor): b+h+yas 'dra/ ngas la yang / ba d+hAHos la/ ba d+hoHA ma la/ thung du na dI zhes pas nAT/ ba d+hu nAM/ ngi la/ ba dz+nyA/ os la/ ba d+hoHsub lA/ ba d+hA Sh+Ta rnams grub ste go rI'i skabs dang 'dra'o// de bzhin du/ tsai mA la sogs pa rnams
81b5(sgra skor): kyang 'di dang 'dra'o// b+hU zhes pa'i sgra 'di bya ba thams cad shrI'i skabs dang 'dra/ saM bud+d+hi li thung ngur byed pa dang mi byed pA 'dam ka yin pas/ haM b+h+yAM/ he b+h+r-iHpu na r+N+Na zhes pa gzhan cho ga thams cad gso ga be d+hu dang 'dra/ drug pa'i
81b6(sgra skor): Am la/ e kA dzu t+ta gal sa dkar pa de NaHrjes ma'i tshig e tsa gcig pa la Na'o// rnam dbye tshig sdud kyis bsdus pa'i ming snga mar Sha 'am ra lta bu na Nar 'gyur mar yang lu dag pa'i rgyu mtshan can yod na de'i rjes mi'i tshig aH
82a1(sgra skor): gcig pa ste dbyangs gcig las med pa de bar na yod kyang na Nar 'gyu ro// pu nap+tAN+Da lta bu'o// bar+m+ma b+hU la/ su/ baR+Sha b+hUHau dang / dzas/ baR+Sha b+hash+tsa/ paR+Sha b+hU'i 'ang ngo // baR+ShA b+hU zhes pa'i sgra nI rnam dbye dbyangs thag
82a2(sgra skor): ma can gang mthong yang yaNar 'gyur re// baR+Ya b+ho/ baR+ShA b+hAHbod tshag la/ he baR+Sha b+hUHhaM baR+Sha b+h+r-i/ he bauR+Sha b+ha rnam pa dbyi gzhan rnams la'ang atsa thog ma can rnams la u war 'gyu/ nga 'gre ba'i ming can rnams la AT
82a3(sgra skor): ster/ ha la thog ma can rnams la bya ba lhag po med do// swA yaM b+hA zhes pa la/ nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la AT ster/ gzhan skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs bshad pa dang khyad par med do// nga rnams kyis bud med kyi rtags u
82a4(sgra skor): ring rnams kyi cho ga bshang zin to// da ni dmigs bsal r-ita mtha' can ni/ na ShaT swa sra di b+h+yaHswa sr-i sgrogs ShaT rnams las ma yin no// srA sr-i sogs ShaTa'i mong can zhes brda chad byas pa de rnams la bud med du
82a5(sgra skor): bsgrubs pa'i rkyen dIp+ta dang TA pa sogs mi 'jug/ ratA na rnams las dpa'o zhes spyi btang thob kyang mang 'dis bkag pa'o// Sha Da'i ming can na 'di rnams te/ sa sr-i/ di sr-i/ tsa ta sr-i/ nA nA tr-i/ du daM tr-i/ ya tr-i/ mA dr-i/ bdun pa
82a6(sgra skor): 'di rnams la Sha Ta'i ming can zhes bya'o// swa sr-i la/ N+yagasu/ r-ita u sha nas sogs kyi mdos/ r-i a nang / saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa zhes pas u pa b+hU rang po da la dA pe rgyags gsum nam/ ma mag nam zhes pas la su phyis/
82b1(sgra skor): ming mtha'i na dbyi'os/ na phyis/ sA sA/ o dzas/ am au rnams la skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs/ d+hA tr-i la bshad pa'i cho ga dang 'dra bas/ swa sA rau// swa sA raHswa sA ri/ swa sA ro/ shas dang TA nA ra mi 'gyur te bud med kyi rtags yin
82b2(sgra skor): pas so// shas la dang pau ngag gi zhes pa'i mangs/ swa sl-iHTA la/ sA sra/ swa sr-i b+hU/ swa sr-i b+hIHlhag ma rnams kyang d+hA tr-i'i skabs dang 'dra'o// gzhan laTa'i ming can bdun po thams cad tshi ga 'di khe nas rigs 'gre'o// de rnams
82b3(sgra skor): kyis r-ita mtha'i bya ba rnams bstan zin to// bud med kyi rtags o yi ga mtha' can skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabasu bshad pa'i go'i skabs dang 'dra/ ai yig mtha' can rnams rai sgra dang 'dra o yig mtha' can rnams glau zhes
82b4(sgra skor): pa'i skabasu bshod pa dang 'dra ste/ mdor na o mtha' dang aM mtha' dang o mtha' can rnams skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabasu pa shad pa'i cho gA kho na las spros pa med do// i ti pi Ni ni bA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA da dzan+ta s+t+ri ling+ga swa mAp+tA
82b5(sgra skor): zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Ni'i mdo las a tsa'i mtha' bud med kyi rtags rnams rdzogs so// / de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni bya ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod
82b6(sgra skor): sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshang nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ a tsa'i mtha' can bud med kyi rtags rnams kyi tshig sbyor btang dmigs bsal dang bcas par rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs//
83a1(sgra skor): da ni atsa'i mtha' can ma ning gi rtags rnams bshad par bya ste/ spyir btang u thung mtha' tsan dz+nyA na zhes pa'i sgra la dbyer brjod bya ste/ dz+nyA na/ su u tanyamA Ata las a ma'o// ma naM r+m+ma
83a2(sgra skor): 'ung gi mtha'i pha rol tu rnam dbye dang ba'i su dang gnyis pa'i a ma nr-i am du 'gyur// skye som/ A me lo snga ma'o zhes pas/ dzAn+na dz+nyAnA~M/ oMn bu sa kon+te/ ma ne la 'ang ngo // ma ning gi rtags lnga nam dpyod pa pa
83a3(sgra skor): au dang gnyis pa'i oM nI shrI zhes par 'gyur la de la d+ha'i ming can zhes brda ched ngo // mi sh+tsi/ ya s+ye tiH/ gang gi It+pa la'ang oM yog b+ha'i mad can da de phan gyi rkyen rnams la rtags mtha'i a yAM ga dang
83a4(sgra skor): yig dbyi'o zhes pas spyir btang a dbyi ba theg kyang dmigs bsal 'grel par gzhan nas lung drangs te/ oM shrIr 'gyur b+hA la a dbyi ba ma yin no// zhes pa byung bas a maM dbyi mtshams stor// dz+nyA ne/ dz+nyA nA
83a5(sgra skor): la/ dza so/ dza shwa so/ shir+tho dzas shas da gi shi'o// ma ning gi rtags pha rol rnam dbye dang po'i dzas dang gnyis pa'i shas ni shi zhes par 'gyur ro// shrI sarba nA mAs+t+r-i naM/ shaM thams cad gnas pa'i mang can no//
83a6(sgra skor): dzas dang shas shi zhes par 'gyur ba de la thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed do// na puM sa ka s+ya dz+ha la tsa/ ma ning gi dz+wa la a tsa'i 'o// ma ning gi rtags dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang /
83b1(sgra skor): atsa'i mtha' las thams cad gnas pa'i ming can pha rol la num A ga ma ster ro// u brjod don/ ma ni ma 'gro ba atsa'i mtha' la pha rol zhes pa'i don/ saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa thams cad gnas pa'i ming can la yang
83b2(sgra skor): ngo zhes pas/ u pa d+hA ring por bsgyur/ dz+nyA nA ni/ gnyis pa rnams la'ang sgrub tshul dang gzugs gnyis ka 'dra bas/ dz+nyA naM/ dz+nyA ne/ dz+nyA nA nI/ saM bud+d+ha la/ eng thung zhes saM bud+d+hi phyis/ he dz+nyA nA/ he dz+nyA ne/ he dz+nyA nA ni/ rnam bye
83b3(sgra skor): lhag ma thams cad skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabasu bshad pa'i rA mA'i skabs dang 'dra'o// de bzhin du/ d+ha nu/ ba na/ pa la/ la sogs mang po zhig 'di ngang 'dra'o// ka ta ra sogs li suM dang a ma la bya ba mi 'dra ste/ an+sa ta r-I
83b4(sgra skor): daM b+h+yaHpas+ya b+h+yaHDa ta ra sogs lnga rnams las a da Da'o// mi ning gi rtags kyi skab su Da ta ra'i mtha[] la can/ ka ta ra dang / ka tA ma?/ a n+ya ta ra/ a n+ya tA ma/ i ta ra ste lnga po'i pha rol gyi rnam dbye dang po'i su
83b5(sgra skor): dang gnyis pa'i a ma ni/ A da Da zhes par 'gyuraro// ka ta ra/ a daT zhes pa byung / TAHTo'e'o// rkyen Da 'gro ba pha rol la rtags stsogs kyi TI sh+tsi bAr byA stAM/ Ti phyis/ drangs/ ka ta reng / b+hA wa sA ne/ gnas med pa la
83b6(sgra skor): yang na'o// gnas meng paste tshig mtha' bal a tsa med pa de dz+hal ma sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin na rang dang gnas mthun pa'i car so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnamasu yang ni 'gyur te/ ka ta ra ta/ ka ta rata/ oM dang dzas la/ ka
84a1(sgra skor): ka tA ra NaM/ bong tshig kyang rnam gyi dang po dang 'dra bas/ he ka ta ra ta/ ta ka ta rad/ hekrA tA re/ h+yekrA tA ra Ni/ gnyis pa rnams la'ang // ka ta rAng / ka ta rata/ ka tA re/ ka ta ra NI/ rnam dbye lhag ma rnams skyes
84a2(sgra skor): pa'i skabasu bshang po'i sarba'i rtags dang 'dra/ de bzhin du/ ka ta ma/ a n+ya ta ra/ a n+yat+ta ma/ i ta ra sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o// a dza ra/ zhes pa'i rtags la a tsa thog ma can rnams la stor bshad pa

88b6(sgra skor): bye dang po dang 'dra bas/ rko l-iT/ he la sr-i/ he l+r-i daMHdu ha gzhes pa nung mi 'dra sa/ du sa su/ dA daMd+hA tor+m+maHnga snga ma'i byings kyi grwa'o// nga sngon na yod pa'i byings kyi ta yig sreg med ni/ dz+wa la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge ga

99b3(sgra skor): rnams kyi dza shA rnams sos ShaT/ rAD+b+h+yAM/ rAn+thiHngaM la/ ra dze/ dz+yA b+h+yasa? 'dre/ da si la/ rA dzA[:]b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ rA dzaMHrA dziHrA dzaM/ ngi la/ rA dzi/ os 'dra/ su pa li/ dza lA/ ShaDa/ khar la tsa ra 'os/
99b4(sgra skor): TaT/ rAT+Ta/ bod tshig rnams la/ he rA ne/ he rA Da/ he ra dzo/ he rA dzi/ bi b+hA dza/ de wer+tha/ bi shA sr-i dzau/ pa ri sr-idzaM/ pa ri bradza rnams kyang rA dza dang 'dra'o// \u0f7fbi shra rA dza/ su/ dza Sha/ Sha Da/ pi shwa rA Ta/ bi shA s+ya ba su
99b5(sgra skor): rA TaHpa shwa zhes pa/ ba su dang rA tsa rA Ta/ zhes par 'gyur ba'i sngon na yod na rtags mtha' ring por 'gyur te/ bI sh+tsa rA Ta lte bu ste/ ha la thog ma can rna na []3/ rnams la rA dza/ rA ShA zhes par 'gyur la/ dwe'i tshe
99b6(sgra skor): bi shwa'i a ring por 'gyur ba ma gtogs rA dza dang gi skabasu bshad pa dang khyad par med do// ba su zhes pa u yig mtha' can ni/ cho ga thams cad b+ha nu'i skabs dang 'dra/ de'i sngon du bi shra zhes pa byung na/ bi shwa
100a1(sgra skor): ba su rAT dag la 'os ring por 'gyur te/ dper na/ bi shrA ba suHlta bu'o// dza yig mtha' can b+h+r-istA la/ su/ skoHsaM yo gA d+yo ran+ma tsa/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' la snga mi'i sa ka ngag gi 'ang ngo //
100a2(sgra skor): rtags mtha' yang dag par sbyor ba ste srog med gnyis brtsegs pa'i mtha' snga ma nge sa yig gam ka yig yin na dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams pha rol dang tshig mtha' la dbyi bar bya ste/ sa phyis/ prash+tsa b+hUsa?

106a1(sgra skor): pi sa ha riHpA tu bA ma pi naM bI b+h+yaHde yang bod skad la/ dpal gyi dbang phyug khyed bsrung bdag la yang / khyod la sbyin pa bdag la'ang bde ba stsol// khyod kyi rje de 'phrog byed bdag gi yang // mnga'
