110a1(sgra skor): tsu lA sha tsu 'os/ sa sha/ tI rash+tsa \u0f7fD+hA la/ ti rAsh+tsA/ b+h+yAM b+his la/ tI rUg+b+h+yAM/ tin+dag+b+hiHde la/ ti rash+tse/ b+h+yAm b+h+yAs 'dra/ dA saM ga ti rash+tsaHb+h+yA ma b+h+yAs 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ tI rash+tsaHti rats+tsheHtI ran+naM/ bdun pa rnams la/
110a2(sgra skor): tI rash+tsi/ ti rats+tsheHtiR+YAk+ShA/ bong tshig dang po dang 'dra'o// nAM tse/ pU dzA yAM/ any+dza'i mchod pa la ma yin// mcho pa'i don la ats+tsha zhes po'i u pA d+hA'i na dbyi ba ma yin te/ br-i any+tsa su/ he la sogs kyi su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/

110a5(sgra skor): pak+She praM k+ShA/ yang na kuka A ga ma mi ster/ pr-I Sh+Ta/ bod tshig rnams la/ he pra nga/ he prAny+tsau/ he prAny+tsaHkruny+tsa/ yang 'di dang 'dra'o// tsa tsa ya ga mtha' can/ pa yo mu tsa la/ su dau tsu'i ku 'os/ tse ka/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ pa yo muka/ pa yo mug/
110a6(sgra skor): oM dang dzis la/ pa ya~M mu tse/ pa yo muHgnyis pa rnams la/ pa yo mu tsi/ pa ye mu tsa/ pe yo mu tsaM/ TA la/ pa yo mu tsA/ b+h+yAm b+his la nu'i ku 'os/ tsa so+o/ dz+ha sha la dzA laM rnams kyi dzi sha rnams soso/ kwagra/ ba yo mug+b+h+yAM/ pa yau mug+niHnga la/
110b1(sgra skor): pa yo ma mo d+hA b+h+yAs 'dra/ nga si la pa yaM su ts+tsha b+h+yAma? b+h+yAs 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ pa ya mu tsa pa ya mr-i tsau/ pa ya mranra/ bdun pa rnams la/ pa ya mu tsa/ pa s+yA mra tsaHpa yA ma?k+Sha/ bong chog rnams rnam dang po dang ng+ku/ \u0f7ftsa yAg/
110b2(sgra skor): mtha' can/ su br-i sh+tsa la/ su/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' la snga ma'i su ka dag gi'ang ngos/ sha phyis/ brash+tsa pra g+na sogs kyis tsa Sh+wa/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnam sos/ Shi Da/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ su br-iT/ su br-i D+ha/
110b3(sgra skor): o dang dzas la/ sur+b+r-i ts+tsha/ su br-i sh+tsaHgnyis po rnams la/ su br-i ts+tsha/ su br-i sh+tso/ su br-i th+yaHTa la/ swo br-i sh+tsA/ b+h+yAma? b+hi sa la/ su br-in+taM/ su br-in+tauHde la/ su b+hI n+te/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ surbaM d+hirAb+h+yAM b+h+yAs 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ su dz+rash+tsa
110b4(sgra skor): su br-i ts+tshaHswa ng+ge hUM/ bdun pa rnams la/ su \u0f89\u0fa4 tsI/ su br-i n+do/ su br-ir+m+ma/ bong tshig rnams la/ haM su br-iH/ te suM thAH/ hi su~M hr-i ts+tsha hi suM wa~M \u0f7fte yig mtha' can/ myA he ta lA/ su/ uka 'gro ba stsogs kyis nom/ sa mtha' ma teta ngag gi yang dag

110b6(sgra skor): la/ dz+nyo sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos// tra dra/ ma hod+b+h+yAM/ ma hadz+dzAHde la/ ma da te/ d+hum b+h+yos 'dra/ nga si la/ ma da da/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ ma ha taHma ha to/ ma ha tAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ ma ha ti/ ma ha to/ me tat+su/
111a1(sgra skor): bod tshig la/ he ma ha na/ he ma tan+do/ sne ma d+haD+D+h+yaHb+hA wata la yang u pa d+hA ring por mi 'gyur/ gzhan tshwa ma thams cung mata ta dang 'dra'o// d+hI mASh+TaHsa pa la/ yang / ata as mtha' 'ang byis ma yin pa'i'o zhes pas/
111a2(sgra skor): su'i skabasu u pa d+hA ring po byed/ gzhan thams cad b+ha wata dang 'dra'o// i tra b+ha wata dang / ta tra b+ha waMta ces pa la'ang mchod pa'i don la su'i skab su u pa d+ha ring po byed/ gzhan ma thams cad d+hi mata dang 'dra'o// dza sha swata ces pa 'ang a
111a3(sgra skor): tra b+hA wata dang 'dra'o// a g+ha wa ta dang b+ha ga wata gnyis kyang cho ga thams cad d+hi ma ta dang 'dra/ saM bud+d+hi la 'dam ka can te/ d+hi mata dang 'dru ba'i phyogs la/ he b+ha ga wa no/ he a g+ha wan/ yang na 'dama? ka/ b+ha wata g+hA wata a g+ha watra rnams kyi
111a4(sgra skor): yang na ste awa o ta yang rnam ldan/ ngos/ awa ota du 'gyur/ yang sgras ta srog med ru u brjod dron/ he b+ha goHhe uH!u b+he A b+h+r-istAM/ gnyis pa la A byAsta'o// da dat+ta ces pa lta bu'i yi ge 'dra ba gnyis btud nas yod pa de la
111a5(sgra skor): a b+h+yAs+thA'i ming can zhes brda chang byed do// da ngata la/ suM/ nAM b+h+yastAstAM t+yaM/ a b+h+yAstA las shA tu'i ma yin no// U b+h+yA sa?'i mang can las kr-i sogs kyi rkyen sha tu'i mtha' can la rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa rnams la'ang nu ma ster bya

111b1(sgra skor): tad/ da dadz+dzA/ ha la dang po can rnams 'di dang 'dra/ bod tshig dang po dang 'dra'o// !ta yig mtha' can dzak+Shata sogs la/ tsak+Shi d+ha da yaHShaT/ dzak+Sha sogs drug la'ang ngo // dzak+Sha sogs drug dang tsa kA sa rnams la'ang sha tu'i rkyen mtha' can la/

111b6(sgra skor): tra dr-i ka/ dz+ha dreg/ i dang dzas la/ d+h+r-i dr-i sau/ d+hA dr-i shaH gnyis pa rnams la/ rA dr-i shaM/ b+h+ya dr-i shau/ d+ha pr-i shaHgaM sum pa rnams la/ d+ha dr-i shA/ t+yA mtho / dr-idz+dzA/ d+hu dr-ib+h+yAMHnga lo/ t+ya dr-i she b+h+yA mo b+h+yas/ 'dra/ nga si la/ tu dr-i sha b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/

112b6(sgra skor): g+h+r-i ta spr-i shau/ g+h+r-i da spr-i shaHD+ha la/ g+h+r-i ta spr-i shwa/ b+h+yAM b+his la/ kAni rkyen gyi ku 'os sha ka/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ ka ga/ g+h+r-i ta spr-i g+b+h+yAM/ g+h+r-i ta spr-ig+b+hiHsogs rigs 'gre'o// chu'i don yan na/ u da ka spr-i sha la/ ru langasasu
113a1(sgra skor): brash+tsa sogs kyis shaSh+Ta/ gnas med pa sogs kyis/ u da ka spr-iT/ u da ka s+thi Ta sogs pi sha dang 'dra'o// NaSha yig mtha' can/ da d+h+r-iSha la/ su/ kwin rkyen gyi ku'os/ Sha ka/ gnas med pa sogs kyis/ da d+hauka//
113a2(sgra skor): dad+h+r-ig/ o dang dza sa la/ dadz+dzi Sho/ dat+l-iShaHgnyis pa rnams la/ da d+h+r-i ShaM/ da b+h+r-iSho/ dad+h+waMSh+Ta/ TA la/ dadz+dzaSh+Ta/ b+h+yA ma b+his la/ kIn rkyen gyi ku 'os/ ShA ka/ dz+dza sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dzaM sha rnams sos/ ka? gra/ da d+hI/ d+h+r-ig+b+h+yAM/ da d+h+r-ik+tAHngi la/ da d+hIShe/

114b2(sgra skor): sakra/ dAg gri 'ang ngos/ kwa phyis/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams ky-i sha rnams so/ ShaT/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ bi bAN/ bi biT/ oM dang dzas la/ bi bik+Sho/ bi bik+ShaHgnyis pa rnams la/ bai bak+Shau/ bi bir+b+ho/ bi bik+ShauHnA la/ bi bIk+ShA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/

114b5(sgra skor): la phyis/ go raka/ go rag/ rnam dbye atsa thog ma can rnams bi bik+Sha dang 'dra/ b+h+yA ma la/ go rAg+b+h+yAM/ b+his laM/ go rag+b+hiHsu pa la/ go ruk+ShA sogs so// ! yang ny+ya/ yang k+Sha yig mtha' can/ pI pak+Sha la su/ su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha'
114b6(sgra skor): dbyi 'os/ Sha phyis/ gnas med pa sogs kyis pi paka/ pi pag/ o dang dzas la/ pri pak+Shau/ paM pak+ShaHgnyis pa rnams la/ pi pak+ShaM/ pi pak+ShoHpi pak+ShaHTA la/ paM pak+Sha/ b+h+yAm b+his li/ yang dag por sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/
115a1(sgra skor): ra b+his/ d+hA sha la dz+ha lA rnams kyi dzaM sha rnams sos/ kag/ pI pag+h+nAM/ pi pab+d+hiHd+he a/ pi bak+She/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yAs 'dra/ ba sau la/ pi pak+ShaHb+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ pA pany+dzaShA b+hI partA/
115a2(sgra skor): la/ paM pak+Shi/ os 'dra/ su pa la/ pi prak+Sh+ya/ bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra/ skabs 'dir yang na bar mi byed do// k+Sha yig mtha' h+yan da d+hak+Sha zhes pa' tshi gau snrums cad po bik+ShaM dang 'dra'o// sa yig mthab tsAn+ta su pis+dza li su/
115a3(sgra skor): su phyis/ sa sa dzuSha dag gi ru 'os sa ru/ u brjod don/ rU ba dag gi u pa d+hA'i ring po ika? gi 'os/ I ring por bsgyu/ su pIHo dang dz+ha sa lA/ su pi so/ su paM saHgnyis pa rnams la/ su pi sAM/ su pi sau/ su pi swa/ TA la/
115a4(sgra skor): su paM su/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ sa swa dz+raSha'i ru/ rA pra sogs kyis mdos u pa d+hA ring po/ su pIr+N+Na ma/ su b+hid+d+hiHde la/ su po se/ b+h+yA me b+h+yAs 'ad+b+ha/ nga si la/ su bi sad+d+hab+h+yAm b+h+yAs 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ s+yA bi saHsu pi so/ su pi s+yAM/

115a6(sgra skor): don yin pas phyis/ uka 'gro ba a tsa rnams kyi thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la byings ma yin pa la 'os/ nu ma/ saM bud+d+hi ma yon pa'i thams cad gnas pa'i ming can la yang ngos/ u pa d+ha rong po/

125b2(sgra skor): pa rnams la/ d+ha nu Shi/ d+ha nu ShoHb+hU nu R+ShA/ bod tshig rnams rnam phye dang po dang 'dra/ ha bis dang pa yas sogs kyong d+ha nus dang 'dra'o// sa yig mtha' can/ a das la/ su/ ma ning la su am phyis/ sa sa dzu' ngag gos rung a daHau

125b5(sgra skor): kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Ni gzhung 'grel gyi go don dper brjod cho ga sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ ma ning gi rtags hal mtha' can rnams rnam

126a1(sgra skor): ston pa ni pA ta 'am mi zad pa'i sde rnams ston par bya ste/ s+ya rI di nI pA ta ma byA yaM/ sA ra la sogs pa rnams ni pA tA mi zad pa'o// sA ra la sogs pa rnams la a byA ste mi zad pa zhes sam ni pA ta zhes bya'o// sar

131a5(sgra skor): la yang a ir 'gyur ba dang ma 'gyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/ gaM ga kAM/ gaM gi kA/ e gai ga kA/ a gaM gi kA/ pa ra ma gaM ga kA/ pa ra mA gaM gi kA/ skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabasu bshad pa rnams la ir 'gyur ba kho na
131a6(sgra skor): byed la yang na mi byed de/ shu b+h+ri kI lta bu'o// kha hu bI ho tu ni d+hi/ 'bru mang po la nges pa'o// sngar skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabasu bshad ma thag pa'i rtags 'bru mang gi tshig sdud can la yang na bar mi byed par a ir 'gyur
131b1(sgra skor): nga kho na bya ste/ a kha Ti kA lA bu'o// A dA tsAr+m+ma NAM/ slob dpon rnams kyi a ta la'o// ston gyi slob dpon 'ga' zhig sngar skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabasu ma bshad pa'i rtags mtha' ring po rnams rna pa dang bcas pa'i ka pha rol la
131b2(sgra skor): thung ngur bsgyur bar yang na 'dod de/ dper na/ gau gA kA zhes pa la/ gaM ga kA lta bu'o// Ti D+ha Na nya dA/ ya sa dza da g+h+rASh+ma tra tsau ta ya pa thaka thunya kanya kA ra pa khyA nAM/ Ti D+hi aN anya dA ya sadza dA g+h+nanya mA tre tsa ta ya pa thaka thAnya kany+ra kA rab
131b3(sgra skor): na rnams kyi'o// rkyen Ta 'gro ba rnams dang D+ha 'gro ba rnams dang aN la sogs prA 'di rnams kyi mtha' la'ang bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dIpa 'jug ste/ de yang dper na/ Ta 'gro ba'i rkyen mtha' la/ kU ru tsa rI/ na dI sogs
131b4(sgra skor): dang / rda 'gro ba la/ saM par+Ne yI/ a Na la/ an+d+ri anya la/ aut+si drA ya sa dza la/ u ruM dI ya sI/ da g+h+rAnya lA/ u ru nga b+hI/ mA tratsi la/ u ru mA tI/ ta ya pa la/ pany+tsa ta yI/ thaka la/ A k+Shi kI/ dzanya la/ lA wA Ni kI ku ru'i tshul du rgya sa rkyen na/ Ne6
131b5(sgra skor): ka&l/ yA dr-i shI/ kA ra ba la/ i tra rI/ khyAn la/ del ma'i tum/ nyin byed la/ A d+yaM ka ra NI sogs so// yang ai Na'i dmigs ba sa la/ be hu ku ru tsa ra dang / byug pa ya?/ daN+Da la dI pe lnga len ma/ tshig ldan ma/ lan ma tsan ma/ mi 'jug TA pa 'ju go zhes pa
131b6(sgra skor): 'dral par 'byung bas/ ba hu ku ru tsa rA 'ashro ga rtsa ngan du spyod pa yang ba/ daN+Tha zhes pa lta bu'o// dbyug pa na ma/ nanya sna ny+dzi kAk+ta ru Na ta lu nA nAM tsa/ nanya b+ha na du skyong ma ma mang ba/ snAnya I kaka ta ru Na ta lu na rnams kyi 'ang ngo // rkyen nanya snanya I ka ka rnams
132a1(sgra skor): dang ta ru Na zhes pa'i rtag rnams la yang dIpa 'gyur te/ dper na/ nanya la/ s+t+r-i NI/ snanya la/ pr-i sni/ I kaka la/ yASh+Ti kI/ shaT+Ti kI/ ta ru NI/ ta lu nI sog so// prA tsASh+ka tad+d+hi taHshar pa rnams Sh+ka tad+d+hi ta'o// yanya mtha'
132a2(sgra skor): la rgya gar shar phyogs kyi slo dpon rnams bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen Sh+ka 'jug la/ de la tad+d+hi ta ste de bud med/ phan gyi ming can zhes brda chad mched sbyi byed ma/ mi du can ma/ lus krol/ byed de/ gArgya la/ !/ ShaHpra t+ya ya s+ya/ rkyen gyi Sha'o// Sh+ka lta bu'i
132a3(sgra skor): rkyen gyi thog ma Sha yig ni 'gro ba'i ming can yin te/ Sh+wa phyis/ nye ba'i yul la/ atso dang rje su sna ldan 'gro ba'o zhes pas/ a phyis/ mtha'i ha la 'os/ ka phyis/ gAN+ya/ ya nyash+tsa/ yanya las 'a // yanya'i rkyen mthA' las
132a4(sgra skor): kyang bud med du byed pa'i rkyen dApa 'jug ste/ gA rgya/ dI pa/ gang gi ita la'ang ngos/ rtags mtha'i e phyis/ ha lastad+d+hi ta s+ya/ ha lau las de phan gyi'o// hal gyi pha rol la de phan gyi ya yig ni dbyi bar bya ste/ ya phyis/ gar+b+hi/
132a5(sgra skor): A ya ne yA nAM yi yAHpa D+ha kha che g+h+r-i/ pa D+ha kha tsha g+ha rnams kyi A ya na e ya A na I ya au ya rnams// de phan gyi rkyen gyi pha rnams A ya na ru 'gyur/ rta rnams e ya/ kha rnams i ne/ tsha rnam tha brang ldan du
132a6(sgra skor): I ya/ g+ha rnams e ya zhes par 'gyur te/ gArgya la/ phanya/ pa A ya nar bsgyur/ gArbA ya Na/ Shing+go rI di th+yAsh+tsa/ Shi ta gau ra sogs rnams las kyang ngo // rkyen Sha 'gro ba rnams dang gau ra la sogs pa rnams la bud
132b1(sgra skor): med du brjod pa'i rkyen dISha 'jug ste/ gAr+m+ma ya Na zhes pa gau ra sogs kyi nang tshan yin pas/ dISh+Ta/ mtha'i ha la 'os/ Sha phyis/ la sha ku zhes pas da phyis/ gang gi ita la'ang ngos/ rtags mtha'i a phyis/ gAr+m+ma ya NI/
132b2(sgra skor): narta kI/ gau rI/ ba ya si pra tha ma/ dang po'i ni tshod la'o// dang po'i na tshod ces pa lo bcu tshun gyi na tshod brjod pa'i don n+dan gyi a yig mtha' can la'ang dISha 'jug ste/ ku mA rI/ ki shA rI/ 'grel par lo bcu tshun du
132b3(sgra skor): gar ma/ dar ma/ zad rgan mo min pa'i drar bab la yang dI pa 'jug go zhes pa 'byung bas/ tsau re TI/ rgan mo yin nu dISha mi 'gyur TA pa 'jug pas/ br-id+d+ha/ a ta mtha' ma yin na gzhan nu la/ dang po'i na tshod yin kyang mi 'gyur/
132b4(sgra skor): te/ dper na/ shi shu zhes pa la dI'i mi 'jugo/ ata mtha' yin kyang ka n+ya la dISha mi 'jug gapa yos laT pa 'jug ste/ kan+ta/ dwi gaiHphyogs gnyis pa las so// tshig zhon pa/ sdud kyi nang tshan phyogs gnyis pa'i tshig sdud byas pa'i a tha can
132b5(sgra skor): la bud med shAT/ du brjod pa'i rkyen dIpa 'jug ste/ pany+tsa mU lI/ phyogs gnyis pa yin kyang tri pha la la rgan nu la/ dI pA mi 'jug TA pa 'gyur te/ tri pha lA/ e bA ri mA Na bas+t+r-i tse ta kam+ba l+ye b+h+yo na tad+d+hi ta lu ki/ tshad ma yin
132b6(sgra skor): pa bsti a tsi ta ka m+ba l+ya rnams las de phyis pa la ma yino// rtsal wa au/ bsta sogs 'di rnams la phyogs gnyis pa'i tshig sdud kyis de phan gyi rkyen 'bras bu gsum ma/ phyis pa dang tshad kyi sgyu ma yin pa rnams la dI pa ma yin te TA pa
133a1(sgra skor): 'jug / pAny+tsa sh+tsa/ dA d+hAr+Na/ drA bAm+b+ha/ N+ya nit+tA/ dwi kAr+k+ka l+yA/ chad ya nA na dIprI 'jug ste/ d+hu DA k+ShaM/ kar+N+NaHk+She d+h+we/ kAr+N+Na mtha' las zhing la'o// klungs snga ma'i kAN+Dal zhing brjod pa'i don las de pan gyi rkyen phyuH
133a2(sgra skor): pa la dI pa 'jug pa ma yin te/ dwi kAr+N+Na []9/ k+She NA g+hAk+tiHzhing maM yin nA dA pa 'gyur ti/ drA kr-ir+N+Na ra dz+nyAr+yA pu ru Shad+b+ha mA Ne n+yA tA ra s+yA/ pu ru Sha las tshad la yang na'o// grangs snga ma'i de phan phyos
133a3(sgra skor): pa la pu ru Sha las tshad la dI pa yang ne ste/ dri pu ru Sh+Ti yaSh+TiHdri pu ru ShA/ A d+ha so nang / tshi mi gnyis pa nang \u0f7f/ A r+d+hasa? kyi a nang ngo // tshe mchen nyi ma pa'i 'gapa/ U d+has zhes pa'i To ni bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen pha ro la la a nang du 'gyur te/
133a4(sgra skor): Ti a nang du bsgyur/ mtha'i hal 'os/ nga phyis/ ne'i / a brjod don U d+hAn/ ba tu br-I he ru d+hu saM dISha/ 'bru mang po la U d+has las dI'a'o// 'bru mang gi tshig sdud can U d+ha sa la bud med du brjod pa'i dISha 'gyur
133a5(sgra skor): te/ na'i a d+yo 'os u pa d+hA'i a pyaMsa?/ bI no d+hI/ bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen ma yin na Ti a ning du mA 'gyur ro// dA mA d+hA ya nAM tAn+d+ho/ dA man hA yAn las 'ang ngos// grangs snga mo'i dA mAn dang hA yan las na tshod l-i dI
133a6(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ dr-i dA mI/ 'i gadri hA yo nI/ kyi sa y-i/ yang 'grel par hA ya nA le na tshad lo bISha'i myur nang / drim thur dag sngon du byung na na'i 'ang Na'o zhes pa byung bas/ tri sA ye hU~M/ sum la/ tsa tu NA ya d+hI la nas/
133b1(sgra skor): na tshad min na dI mi 'gyur te/ tri hA ya nA shA lA/ an+tarbat+sa ti ba to n+yA ka/ an+tarba ta pa ti pa ta las nuka'o// an+tarba ta dang pa ti bta dag las bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen pha rol la nuka A gra ma 'gyur te/ an+ta rba d+hI/ pa ti bAt+ti/ pa
133b2(sgra skor): tsurno ye dz+nyA sa yo ge pa ti'i ni mchod sbyin pa sa gyi / sbyar ba la'o// pa tI'i sgra las mchod sbyin sbyor ba can te bdag po drang ldan pa'i don la Tu na raraM 'gyur zhing dA'i 'jug ste/ bad+d+hi/ bi b+hA ShA sa praH mtsha zhi/ shi kha ldan pa ste rlings/
133b3(sgra skor): rdza maM dang bcas pa'i yad na'o// ming gzhan snga ma da bcas pan+d+ha pa t+yA'i smyan ru 'gyur pr-I yang nA ste/ d+hin dun+ti/ dz+nyAn pa Sh+T+r-i ni r+g+haMs prA dr-iSh+Ta/ su~M shASh+T+ri sa rnaM seM k+sha rnams le/ nAg tu'o// sa mA na las
133b4(sgra skor): pa rnams las pha rol gyi pa ti'i sgra rtag tu na dang dIShe 'gyur te/ sa pat+nI/ i ka pat+taM so ga so// pU tA kra to rai tse/ pU ta kra brten ci'i bdag go/ brten pa'i bdag gotA'i ai yang ngo // pU ta kra tu'i sgra ni ai ru 'gyur zhing dISha 'jug ste/ pU takra tA/
133b5(sgra skor): yau/ br-i trakrA brA k+Sh+mI si tA kA smI d+hAn+d+har+m+ma d+hAd+d+ha/ b+hISh+Tak+Sha pi Ar+b+hik+Sha[]/ smr-i tI steng rnams kyi sr-i tAng+ga'o// br-iSh+mAk+Sha b+hI sogs 'di na rmyil ldan pa las dI'i 'gyur ni mthi' e ruM yang
133b6(sgra skor): te/ u dAt+tha'i ming can zhes ze// br-i Sh+Ta kaM pA yA/ !sa na sa/ mo/ ag+na yI/ lA mo/ ku s+t+ri tA yI/ gas/ ku sI dA yAM ma/ ma no ro dA/ ma nu las au yang ne She// ma nu las skyes pa ldan pa la dISha yang na ste mtha' oM ru
134a1(sgra skor): 'gyur ba 'am yang na ai ru 'gyur te/ ma nA wI/ ma nA yI/ ma nuHbar+N+Na da nu dAt+tAdz+nyo pa d+hat+to na/ dbyangs a nu dAt+ta las u pa d+hA'i ta na'o// mtha'i dbyangs a nu dAt+ta ste sgra skad gsang dma' bar brjod pa
134a2(sgra skor): a yig thung ngu'i u pa dA'i ta yig ni dISha pha rol la nA yig tu 'gyur te/ mim/ ma/ mi/ e nI/ yang na au ta/ mtha' a yig min na a nu dAt+ta yin kyang tA nar mi 'gyur te/ shai tAM/ lta bu'o// 'grel par lung drangs pa/

134a4(sgra skor): a shi tA/ pa li tA/ yang k+Sha'i rkyen can lA dI'i 'gyur te/ A shi g+hi/ pa lik+Sh+mI/ sUR+Ya ti Sh+yA gas+t+ya mad+h+ya nAM yA u pa d+hA yAHsUR+Ya tiSh+Tha A gas+t+ya mAr+ts+tsha rnams kyi u pa d+hA'i ya'o// sUR+YA sogs de rnams la dISha 'gyur

134a6(sgra skor): ka pa rAd+d+haM t+yaM ma twA ba pa nA kr-it+ti mU shrA NA129/ spr-i l+ya bar+t+ta nA tshA da nA yod bi kA ra !/ me thu ne tshA kaM sha be she Shu/ dz+nyA na pa da kuN+Da go Na s+thA la b+hA dza nA ga kA la nI la ku she kA mu ka ka ba ra rnams las rgyu snod

134b2(sgra skor): dIdwitISh+Ta 'jug ste/ dz+nyA na pa dI/ kur+t+ti/ go r+thi/ skA lI/ b+hU dzI/ nA g+ni/ kA lI/ nI lI/ ku shrI/ k+Sha mu kI/ kA bA rI/ lta bu yin la/ de dag las gzhan la TA pa 'jug pasaM/ dzA na ba dA nas/ ka pa rA'i bar ro// 'grel pAr
134b3(sgra skor): gzhan nas skyes 'ayul gyi rgyum/ snad mau/ grags ma/ ma btsas ma/ la mi ma 'ad ma/ sa pa 'am phyag mi nag mo/ rim ma ma ldan mi/ l+r-iDa khyim/ 'khrig 'dad ma/ ther cog ma/ lung drangs te/ nI la las srog chags dang sman dag la' ngo // zhes pa 'byung bas/ ni lI pa Da bA/ nI lI

134b5(sgra skor): ud mtha' las yon tan brjod pa la dwiSha yang na 'gyur te/ mr-i bI/ mr-i duHpa D+hi/ pa TuHuta mtha' ma yin na yon tan brjod pa dam mo/ yin kyang dISh+Ti mi 'gyur te/ shru tsiHsti/ u ta mtha' yin kyang yon tan brjod pa ma yin/
134b6(sgra skor): na dA Shi mi 'jug ste/ A khuHkyika/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ 'am nyan ma/ nas ma/ kha ru dang u pa d+ha na brtsegs pa yod na dIShi 'gyur ba ma ya ni zhes pa byung bas/ du de bdag cha la/ kha ruHpAr+g+ha d+ha s+ya ra sa/ ba hA/ di b+h+yAM sh+tsa/ ba hu
135a1(sgra skor): sogs rnams las yang na'o// bA hu la sogs pa rnams la dISha 'jug pA dang mi 'jug pa 'dA ma kwa tsana? te/ da hI/ ba huHpad+hA tI/ pad+b+ha ti/ i tAHprA N+yaM gAta/ ita las/ srog chags kyi lus laso// ita
135a2(sgra skor): mtha' las srog chags kyi lus kyi yan lag brjod pa la dISha yang na 'gyur te/ aM gu lAM/ aM gu lir+d+ha kr-i dA kA rA dak+ti naHkr-ita i yig mang bam/ mis// au/ las k+tan ma yin pa las so// krita sogs kyi rkyen ita mtha' las
135a3(sgra skor): kyin ma yin pa la dISha yang na 'gyur te/ rA dzI/ rA dzi/ A dzI/ A dziHk+tin la/ bud+d+hiHmdug mo/ ma tiHpuM yo gA dA khyA yA/ skyes pa'i ming dang ldan pa la'o// skyes pa' ming dang ldan pa la'o// skyes pa'i ming dang ldan pa la dISha 'gyur

135a6(sgra skor): sogs kyis/ sU nI/ in+d+ra ba ru Na b+hA ba sharba rI tra mr-i Tau tau mA ra N+ya ya ba ya ba nA mA tu lA tsAn+ma NA mI nuka/ in+ne ba rI Na b+hA be sharba ru dra mr-i Da hi ma a d+h+ya yo ba ne mAM tu la A tsAR+Ya rnams kyi A nu ka'o/ []/ ig+nI sogs
135b1(sgra skor): 'di rnams la skyes pa dang ldan pa la dISha 'gyur zhing A nu ka A ga ma yAt+ma 'gyur te/ in+ta NI/ ba su d+hu rAM n+d+ha NI/ da ru NA NI/ b+h+yA b+hU nI/ shrAr+thA NAM/ ru d+hA NI/ mr-i D+hA nI/ hi myA nI/ a rA N+yA nI/ ya brA nI/ ya ba nA nI/ mA tu lA nAM/ Ats+tshar+Ya
135b2(sgra skor): NI/ 'grel par brah+ma las I nu ka dang dI'i yang na'o zhes pa byung bas/ br-id+d+hi NI/ 'brel pani mi/ sagyi/ na pa/ na pa tsha
135b3(sgra skor): s+t+rai tu le dang u pA d+h+yA ya gnyis lA yang na bar bshad pas/ mA tu lA nI/ mA tu li/ u pA d+h+yA yA nI/ u pA d+h+yA yi/ 'grel par AR+YA k+Sha tri ya gnyis la yang na'o zhes pa byung bas/ AR+YA NI/ AR+YA/ k+Sha tri yU NI/ k+Sha ti/
135b4(sgra skor): yAM/ ya nI b+h+r-i 'a A nu ka mA byin pas s+yAt+ma/ k+Sha trI yI/ s+thAt+pal ya na ma la/ skyabs / lar A nu kA 'jug pa srid de/ s+yAr+m+ma nI/ krIt+ta skA ra NA b+hAr+b+huta/ krI tA las byed pa
135b5(sgra skor): ma las so// byed pa'i tshig snga ma'i kr-I ta las dI'i 'gyur te/ bas+sa kr-I tAM/ 'grel par la lar byed pa'i tshig snga ma can la dwaiShi mi 'gyur ba yang yong ma'i chungs/ zhes pa byung bas/ rta na krI tA/ kyA da lpa khyA yAM/ kA las chung ngu brjed
135b6(sgra skor): pa la'o// byed pa snga ma'i k+Sha'i mtha' las chung ngu brjod pa la dISha[:]gos nya ma/ 'gyur te/ a b+hU bi lob+d+hi/ sprin gyi ma khe'is ma/ ba hu brI ha shAM to dAd+b+ha ta/ 'bru mang po'i mtha' la'ang u dAt+ta la so// nor Do ma/ 'bru mang po'i tshig sdu da k+ta'i mtha' can
136a1(sgra skor): U dUt+ta las kyang dISha 'gyur te/ u ru b+hin+ti/ 'grel par/ dz+yA ta las dISha 'gyur ba ma yin zhes pa byung bas/ daR+ShA dzA tA/ ba hu nanya su kA la su khA di pUrbAts+tsha na/ ba hu nanya su kA la su kha sogs snga ma
136a2(sgra skor): las kyang ma yin no// ba hu la sogs pa 'di rnams ston+da na yod pa'i mtha' l+ya'ang dI'i 'gyur ba ma yin te/ ba hu kr-i t+yA/ a kr-i tA/ byed min ma/ si y+YA k+ShA su kr-I tA/ kA la kr-i tA/ su khA kr-i tAM/ sogs so// 'grel pA ra pA NI kr-i hI ta las+dza
136a3(sgra skor): bAgra mA brjod pa la dIR+Sha'o zhes pa byung bas/ bA NI gr-i hr-i tI/ gzhan la pA NA gr-I hI tA/ a sr-i gA pUrba pA drA dA/ ming la/ rang lus ma yin pa'i tshig pa'i bying me/ du gyis/ 'a byed pa/ snga ma las yang na'o// rang gi lus ma yin/
136a4(sgra skor): pa'i tshig snga ma can k+Sha'i mtha' las dIr yang leg sa nasa'i zung ma ste bag ma/ lig 'dzin pa/ ni 'gyur te/ su rA pI tI/ su rA pI tA/ s+yAM gAts+tsha pA sardza nA da sa yo gro pa d+hA ta/ rang gi yan lag lnga'ang nyer bsgyurar+ya lus u ba d+hA yang dag par
136a5(sgra skor): sbyor ba med pa las so// rlung gi lus las nyer bsgyur snga ma can u pa d+hA yang dag par sbyor ba ste brtseg car 'thungs/ pa ma yin pa la dISha yang na 'gyur te/ su mu khA/ su mu khI/ a ti ke shA/ a pau ti ke shI/ u paM d+hA yang dag
136a6(sgra skor): papor sbyor ba yod na dISha mi 'gyur te/ su gulpA/ che po ma la/ 'grel par oM ga gA tra kar+N+Na rnams laM dASha yang na'o zhes pa byung bas/ swaM hrI/ gzugs mangs la/ sU g+hA/ de mtho mi// rtswa yangs/ zla bang sa/ su gA tAM/ chos su grA d+b+h+yAM/
136b1(sgra skor): su kAr+t+ti/ su kaN+Tha/ yang 'grel pa rab tu swe da sogs la dI Sha 'jug pa ma yin zhes la byung bas/ ba hu swe dA/ su dz+nyA nA/ su so phA/ yang 'grel par srog chags ma yin pa la pIr yang na'o zhes pa byung bas/ susta ni/ sustAnA/
136b2(sgra skor): mgrin mdzes ma/ nA si ko dra rauSh+Ta dzAM g+h+na dan+ta kar+N+Na shr-I gAts+tsha/ n+yA s+yai kA u dA ra oSh+Ta dzaM g+ha dan+ta kaR+Sha lus la rdul mang la mtshag ma/ migs // / shr-ing+ga las 'ang ngo // nA si ka la sogs pa 'di rnams la dISha yang nA 'gyur ma mangs /
136b3(sgra skor): te/ su nA si kI/ su nA si kA/ pr-i ShaM da rI/ br-i Sho da rA/ bi m+b+hoSh+Ti/ biM m+boSh+TA/ su dzaM g+h+r-i/ su dzaM g+hA/ su dan+ti/ su tan+ta/ su kur+t+ti/ su kar+Na/ su nr-id+hi/ su shring+ga 'grel pA ra su puts+tsha las dISha yang na'o zhes pa byung bas/ su pur+b+hi/ su puts+tsha/ yang
136b4(sgra skor): 'grel par/ s+t+wa~M mangs ma/ rgyas pa'i khyo ba ma ma dgas \u0f7f/ rim pa'i ma ma/ kaM ba ra/ byin mdzes ma/ / sno mas / rlo mongs mo/ ma Ni/ gi Sha/ sha raM rnams snga ma'i puts+tsha las dI Sha rtag tu 'gyur gyi drug mdzes me/ taM yang
136b5(sgra skor): na be mi byed do gsung bas/ ka ba ra pu n+thi/ ma Ni puts+tsha/ bi Sha puts+tshi/ sha ra puts+tsha/ u pa mA nAt+sak+Sha puts+tsha b+h+yAM/ nye bar 'ja lA ba las pak+Sha puts+tsha dag las so// nye bar 'jal ba las pAk+Sha dang puts+tsha'i sgra dag la dISha ya nga na 'gyur//
136b6(sgra skor): te/ sh+ye na bak+tAM/ Tha sgo lta bum/ 'dag ma rba moM/ nor bu'i 'dzug ma/ dug 'jug sa/ mder mjug ma/ sh+yaM na pak+ShA/ khri'i sgra ste ma/ u lU ka puts+tshi/ drug pa'i mjug ma bum/ u lU ka puts+tsha/ na kro DA di bat+k+r-i tsiHkro Da sogs dang bat+l-i tsa las ma yin/
137a1(sgra skor): kro DA la sngags pa rnams dang ban+d+haHlus pa'i 'gyur ba mA yAn+ta te/ s+yA k+ko T+Ta/ sU dzA g+h+nA na/ bad+d+hAn/ satwA nAr+thaHmA nA pud+han+tu/ sa ha nAHbi tsa mA na snga ma las kyang// sa hal sogs 'di rnams

137a3(sgra skor): ming ma yin na/ si seMn sa/ tA mra na khI/ tsA ru mu rgya tshas mi/ rna med ma/ khI/ bA haHbA ha las so// brAhA'i mtha' la'ang dISha 'gyur te/ b+ha ro hi/ sa khya shi shrI b+hA ShA yAM/ sa khi a shi shrI brjod pa la'o// sa khi dang min pa'i yin mo// gdang ga /
137a4(sgra skor): a shi shI la dI Sha/ sbyar ba'i/ sa khI/ bzhin mtshas ma/ a shi sh+tsi dag bud med brjod pa la tshig phrang ngo // dzA te ra s+t+rI ba Sha yA/ khyer gyu pa/ da yod pA d+hA ta/ ya u pa d+hA ma yin pa'i rigs las bud med kyi yul ma yin pa

137a6(sgra skor): bud med kyi yul yin na dI la mi 'gyur te/ ba lU kA/ ma ldan pa/ ya yig u pa dzA la/ kU tri yAM/ rgya ma rigs ma/ yang 'grel pA yaM yi ge U c-i ma/ 9/ / skyozhin / a maM/ pa d+hA yin kyang ga pa ya sogs la dwai
137b1(sgra skor): 'gyur ro zhes 'byung bas/ ga pa yin/ hA yI/ mu kA yI/ mit+sI/ ma nuSh+Ti/ pA ka kar+Na par+N+Na puSh+pa pha lA mA la bA lot+ta rA pa dAts+tsha/ bA ka/ kar+Na/ par+Na/ puSh+pa/ pha la/ mU la/ bA la rnams tshig phyi ma las kyang // rigs brjod

141a1(sgra skor): ya ti ka nAM de ba dat+taM/ kA ra ya ti ka TaM de ba dat+te na/ yang 'grel par A b+haM bA di dang dr-i sha sbyor ba las byed pa po la tang An sbyor ba'i yul la gnyis pa yang na 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/ a b+hi wA de ya te gu

141a6(sgra skor): bsgyur u pa a nu d+hi Ang rnams sdo ma'i bas dang sbyor ba la bdun pa'i don sdig pa nges par 'gro/ la gnyis pa 'gyur te/ u pa ba sa ti baM kur+N+NaM ha rIH'brog byed mtho ris la nye bar gnas/ zhes pa nas/ I ba sa ti baM kur+N+NaM ha rid+hi srog bye ma
141b1(sgra skor): zhes pa'i bar lta bu'o// 'brel par/ u pA sogs snga ma'i bas dang sbyor ba yin kyang gnas pa'i yul de bza' btung med pa'i sa yin na bdun pa'i don la gnyis pa mi 'gyur zhing bdun pa nyi ngo zhes pa byung bas/ ba ne u pa bas

141b6(sgra skor): sa ma yA kr-iSh+TaM/ 'dus pa'i nan pa la/ 'brog panan pa gnyis/ thams cad nag pa la/ ngan pa nas thams pa // maM snang mi 'jog rten po 'phrog kyang / lhab bsnyen po'i 'jig rten/ 'odam ni ma'i 'jis rten/ mngon par nin/ ya nan
142a1(sgra skor): ni ka ShA kr-iSh+TaM/ hA kr-iSh+TaM/ ri te kr-iSh+TaM/ pra tI kr-iSh+TaM/ an+ta ra an+ta re Na yuk+te/ am+bar an+na ra Na sbyor ba la'o// am+bAr dang / an+ta re sbyor ba la'ang rnam dbye gnyis pa 'gyur te/ an+mA rA gAn+ta pa/
142a2(sgra skor): t+yaM/ an+ta re Na d+harmaM su khan+ta b+ha nye ba'i drug po la/ kye ma nag pa/ nges par nag pa/ sa sor nag po/ ba ti/ a nur+Yak+Sha Ne/ a nu'i mtshan nyid la'o// mtshon nyid kyi don la ning / bar 'am mtshamos sam dbrag/ a nr-i sbyor ba la yang gnyis pa khyim bdag gi nang /

147a5(sgra skor): pa'i 'pham pa la'o// gang rgyal ba ma yin po'i pham pa'i don sbyor ba la lnga pa 'gyur te/ pA pAt+sa rA dza ya taM/ bA ra NAr+thA nA mip+si tAHspangs pa'i don rnams la do cho makun las 'jig no// chem rkun las ung ngo // srung bar 'dod pa lA lha
147a6(sgra skor): pa 'gyur te/ ya be b+h+yo gAHbA ra ya ti/ nas rnams la ba lang rnams zlog par byed/ an+da nAM ye nA sdig pa las 'phom par 'gyur/ dar+ye na ma tsha ta/ gang gis mi mthong bar byed pa'i sbeng pa la'o// gang gis mi mthong bar 'dod pa'i sbeng
147b1(sgra skor): pa'i don sbyor ba la lnga pa 'gyur te/ mA turni lI ya te kr-iSh+TaHA khyA to pa yo ga/ klog pa dang nye bar sbyor ba la'o// slob pa'i don nye bar sbyor ba'i klog pa'i sgra sbyor ba la yang lnga pa 'gyur te/ u pA d+hA yA da d+hI te pA TuHslob pa'i
147b2(sgra skor): don nye bar sbyor ba ma yin na lnga pa nag pa masas 'jis par cing / mi 'gyur te/ na Ta s+ya gI tAM shrI No ti/ dza ni kaN+DaHpra kr-i ti/ skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin la'o// rang bzhin te rgyu gang gi 'bras bu'i mngon pa 'ang klog par byed slob ma/ dngos
147b3(sgra skor): po bskyed por byas zin pa'i rgyu la lnga pa 'jug ste/ brah+ma NaHpradz+nyeHpra dz+nyA gangs lan kyi rgyu tshis par 'gyur/ yan+taM/ b+hU badz+dza prA N+Do baH'byung bar 'gyur ba laso// gang las 'bying bar 'gyur ba'i yul la lnga pa 'gyur te/ hi ma
147b4(sgra skor): bgai glA pr-i b+hA ba ti/ 'grel pa l+ya pa phyis pa 'o/ la las rgya rnams skyed ba kyang / gnyis pa dang bdun pa'i don lnga pa'o// zhes pa byung bas/ kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen l+ya pa phyis pa'i rtags la rnam dbye gnyis pa dang
147b5(sgra skor): ga na las kauR+Sha lung bar byed / bdun po'i don lo lnga pa 'gyur te/ prA sA dI d+h+r-i k+Sha te/ A sa nA kr-i k+Sha te/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ prA b+hU khyA na maH/ 'dri ba'i brjod pa la'o// gang shos lta bu 'dri ba'o brjod pa sbyor
147b6(sgra skor): la lnga pa 'gyur te/ kasmA ta tra mA ga taHkyad cinas 'ongs/ ya tesh+tsa d+hA dras cing sa lta bar byeng / gdan las lha'o// kA la nirmA NaM ta tra pany+tsa mI/ gang las lame dus nges pa'i tshad de la lnga pa'ang ngo // gang las lam dang dus nges pa'i
148a1(sgra skor): chad ston pA la lnga pa 'gyur te/ 'ang gi sgras dang po dang gnyis pa dang bdun pa rnams kyang 'gyuraro// bA nAng+ga mo mo dzi naM/ krIHk+Sh+Na/ A pra hA ya NAM mA se lta bu'o// a n+ya rU dI tA rar+N+Ne bi/ shrar+d+ha d+hAt+tA ra pa tra
148a2(sgra skor): dzA nI yustAM/ a n+yA/ a rA ta i tA ra ri te/ phyogs kyi sgra Any+tsa rnams kyi phyi ma'i tshig dang U tse U hi ngag glu sbyor ba la'o// nga zags pa'i/ a n+ya la sogs pa 'di rnams dang sbyor ba'i tshig phyi maM dang A
148a3(sgra skor): U tI ts+tshen maH'a can lAk+ShA pA 'gyur ti/ o n+ya kr-iSh+TaH/ Shin+d+ra m+leta/ oM nA tA rA mAtA/ ai t+yA ro rA mAH/ ri ti gud+b+haN+Da krA two many+tsot+ta/ pUHgrA mA tA/ a ya mas+yAta b+h+raHprAk+Sha shrI mA ta/ rbo NA b+hU mA ta/ dok+Shi N+yA ti b+hU mAhA
148a4(sgra skor): yang 'grel par/ snga mi'i don sbyor ba las nag ga zhan/ deni kyi pas gnan/ dag byed las nyes/ ras kyid lam tshon shog/ sa sa rgyas kyi tsho bas kyi phyir tshul/ nim gyi grong las/ 'di rjes las snga ma/ gro las kar/ phyogs kyi grong / skabs 'gar lnga pa
148a5(sgra skor): 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ b+ha b+hA dA rA b+h+yaHyang 'grel pAr grong gi phyi lta bu phyi'i don sbyor ba lnga pa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ grA mA dra hiHsa? prA pa rI brdza ne/ a pa ri dag gi bor ba la'o// a pa ri dag sbyor ba bor ba
148a6(sgra skor): brjid pa la las rab tu sbyor 'bar ba la so sa ma/ ba zhes ming 'dogs byed do// Ang mar+m+ma dA ba tsa ne/ Ang las mtshams brjod pa la'o// Ang las mtshams lta bur mtshams bzung ba'i don brjod pa la yang las
148b1(sgra skor): rab tu sbyor ba zhes dgos pa'i dpung gis ming 'dogs byed do// pany+tsa mya pAng pa ri b+hiHA ba pa ri rnams kyi lnga pa'o// a pa la sogs pa 'di rnams gong du las rab tu sbyor ba zhes ming 'dogs byas pa'i don de dag dang
148b2(sgra skor): sbyor ba la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i don la lnga pa 'gyur te/ a ba ha reHsaM sA raHpa ri ha reHsl-i raH/ A muk+te smai sA raHpra tiHpra ta ni d+hi pra ti dA na yoHpra to 'gran pa dang brje ba ngag lo'o// pra ti'i sbyor ba
148b3(sgra skor): 'o gran pa dang brdze ba dag la 'jug pa'i tshi las rab tu 'khor pa las 'phrog byed bAl/ 'a ba las so sor 'phrag byed bral/ 'khor ba las grol ba'i bar du/ brjod pa zhes ming / 'dogs byed do// pra ti ni d+hi pra ti dA ne tsa ya s+yA taM/ gang

148b6(sgra skor): sring sgrib los mi ser 'thun par byed/ sran ma 'di dang til rnams mi sor brje/ med ma yin pa la yon tan la yang na'o// cho ga'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i yon tan gyi rgyu la bud med kyi rtags ma brgyamams pas bci/ yin pa la lnga pa yang na
149a1(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ dz+nyen+yArtA drar+d+haH/ dz+nyAr+N+Ne na bar+d+haHyan+nat+tAn gyi An lag yInA nA maM 'gyur te/ d+hA nAM nA kA laM/ bud med kyi r+N+Nagas+t+ya yin+da nA mi 'gyur t+te/ bar+d+ha suk+Sh+maHpr-i b+hUg+h+nan+na nA n+yAHs+t+r-i d+hIy+YA n+yA NA rAr+m+ma/
149a2(sgra skor): pr-i thaka bI nA nAn+da rnams kyi gsum pa yang na'o// ras pa ma/ pr-i thaka sogs 'di rnams kyi sbyor ba las gnyis/ rigs/ pa dang lnga pa 'gyur zhing gsum pa yang ngo // / pra thaM ka rA mo NaM/ pr-i b+h+r-ik+Sha rA mA to/
149a3(sgra skor): pre thaka rA me/ bi nA pA pe na/ bi nA pA pA ta/ bi nA pa paM/ nA nA pra kA re Na/ nA nA pra kA rA ta/ nA nA pra kA raM/ ka ra Ne tsa sto kAl+lakl-its+tsha ka ti pa ya s+ye sa tra pa tsa nu s+ya/ byed pa la'ang sto ka/ al+la kr-its+tsha ka ta pa dag kyang dngas so/ ya rnams
149a4(sgra skor): dadaga' byed du sa ra/ sdig pa dang bral bas/ sdig pa dang bral ba las/ sdig pa dang bral ba y-i/ gas sna tsha h+yaM/ gis sna chags las/ gas sna chags la/ k+Shi yod pa ma yin pa'i brjod pa la'o// byed pa'i byed pa can la/ sto ka la sogs pa 'di rnams las yod pa ma yin
149a5(sgra skor): pa'i don bats+tshad pa la gsum pA dang g+ha pa ste/ sto ke na muk+tAHsto k+Shan+tuk+tA/ alpe na muk+tAHalpAn+thak+ShAHkr-its+tshi Na muk+taHkr-ir+b+hur+b+huk+taHka hi pa ye nA muk+tAHko tI pa An+mAk+tAHyod pA ma yin pa'i don ma yin na lnga pa mi 'gyur te/

149b1(sgra skor): sto k+ShaM pa tsa ti/ d+huR+Shan+ti krAr+b+be b+h+yo d+h+r-i ti yA tsA/ rIng ba dang nye ba'i don dag las gnyis pa'ang de// thag ring ba dang nye ba'i don sbyor ba la gsum pa dang lnga pa 'gyur te gnyis pa 'a // grA mA s+yA d+hA ra/ grA ma s+yA d+hA ra Na/ grA ma s+yA d+hu rA tA/
149b2(sgra skor): tsu la mam / g+haM mI s+yon+ti kaM/ grA ma s+yAn+ti ke na/ grA ma s+yan+ti kAta/ de rnams kyi rnam dbye lnga pa'i 'jug yul bshad zan nas/ da ni byed pa can+da la myi 'gro yang / rnam dbye'i go rim / ma tshom kyis so// bzhon drug
149b3(sgra skor): ba'i yul bshad gr-ing gi he la/ l+r-ing gnyi i/ tha ga nya lag par bya'o// ShaSh+Ti she She/ lhag ma la drug pa'o// grong du bshad pa'o rnam dbye dang po sogs dang 'og nas 'byung ba bdun pa ste byed can drug bor ba'i lhag ma 'brel pa

149b5(sgra skor): ShaSh+NI te tu pre yo ge/ rgyu dang rab tu sbyor ba la drug pa'o// oM rtse ba/ grong sa tshul/ rgyal 6/ 'di'i rgyu 'di zhes pa lta bu rgyu'i don sbyor ba la drug pa 'gyur ro// an+d+ra s+ya he to/ bA sa ti/ sarba nA mA sti tsun sa la mdza bar byed/
149b6(sgra skor): tA yAM tsa/ sa nA ma'i gsum pa la'ang ngo // rgyu'i don brjod pa'i sarba nA ma'i rtags rnams dang sbyor ba la drug pa 'gyur zhing gsum pa'ang ngo // ka s+ya he toHsu'o/ zas kyi phyi rdzi ro// ke na he tu nAM/ rgyam yis yang 'grel par
150a1(sgra skor): lung drangs pa/ sarba sogs dang sbyor ba'i rgyu'i don brjod pa la rnam dbye thams cad kyang ngo // sarba nA mA'i rtags rnams dang sbyor ba'i rgyu'i don brjod pa/ la gsum pa dang drug pa 'gyur bar ma zad rnam
150a2(sgra skor): dbye thams cad yang na 'byur te/ kAHhe tuHkaM he tu/ kI na ha tu nA sogs// ShaSh+Tu ta sar+tha pro t+ya ye na/ rkyen ata tas kyi don la drug pa'o// rkyen ata dAdau tas sbyor ba'i don sbyor ba la drug pa 'gyur te/ dak+Shi Na to grA ma
150a3(sgra skor): s+yA/ pu rastA ta grA mA sra/ a nA yA dr-i sh+tsaH/ ts+tshaHla/ ts+tshaHsis/ trI yAM/ a na'i gnyis pa la'ang nga// e na'i sbyor ba la drug pa 'gyur te gnyis pa'ang ngo // dak+Shi Na na prA mAM/ dak+Shi NaM nA grA ma s+ya/ dU ran+ti kAr+tho ShaSh+TAn+sa ti hraH/

150a5(sgra skor): s+yA ka ra Ne/ dza na shes pa'i ngan ma yin pa la byang pa po la'o// dza na shes pa'i don brjod pa ma yin pa'i mi shes pa'i don brjod pa sbyor ba phreng las ring ba/ grong gi ring ba/ grong la nye/ la byed pa pa ste gsum po'i klung gi rtag
150a6(sgra skor): don la drug pa 'gyur te/ sarbi She dzA na te/ mau gsar du shes/ mi shes pa ma yin na mi 'gyur te/ swa ta pu traM dzA nA ti/ skad kyi bur shes/ a d+hI gan+da da ye shAM kArma Ni/ dran pa'i don dang da ya i sha rnams kyi las la'o//
150b1(sgra skor): dran pa'i don brjed pa dang byings da ya i sha rnams kyi sbyor ba la las te gnyis pa'i ngan l+ya drug pa 'gyur te/ mA tu ra d+h+ye ti/ pi tuHsmA ra ti/ sarbi Sho nga ya te/ dza ka ta miSh+TaM/ kr-i nya pra te yam+ba/ kr-inya'i bang pa la'o// Du kr-iH byed pa'i hA
150b2(sgra skor): pa'i byings las 'bad pa rtogs par byed pa dang skyer ba las drug pa 'gyur te/ e d+ho da ka s+ye paM saM sU ru te/ ru dzAn+da[:]ma dran par byed/ pha dran par byed/ mar za bar byed/ nA b+ha ba 'gro ba rnams kyi dbang phyug/ bA tsa nA nA ma dzA reHnang kyi den rnams kyi
150b3(sgra skor): dngos po brjod pa rnams kyi dzA ra ma yin pa la'o// nad dang brdeg pa la sogs pa 'tshe ba'i don can gyi byad byings rnams las grub pa rnams kyi dza ra mame yin pa ste ma rtogs pa'i gi sbyor ba'i rtags la las kyi don

150b5(sgra skor): sosa? Sha no thA ti da dA ti/ chom rkun nad kyi 'debs/ chom rkun nges par gas/ dzA sau ni pra ha Na nA Ta kra tha pi cha tsa kun rims kyi 'debs/ Sh+Tu hi d+hAr+thA nA/ dzA sa na pr-i ha Na nA Ta/ kra tha pi rnams kyi 'tshe ba'i don rnams kyi'o// dza si la sogs pa
150b6(sgra skor): mgon pas mar sbyin par byed/ 'di rnams 'che ba'i den brjod pa dang / sbyor ba la gnyis pa'i don la drug pa 'gyur te/ tsau ra s+yai d+h+ye sa ya ti/ Nam kun 'joms par byed/ tsau ra s+ya ni pra han+ta/ chom rkun ris par rab tu gsod par byed/ tsau ra
151a1(sgra skor): s+yon+mA Ta yA ti/ tsau ra s+ya krA ba ya tI/ tsau ra swa b+hi naSh+Ti/ 'che ba'i don ma yin na mi 'gyur te/ r+d+ha nAHprI nan+ti/ byA ba smai pa NAHsa marba yo/ pi a ba drA pa Na dag gi rgyal ba la'o// ba dang a ba
151a2(sgra skor): snga ma'i Na rgyal ba ldan yo da/ suM ldan pa kyang / rten gyim ma pa kyang / don brjod pa dang sbyar ba la gnyis yas shes pyod/ pa'i don la drug pa 'gyur te/ shad+ha khyab tu k+Sha byang ga ste zla spyod pa ma smin dug
151a3(sgra skor): brAh+ma NaM pa NA ya ti/ dA bsta dar+b+ba s+ya/ di ba'i de'i don gyi'o// di pa zhes pa'ang de'i don te bshad ma thag pa lhor rgyal ba'i don la sbyor ba la'ang gnyis pa'i don la drug pa 'gyur te/ sha turgyabam pa'i rgyal bar bye/
151a4(sgra skor): s+yai dI bya ti/ drim la bstod pa kyangad/ bi b+hA Sho pA sarbe// nye ru bsgyur la yang na'o// nyer bsgyur snga ma'i dipa lwa rgyal bI don brjod pa lag ni d+hI g+ha pau yang na 'gyur te/ shaM taM pra dI bya two/ sha te s+ya pra dI Sh+ya to/ kr-i to&r+tha pra yo ge k+Sha leT+Ta

151b1(sgra skor): yang yin la kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen mtha' can yin pa sbyor las drug pa 'gyur te byed pa po la/ tA ba grA stAM kA/ ta ba gA mi kA las la/ sarba sa trA nA pudz+dzi ku ru/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ u D+ha yu prAp+no kAr+m+ma NI/ gnyis

151b3(sgra skor): kyA s+ya tsa brta mA ne/ k+ti 'dra do ltar ba la'o// k+ta'i rkyen da ltar ba'i don brjod pa sbyor ba la drug pa 'gyur te/ sa tAM dz+nya taHda ltar ba ma yin 'gyur te/ grA maM ga taHna puM sa ke b+hA be/ ba'i rgya ba bram rnams 'job kyang/

151b5(sgra skor): 'angango // k+Shi'i rkyen mtha' can dang sbyar ba las lhag par byed pa ste brlan pa'i don la drug pa 'gyur te/ I dA me Sh+Ta mA sI tAM/ na lo sbyin chos/ ka byA yA niSh+NA Sha larbAd+b+ha NaM/ 'jig rten mi zud po bden pa Sha la tr-i
151b6(sgra skor): rnams kyi don la ma yin no// 'jig rten gyi sgra sbyor ba dang mi zad pa'i sde rnams dang sbyor ba dang bden pa'i don can 'di 'di Ta sdod/ gyi rkyen dang / Sha l-i gyi rkyen dang / tr-i Na sogs rkyen lnga po'i mtha' can rnams dang
152a1(sgra skor): sbyor bA la drug pa 'gyur bA ma yin te/ 'jig rten gyi sgra sbyor ba la/ tsakr-i b+hA nA sr-iSh+TaM hA riH/ mi zad pa la/ U laM ka riSh+Tut+tabaden pa'i rkyen mtha' can/ ha ri daM d+h+yA na tA twA trAn/ biSh+Nu na ha tAH
152a2(sgra skor): daM d+h+yaHSha la gyi rkyen mtha'/ A Shit+ka raHa hA raM/ tr-i Na sogs lnga ni 'di rnams te/ tr-i g+hA na rtsa chog tson spyod pa 'phrog byed/ tsAn/ shA tr-i/ tr-ir+N+Na gang bar gyis/ sogs lnga po yin la na 'das kyid 'brog khyod/ zhi mi na
152a3(sgra skor): thig mar tr-i'i rkyen mthA' can le/ lo k+ShAn[]kar+N+Na/ shA na tsa la/ so mAM pa ba ma nAHtsI na la/ At+ma naM maN+Da yA mA naHsha tr-i la/ bai da ma d+hI yan/ tr-iN la/ lo k+ShA na kar+t+ta brah+ma/ yang 'grel par/ dISha sha tu'i rkyen+d+ra can
152a4(sgra skor): dang sbyor ba la gnyis pa'i don la jig rkyen byeng po// drug pa yid na 'gyur ro zhing 'byung ba byed/ zhes bshad pas/ mu ra 'dag nyid gsas rig byed klon/ badzag rten / s+ya dri ShA na/ min gyi b+h+yo/ mu ro dr-i Sha na
152a5(sgra skor): a kau nor b+ha bi dA d+ha mAr+Nu yoHaka? in dag gr-i/ 'byung 'gyur bu lon ngan pa la'o// aka dang in gyi rkyen dus 'byung 'gyur brjod pa bu lon dran pa'i don can sbyor ba la gnyis pa'i don la
152a6(sgra skor): drug pa 'gyur ba me ya ni te/ sa taHpA la koTapa ta ru ti/ skyes bu dam pas bu lon 'phred par 'gyur/ su kha mr-i NaM dA yI/ kr-i t+yA nAM kar+ha ri bA// de bas bu yin 'phrod par 'gyur/ kr-i t+yA nAM karta ri bA/ kr-ita rnams kyi byed pa po la yang na'o// kr-ita
152b1(sgra skor): sogs kyi rkyen mtha' can dang sbyor ba na byed pa pa'i don la drug pa yang na 'gyur te/ ma yA se byo s+ya ra sAs+thi/ ma ma se byo swa ra swa sti/ tu wAThAr tu lo pa mA b+hU tr-i tI yA n+ya ta ra s+t+waM/ mnyam pa'i don dang mnyam par nye bar 'jab pa
152b2(sgra skor): ma yin dag la gsum pa yang na'o// mnyam pa'i dron gyi sgra rnams kyi sbyar ba dang bdag gi byas rnam mchod/ bdag gi byangs can ma mtshar/ mnyam par nye bar 'jal pa ma yin pa ste mnyam pa med pa sbyor ba dag la drug pa dang gsum pa
152b3(sgra skor): yang na ste/ pi tA tu l+yaHpu traHpi tuHtu l+yaHpi tA sa dr-i shaHpu traHpi tuHsa dr-i shaHpu traHpi tA sa mak+Shu truHpi tusma mak+Shu traHbud+d+ha s+ya tu l+yaHnAs+dzi/ bud+d+he na tu l+yaHnAsti/ tsa tur+thi tsA shi Sh+yA yu Sh+ya ma dra b+ha dra ku sha la su
152b4(sgra skor): khAm+ba hi tiHsmon pa la dang 'drab bu/ A yuSh+yA myA dra b+ha dra/ ku sha la pe dang mnyam pa bu/ bde ba'i don rnams dang be dang mtshungs pahA/ hi ta rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa med/ bzhi pa'ang ngo // smon pa rtogs par byed pa dang A yuSh+ya
152b5(sgra skor): sogs bzang po'i don dge ba'i don bde ba'i don sogs de rnams kyi sbyor ba la drug pa dang bzhi pa dag 'gyur te/ A yu Sh+yaM ta ba b+hU yata/ A yu b+h+yAM tu d+h+yaM b+hU yAta/ ma dr-i tA ba b+hU yA ta ma dr-i tu b+hU b+hU yAta/ b+ha dr-i ta bi b+hU

170a1(sgra skor): tshig gnyis kyi don/ dngos po gcig la mnyam par 'jug pa'i don can de la las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba zhes bya ste/ e kA tsI sai sA TI tsa/ zhes pa la rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/ e kA sA DI/ zhes gnas pa la/

175a3(sgra skor): so a ha sh+tsa/ zhes pa laM/ rnam dbye bsdus Ta tsa'i rkyen byin+ta/ pu N+ya ha su/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ pu N+ya su di nA b+h+yAM na puM sa kaM/ pu N+ya su di na dag las ma ning ngo // pu N+ya dang su di nA dag las pha rol gyi a ha nA zhes pa ni ma ning gi rtag su 'gyur

175b2(sgra skor): kyang tAN+DI las sa so// grA ma dang kauT dag snga ma'i tak+Shi las kyang dro'i sas/ skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' laT rba'irkyen 'gyu te/ g+h+r-i mai dak+Shi/ zhes pa la/ rna bye phyis Ti'i rkyen byin/ gA ma tik+ShaHde bzhin

179b6(sgra skor): gyi skabs rnam dbye gang gi gdod pang bu'i gdang l+r-i di/ bdun pa nye ba gang / sngon na yod pa'i tshig phyi ma yang dbyi bar bya ste/ ka res+thi ta d+ha naM ya s+yA sau// g-i lagan gnas pa'i na 'di/ zhes pa la/ bdun pa'i rjes ka re zhes pa'i nye ba'i tshig phyi ma s+thi ti phyis/
180a1(sgra skor): rnam dbye rjes 'drang dang bcas pa'ang phyis pas/ karA d+ha na/ yang 'grel par/ 'dus pa dang byed pa'i tshig rnam dbye drug pa la dbyi ba 'ang ngo zhes bshad pas/ ke shA nA saM g+ha taHtsU D+hA ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ ke sha sU DuHsu bar+Na s+ya bi kA roH
180a2(sgra skor): laM kA ro ya s+yA sau/ zhes pa la/ su bar+N+Na laM kA rAHstAM yAHpu bad+d+ho Shi ta puMs+thA da nU nga sa mA nA d+hI ka ra Ne s+t+ri yA ma pU ro tA pri ya de Shu/ bud med kyi skyes pa can bshad pa Ung ma yin pa'i bud med la mnyam la tshugs/ / [] []
180a3(sgra skor): ba'i lhag par byed pa la rdzogs sa pa dang pri ya sogs ma yin pa la skyes pa bzhin no// bud med kyi rtags sder skyes pI rta Da can du bshad pa da lta Ung gi rkyen ma yin pa'i bud med kyi rtag su bsgrub pa'i rkyen mtha' can ni mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa
180a4(sgra skor): ste gzhi mthun pa'i tshig la rdzogs pa'i rkyen mtha' can dang pri ya sogs pha rol na yod pa ma yin pa ni skyes pa'i rtags bzhin a tsa rnams thung ngu ra 'gyur te/ tsi tA gA hAHya~M s+yA/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad dang bcas pa phyis/ mdo 'dis Ab

180b2(sgra skor): pa la/ rnam dbyi sogs bsdus/ ka lpA NI pats+tsha mAM/ zhes pa gnas pa la rkyen a ba byin/ ka lpA d+hI bany+tsA ma ra t+na yaHtshwad la sni dra mA d+hI ya swA sau/ zhes pa la/ sti pra mU Na na dwe raM tany+tsa/ na dI r-itA las kyang ngo // na dI'i ming spyan dang

185a1(sgra skor): bar lung drangs pa/ khu ra kha rA dz+nyA bA/ khu ra kha ra dag las yang na'o// khur dang kha ra dag snga mA la/ nA si k+Sha na su 'gyur zhing / atsa yang na 'gyur te// bu re ba nA si kA ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs bsdus/ nA si kA/ nas/
185a2(sgra skor): su 'gyuro// a tsa yang na bar byas pas/ khu ra NAH/ pu ra Ne saHu pa sarbAts+tsha/ nyer bsgyur las kyang ngo // nyer bsgyur snga ma'i nA si kA yang nas su 'gyur zhing a tsa yAng na 'gyur ro// u pa ng+ge rmim sa sar+m+ma tA ba hu lAM/ nyer bsgyur las mang po'o// 'bru mang po'i

185a5(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ bi gai tA nA si kA yi swA sau/ zhes pa la/ bi g+huHnanya duShelasu b+h+yo ha li sa ra n+ya tai ra s+yAM/ oM sa nany+tsa dur su rnams na se las ha li sak+Sh+ma las yang na'o// na nya dang dur dang su rnams snga ma'i hi lo dang sak+Shi dag la 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i
185a6(sgra skor): gad snyarnam par song ba di/ mtha' la a tsa yang na 'gyur te/ sa/ na ha li ya s+ya/ hang gi nga ba med / zhes pa la/ phrad sogs phyis/ a tsa yang na bar byas pas/ a ha la nga a ha liHde bzhin du/ na sa k+Shi ya s+ya/ gang gi sa med/ zhes pa la/ a sa TA Is k+Shi/

195b6(sgra skor): zhes pa la/ tsha dro pA na hAM/ dag lags / rnal l+h+wam/ pu mAn stAM dpas dang yu yA/ skyes dal 'phre / shing sha mi dang rdo dang / pa las bud med shi la idza/ ngag dang bsal ba dang / kyi'o// zlas dbye'i dag pasal/ bsdu ba'i skabs rdul dang lham dang / 'dir
196a1(sgra skor): skyes pa dang bud med gnyis yin na bud med kyi rtags de dbyi ste/ brAh+ma NAsh+tsa brAh+ma d+hIH/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad sogs dang byAh+ma NI yang phyis/ brAt+sA Nau/ b+hUb+da tr-i pu tr-i swa sr-i du ti tr-i b+hU/ spun zla dang bu dag la sring ma
196a2(sgra skor): dang bu mo dag gi'o// zlas dbye'i bsdu ba la jo jo dang si lo yin na sring mo'i rtags dbyi zhing / zes pa dang bram be mo dang / bu dang bu mo dag la du mo'i ming dbyi ste/ swa sA tsa b+hU ta nA tha mi ma po ma dag/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad sogs dang swa sr-i yang
196a3(sgra skor): phyis/ b+hU ta rau/ de bzhin du/ pu trash+tsa du hi tA tsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs dang dr-i he tr-i yang phyis pas/ pu tau/ na puM sa ka ma nA puM sa ke nAM kau ban+d+ha s+yA sring ma dang ji pa n+yA ta ra s+yAM/ ma ning lA mA ning ma yin pa'i gcig 'dra ba 'ang
196a4(sgra skor): maung sring dag/ 'di'i yang na'o// zlas bu dang bu mo dang / dbye'i bsdu ba la ma ning gI rtags dang / ma ning ma yin pI du bu mi deg/ rtags dag sbyor ba na 'di ste ma ning gi rtags ma yin pa de yang na dbyi zhing 'ang gi sgras kun sdud pa 'ang yang na
196a5(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ shuk+saM tsa ka m+ba lash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs dang skyes pa'i rtags kam+ba la rnams phyis/ shukraM/ yang na/ ku kl-i/ yang ma phyis pAs/ shuk+kha kam+ba lau/ pi tA mA tA/ pau la ma yi'o// zlas dbye'o bsdu ba la pha
196a6(sgra skor): dang ma gnyis la ma dag po sngam na/ nyid yang na dbyi s+t+r-i/ mA tA tsa pi tA n+ya/ ma dang pa dang / zhes pa laM/ rnamo / dbye sog/ sdem dag dag/ phyis/ mA tr-i dbyi ba dang ldan sa mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ pau ta rau/ ha~M De sa mA tA bi
196b1(sgra skor): ta ro/ sh+yA shu raHshwa shwAsh+tsa/ gyos pa la rgyug mo'i'o// zlas dbye las gyos po dang rgyug mo gnyis las rgyu mo nyid yang na dbyi ste/ shra shrush+tsa shwa rash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ shwa shru dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang nA bAr byas pas/
196b2(sgra skor): shwa shu rau/ shwa b+hU shra shu rau/ d+ya dA dI ni sarbaM rni t+yaM/ t+yata sogs rnams la thams cad rnams kyi rtag tu'o// zlas dbye'i skabs rgyas po dang rgyug ma dang / 'drir t+yata sogasau rnams l-i rtags gzhan thams cad rtag tu dbyi ste/ sa tsa de pa
196b3(sgra skor): bat+ta sh+tsa/ kyis rgyug dang/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye tshig grogs dang bcas pa phyis/ tau/ 'grel par/ t+yad la sogs pa gnyis tshogs pa la ni sngon ma dbyi'o// zhes bshad pas/ sa tsa yash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad sogs dang ming
196b4(sgra skor): de dang lhas byin yang / gong ma phyis/ yau grA mya pa shu saM g+he ShA ta tu Ne Shu sti/ grong lhas byin de dag gi phyugs 'dus pa rnams la gzhon nu ma yin pa la bud med 'o// zla dbye'i bsdu ba'i skabs de dang gang dang / 'dir grong du gnas pa'i phyug 'dus pa brjod
196b5(sgra skor): pa la/ gzhon nu ma 'amau deg hre/ chung ngu ma yin pa ste/ bau raM bA'i gzhan ma rtags mo rtags rnams gnas zhing rtags gzhan ma rnams yang nra dbyi ste/ gA bAsh+tsa i mUsh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ go dbyi ba dang
196b6(sgra skor): mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ i mAHyang na/ rgyaya ba'i rnams/ ga bi mAH/ bya yang 'di rnams/ de bzhin du/ a dz+nyA sh+tsa i mA sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam di na gu i mA/ khaM yang rnams dang di rnams dag oM na ni i zeng med du bsgyur mila'o// yod na/ a dI i mAH/ 'od rnams/
197a1(sgra skor): grong du gnas pa ma yin na mi dbyi ste/ ru ra ba sh+tsa i mAd b+h+ya/ zhes pa la/ du du yi m+b+ha/ pyuDa ma yin na 'dus pa'i don yin kyang mi dbyi ste/ bAt+ma NAsh+tsa i mAdash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ brAh+ma Na i mAH/ gzhon nu yin+ta na mi dbyi stAM/ bat+sa
197a2(sgra skor): i mAny+tsa/ zhes pa la/ pad+ma im+b+ha/ de rnams kyi sa na ya rnamam dang ri du mi \u0f7f\u0f7f/ zlas dbye'am gnyis gnyis pa'i bsdu ba rnam kyi'i nas 'i ma gas bshad nas zin to// de ni tshig snang zini tha che tsho
197a3(sgra skor): rnams dang 'di rnams dang / ru 'di rnams/ rigs thun mong du bshad pa las/ r-i ka pU ra b+hAHpA thA ma na k+Sho/ ri tshi bur d+h+r-ir pa thin rnams kyi ak+Sha ma yin pa lngas a pa'o// d+hA ra dang ak+Sha sbyor ba ma yin pa'i rtags de rnams las bsdu ba'i mtha' la

197b1(sgra skor): bu'i bsdu ba'o// d+han+ta ru ba sarbe b+h+yo&bA ita/ dri an+tar nyer bsgyur rnams las ab kyi i ta'o// bsdu ba'i skabs dI dang An+tar dang nyer bsgyur rnams ston du byung na a ba ces pa'i rtags kyi a yig ni Ita du 'gyur te/ drin tra bo yA sman/
197b2(sgra skor): zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad sogs phyis/ a Ita/ aka 'dra ba la ring po// dI paM/ de bzhin du/ an+taHa baHbyAs+t+ri ya s+yA/ zhes pa la/ an+te rI paM/ sa ma a po a d+hu re sa s+ya/ zhes pa la/ sa mI taM/ U ka e na tsa'i tsug

198b1(sgra skor): nganaD+he di ba rA trin+di bA ha rdi ba sa ra dza sa ni shre ya sa pu ru ShA yu Sha d+ya yu Sha t+ya yu Sha r-ig+ma dzu ShA dzA tok+ShA ma hok+Sha br-id+d+ho k+Sho pA shu na goSh+Ta shA/ aHturA btsa tu ra su tsa tu ras+t+rai pu sa d+he nA na Du ha raka sA ma

200a1(sgra skor): srasa? snga ma'i bA shI yas dang shre yes dag la'ang a tsa 'gyur te/ sAHpa shI ya zhes pa la/ swa ba shI ya saM/ de bzhin du/ swaHshre yAHzhes pa lA/ swo shra ya saM/ a nA ba tap+tA dra tA sarba a nu a ba tap+ta
200a2(sgra skor): las ra ha sa las so// a nu a pa tap+ta rnams sngon ma'i ra ha sa las atsa 'gyur te/ a mtho ris kyi gnas nu tiSh+Ta ra ha si/ mtho rim gnas/ zhes pa la/ mtho ris dge pa/ a nu ra ha saM/ mthe rim dge pa/ a pa tiSh+ma ra ha si/ zhes pa la/ a ba

200a6(sgra skor): u pa sarbA da d+ha neHnyer bsgyur las a d+hA na la'o// nyar bsgyur sngon rjes rgyas par byed shing rta 'dzin pa'i ba lang rnams/ ma'i a d+hA na la atsa 'gyur zhing a na yang dbyi ste/ rjesu ba lung / pa ga taHa d+hA naM// rgyab tu 'gro ba'i lam/ zhes pa la/ brA d+hAH/
200b1(sgra skor): na pU dza nA ta/ bstod pa las ma yin no// bstod pa'i don can las bsdu ba'i mtha' la rkyen gang yang 'gyur ba ma yin te/ suSh+Ta rA dzA/ zhes pa la/ su rA dz+nyA/ de bzhin du/ a ti sha ye na rA dzA/ zhes pa la/ a ti rA dzA/ de rnams mi zad
200b2(sgra skor): par gyur pa'i bsdu ba'o// ki maHkA pa/ ki ma kyi phrag dog la'o// ka ma gyi sgra sgra phrag dog gi don brjod pa can la bsdu ba'i mtha' la rkyen gang rgyal po legs po 'am bzang / 'bul du byung ba'i rgyal ba/ yang mi 'gyur te/ ki ma rgyal su 'byung / rA dzA/ na nyas
200b3(sgra skor): tu ru ShA ta/ na nye'i de'i skyes bu las so// nanya de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las rkyen gang yang mi 'gyur te/ na rA dzA/ zhes pa la/ a rA d+h+waM/ de bzhin du/ na sa khA/ zhes pa la/ a sa khyA/ pa tho bi b+hASh+Ta/ 6 rgya go pa zin
200b4(sgra skor): gyi 'dam ka'o// prA thin g+hi sgra la nA nya de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' la a tsaM ste ra ba 'dam ka tsAn te/ na pan+d+haHzhes pa la/ a tsa yang na bar byas chu la yi pas/ a ban+d+ha / tshugs ca a pa thAM/ 'grel pa tshogs mi mchig sdud kyi skabs 'dir
200b5(sgra skor): a pa sh+ya ma la sogs pa'i ma dbyi bar 'odod do zhes bshad pas/ de yang ji skad du/ lum+mad pa lam min/ sh+yA mahA kr-i t+ye tuM kA ma ma na so ra piM/ sa mo bA hi ta ta ta yo r+g+haM si lam mis s+ya pa tsi yun+tha nyoHzhus pa byung ste/ de bod skad du/ kr-ita/
200b6(sgra skor): la a pa sh+yam gyi ma dbyi ste/ kA ma ma nas dag las tu ma gyi yang / hi ta ta ta la sam gyi yang na ste/ mAM sa'i a ni yuT g+hanya la/ zhes gsungs te/ a ba sh+yam zhes pa'i pha rol tu byings kr-ita sogs kyi mtha' can byung
201a1(sgra skor): sa a tsam ma dbyig ste/ aT+Ta Tar+dz+nyA b+h+yaHzhes bra la/ pha rol tu kya sogs kyi rkyen can byung bas ma byis/ A ba shwad+d+hA hU~M/ de bzhin du/ byis sum gyi pha rol tu snga ma dang ma nas gang rlu shig rgyu
201a2(sgra skor): tum gyi ma dbyi ste/ gan+d+haM kA maH/ zhes pa la mA byis sa/ kain+tu kA maHde bzhin du/ gan+d+ha ma nAH/ zhes pa la/ gan+d+ha mA n+ta/ de bzhin du/ nyer bsgru sam gyi pha rol tu ha tA dang tata gang rung byung nA samA gyi ma yang na dbyi ste/ sa ma~M hrI/

206a6(sgra skor): don du/ u pa sngon ma'i na ha l-i/ kwi pa/ kwi pa yongs rdzogs 'jigs/ mdo 'dis pa ring po/ u pA nata/ !/ nish+tsa ye na bar+ha ta/ sa ngan pa 'byung zhes pa'i ngan ya/ nI br-itA/ yul ngan pa/ pra ka rI Na baR+Sha ti/ nya pa cu'i mam ba/ nang pa la sa 'ching/
206b1(sgra skor): zhes pa'i don la/ prA br-iT/ bi she She na bya d+ha ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ bI byan/ pra kaR+She na ro tsa ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ prA rukra/ tu raM sA ha te/ zhes pa'i don la/ tu rA ShaT/ pa ri ta no ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ pa rI dAta/ bA na gi rmoHsaM dz+nyA yAM ko Ta ra kaM
206b2(sgra skor): shu lu k+Sha dI nAM/ ra rab tu 'bab pa/ ma par snun par byed/ ba na gi ri dwag rnam i ldan ya rab tu gsal bar byed/ lasa? ming la ko rab tugs le sa Ta ra ki shu lu ka sogs rnam ma tshogs ma na yang su rgyam ra a kyi'o// ming la ba yo sa rgyam / nA'i sngon du ko Ta ra sogs dang

206b6(sgra skor): zhes pa la/ a ku gulang shing gi nags/ gra pa NaM/ 'grel ba gus shing gi nags/ pa ra lung drangs pa/ 'das pa'i nags/ ku no ngan+ta deSh+Ta 'dres pa'i nags/ zang shing gi nags/ kar+Na kun+da ba rA ha zang shing gi nags/ tshar ma can gyi nags/ pu che pa de/ Shu tsher ma can gyi nags/ a ka ru'i nags/

207a2(sgra skor): ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os/ na phyis/ mdo 'dis ring po/ shA dan+taHde bzhin du/ shu naHdaMSh+Ta/ zhes pa la/ shwA daSh+mA/ shu naHkar+NaH/ zhes pa la/ shwA kaN+Da \u0f7f/ shu naHkun+daH/ zhes pa la/ shwA kur+YaH/ shwA tsa pa Ni rA hash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ sh+na baR+Sha

207b6(sgra skor): sogs phyis/ mUrba pa Na/ nUrba ba naM/ de bzhin du/ shi rI ShA NAM ba ni/ zhes pa la/ shi rI Sha pa NAM/ shi tshi ga rnams/ shi rI Sha ba naM/ du rbA tA ba nAM/ dung ba nags/ zhes pa la/ dUrba ba nAM/ dUrba pa NaM/ i ri kA di b+h+yo na/ i ri kA so gso
208a1(sgra skor): rnams las ma yin no// sman gyi sgra yina? kyang I ri kA sogs kyi pha rol la pan+sa'i na Na ra mi 'gyur te/ I rI k+Sha nAM ba naM/ zhes pa la/ i ri k+ShA bA naM/ bA ne be sho/ bA na'i yul la'o// tshig sngon ma lA na Nar 'gyur
208a2(sgra skor): ba'i rgyu mtshon can gyi yi ge yod pa la de yang yul brjod pa'i don yin bA na'i na Nar 'gyur te/ k+Shi ra pA naM ye rl-i te/ zhes po lo/ k+Sha ra pA NaM/ de bzhin du/ su rU pA naM yeSh+Ta tAM/ zhes pa la/ su rA pA NA/ bA b+hU pra karA NA yoHdngos po dang byed pa

208b2(sgra skor): ban sogs sran som kyi na Na ra mi gang gi 'chu sos 'gyur te/ ra na num/ spums / ra myash+tsa sau yu ba gang gi zan tsha yinanasats+tsha zhes pa la/ ru mya sman po/ yU nA/ de bzhin du/ ra mya s+yA hAH/ zhes pa la/ TAr myA hA/ ku ma ti tsa/ ku ldan pa la

210b6(sgra skor): 12/ 'di rnams tshig phyi / mar gyur pa la mi rje/ di bye stAM/ up+sa yo niH/ chu rnams la skyes pa/ up+lu dzaH/ up+sa ma tiH/ nu rnams la tshwa thos/ ShaSh+Ta A kro she/ drug pa ni khros tshig la'o// drug pa'i mtha' ni khros
211a1(sgra skor): tshig rtogs par byed pa na chog phyi mA la mi dbyi ste/ tsa ra s+ya ku la/ dA sa s+ya ku laM/ bAk+Sha dik+ShA sh+yad+d+ho yuk+Sh+me dat+tA hA rI Sh+ya/ lA ka di sha ba sh+yata rnams la yuk+taM dar+N+Na ta ra rnams la'o// wA ka di sha ba sh+yata rnams las pa
211a2(sgra skor): rol gyi drug pa ni rim pa bzhin/ yukl-i daN+Da hA ra rnams tshig phyi mor gyur pa na sa la mi dbyi ste/ bA kau yuk+tiHdi sho dAt+tha/ pa sh+ya to ha raH/ she pha puMts+tsha lang+gu le Shu shu nAH/ shwan las she pha puts+tsha l+yA d+hA la rnams
211a3(sgra skor): la'o// shAn lAs pha rol gyi drug pa ni shaM pha sogs 'di rnams tshig phyi mar gyur pa la mi dbyi ste/ shu naHshe phaH/ shu naHphu ts+tsha \u0f7fngag gi sbyor go phyogs kyi dathug pa/ mthong ba'i 'phrog pa/ shu naHlAng+gu lAH/ pu tre&n+ya ta ra s+yai/ pu tra la yang na'o// pu tra tshig

211a5(sgra skor): b+h+yod+d+haNI b+h+rUM ra to bi d+hA yo na saM bon+d+he b+h+yaH/ r-ita las rig pa b+h+yo glanas na kyi / / 'brel pa rnams las so// @ sau r-i ta mtha' las rig pa dang 'brel pa dang ste gnas dang 'brelas can las
211a6(sgra skor): rol gyi drug pa ni rig pa dang skye gnas dang 'brel pa can gyi tshig phyi mar gyur pa la mi dbyi ste/ ho tuHpu t+yu/ sbyin sreg ma khan gyi bu/ ya ho tu ran+te bA s+thi/ sbyin sreg mkhan gyi nye ga nas/ bi b+hU ShA swa sr-i pa t+yoH/ swa sr-i ba ti dag la gdam

216b3(sgra skor): sush+tsa/ mA tr-i Sha sr-i las 'ang ngo // mA tr-i sngon ma'i swa sr-i las kyang bu brgyud la tsha Na dang D+ha ka 'gyur zhing D+haka pha rol la bi rje kri la/ D+ha mdo 'dis raM phyis/ D+ha e ya 'phel bya/ r-i nga dbyi ste/ mA tr-i ShA sri yaH/ ma'i nu mo'i bu ma sgyu mo'i bu/ mA tr-i Sh+Ta se yas+ya/ rtswa'i num bu'i ma
216b4(sgra skor): rA dza shwa su rA d+yata/ ra dzA na shwa su ra las ye ta'o// rA dzi na dang baH su ra dag las bu bats+tsha la yata 'gyur te/ rA dza n+ya r+ra/ rgyal po / shA sur+Ya tra/ 6na a'i ya rA dz+nyo dzA tau ya to rA dzin las ri Da lo ma []
216b5(sgra skor): yata'o// rA dza na las rigs brjod pa la'ang yata 'gyur te/ ra dz+nyAHdzA tI/ zhes pa'i don ra spya sa su ngan nyis pa tan dus kyi 'os phyis/ la/ []rA dza n+yaH/ k+Sha tAt+tAH/ k+Sha tra la g+ha'o// k+Sha tra la rigs dang bu brgyud dag la g+ha 'gyur te/
216b6(sgra skor): sa kA tri yaH/ mal / 'grel par lung drangs tshis pa/ kA tA dz+nyA tau inya/ k+Sha tra las rigs brjod pa la yang / inya 'gyur te/ k+Sha tr-iH/ a~M ku lAt+maH/ ku la las kha'o// ku la'i sgra 'bar
217a1(sgra skor): zhig pa dang tshig gzhan gyi phyi mar gyur pa las kyang bu brgyud la kha 'gyur te/ ku l+lI nA \u0f7fsa gag is AT+Ta ku sti naHa b+hurba pA da dA n+ya ta ra sAM yata D+ha ka ny+tsau/ tshig sngon na med pa las yata D+ha kany+tsa dag yang na'o// ku la
217a2(sgra skor): las sngon na tshig gzhan med pa la su brgyud la yata dang T+wA~Mka nyadag yang 'gyur te/ ku wA oM lu ya ka/ kuM yIn+naH/ ma hA ku la da12k+Sha~M// ma hA ku la las a nya la nya dag go// ma hA ku lA las bu

217a5(sgra skor): da mos/ gas ngan ciH/ pata 'gyur zhing 'ang gi sgras tsha yang 'gyur te/ b+hU tr-i byaH/ b+hU trI yAH/ byan+ma pat+te/ dgra bo la byan la'o// b+hU tr-i las dgra bo'i kye+e gyi sa? sr-il chas sgrim mtsham sa bya / bu brgyud brjod pa la byan 'gyur te/ b+hU tr-i byaH/

217b1(sgra skor): rkyen gyi tha ni i kar 'gyur te/ rai ba tI kaH/ a shra bA li kaH/ khyA sa \u0f7f/ a nr-i Sh+TA naM taR+Ye bi dA di b+h+yo&nya/ drang srong ma yin pa'i rgyun ma chad pa la bI da la sogs pa rnams las anya'o// drung srong ma yin pa'i bi da sogs las bu brgyud
217b2(sgra skor): ba d+hi la lakaka 'a phel ba'i don pa i kar 'gyur/ nam bu'i su/ a mra pA las bka ka 'phel pa'i don dza i ka/ dang rgyun ma chad pa ste bu'i bu la sogs pa 'ang a nya 'gyur te/ bai daSh+Ta/ rtsig byed kyi bu 'am bu'i bu/ au rbaH/ ya skA di b+h+yo go tre/ yas+yA la sogs pa rnams las rigs la'o//

217b6(sgra skor): yA da nya/ ljongs kyi sgra las rgyal rigs las a nya'o// ljongs kyi sgra dang 'brel pa'i rgyun shes kyi bu rnams/ D+ha phyis 'o/ khan slong 'i bu rnams/ smad ba'i bu rnams/ gnas 'jog gi Ta rnams/ rigs mchog gi bu rnams/ yan lag skyes pa a ti sa'i bu rnams/ rgyal rigs brjod pa
218a1(sgra skor): can las bu brgyud la anya 'gyur te/ b+hany+tsA laH/ kA ling+gaH/ hra s+t+rai la g+hu/ thung ngu yang ba'o// yi ge gang la dbyangs thung ngu zhugs pa de yang ba'o// saM yo ga gu ru/ yang dag par sbyor ba la lci ba'o// yang dag par
218a2(sgra skor): sbyor ba ste yi ge brtsegs pa pha rol nu yod na re'i sngon 'a hA/ ma'i dbyangs te thung ngu yin kyang de yang ba ma yin te lci ba'o// d+hIr+m+ma tsa/ ring po 'ang ngo // yi ge gang la yang dbyangs ring po nyu

220a6(sgra skor): so ma las de 'di'i lha brjod pa b+he nu'i bdag baM/ ga la gsor bgyu na 'phel pa ma tsa'i ma ma sogs la yaN 'gyur te/ bsil ba 'am zla ba la/ so myaH/ ne mas laN sa sa phel ba/ bA yAM tu pi tru ba'i nyan na dal dzin tu mo ga pas ya Sha so yata/ bA lu r-i tu pi tr-i

221a6(sgra skor): nye ba'i ba lang rnams kyi tshogs/ aM pa ga ba la bunya nya 'phel ba'i don bu a ka/ nye ba'i ba lang gi tshogs/ bu nya 'phel ba bu a ka na'i de phan 'ang ngos na phyis/ gang gi ita la 'ang ngos a phyis/ rdza che'i tshigs/ sto bral ti bshan pa'i tshogs/ rgyal ba'i tshogs/ rgyal tshogs kyi tshogs/ rgyal po'i bu'i tshogs/ be'u'i tshogs

221b6(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ r+m+ma b+hUd+d+ha d+hA/ mags mA na byaM/ nyam chu tshigs/ bA Da byaM/ ting mam chags grA ma dza na ban+d+ha sa hA ye b+h+ya sta la/ grA ma dza na ban+d+ha sa hA ya rnams las ta la 'o// grA ma sogs 'di rnams tshogs pa brjod pa la
222a1(sgra skor): drug ma'i mtha' la ta la 'gyur zhing la dbyangs don dang talA gyi mtha' rang bzhin gyis mo rtags so// grA ma tA/ dzA na tA/ ban+d+ha tA/ []sa hA ya tA/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ ga dz+nyAts+tsha/ ga dza las kyang ngo // ga dza las
222a2(sgra skor): kyang tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' la tal 'gyur te/ ga dzaM tA/ a tsit+ta ha s+t+ri d+he noSh+Ta ka/ sems med pa grang gi chag tam rje sa rgyam mtshigacin nam lan tshogs tshun pa rgya chags/ hastin d+he nu las tha ka'o// sems med pa dang hastin dang d+he
222a3(sgra skor): nus rnams las tshogs pa brjod pa drug pa'i mtha' la thA ka glang ba'i tshogs/ 'gyur te/ A pU pi kaM// d+ha ba'i tshigs/ lag ldan gyi th+ya/ trAsti kaM/ d+he nu/ Thaka/ i su suk+than+ta hA hAHis us uka mtha' rnams las ka'o// rkyen is dang us dang
222a4(sgra skor): u ka dang ta rnams kyi mtha' tsAn las pha rol gyi rkyen gyi pra ni ku ru 'gyur te/ a.A tra / ma / basmin la ban gas pas ma'i ngon ci ris na pa nal la mas dbyas na i ta la 'ang yang mi byas sa e/ d+hi na kaM/ de bzhin du/ sA rbi Sh+kaM/ d+hA nu nAM/ tshogs/ 'grel
222a5(sgra skor): par lung drangs pa/ pr-i tsha ta suSh+NA ta di b+h+yaH/ pr-i tsha ta suSh+Ta ta la sogs pa rnams las so// pr-I tsha ta dang suSh+Ta ta la sogs rnams kyang tshogs pa brjod pa la drug d+he'u la bgag la sil ba thag pa bzhin ma'i rgya ma dan sa ma ma sa ma gas phyir/ na galas
222a6(sgra skor): pa'i mtha' la thaka 'gyur te/ la pAR+Sha ti kar+ya ti pa'i choms/ sasauSh+Ta ti ka d+ya byam kyi tshogs te ming+ga lI kaH/ tacan ma mchags/ gony+dzi kAr+tha/ la/ sau kha rAshwA yi kaHma khan yal pan/ dam ser gyi tshogs/ said+be li kaH/ marnams pa/ pA shA di b+h+yo yaH/ pA
222a7(sgra skor): dmar ru tshig cag gi tshogs/ bde bar nyal ba'i tshogs sam/
222b1(sgra skor): sha la sogs pa rnams las ya'o// pA sha la sogs pa rnams la tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' las ya 'gyur te/ b+hU sh+tsa/ bA d+ha/ dr-i N+yA/ chag/ U lo&pi/ U la 'ang ngo // ba ta las tshogs pa brjod pa la U la'ang
222b2(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ bA tU laH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ khA la go ra thA d+ya/ khA lA go ra tha las ya'o// kha la sogs pa 'di gnas pa'i tshigs rlu chags/ rjeb stor ba ma 'ad gyi ma nyas to/ rnams las tshogs pa brjod pa la ya 'gyur te/ kha l+yA/ !/
222b3(sgra skor): rlu tshangs/ A ga byA/ rAsarAthA/ !i ni tra ka drA tsash+tsa/ i nI tA kA d+ya tsa rnams kyang ngo // kha la go rA tha rnams las tshogs pa brjod pa la rim pa bzhin I.i ni tra ka d+ya tsa rnams 'gyur te/ kha li nI/ namo chags
222b4(sgra skor): go tA/ a nAs/ badzini ma[]e/ ra ba ka d+hA/ ta dA s+yAM pra ha ra Na mi ti krI DA yAtA/ mtshon cha las de 'di la rtse bar byed pa zhes pa la Na'o// mtshon tshwa las de 'di la rtse bar yi kyi mags ma marnam ma nan can
222b5(sgra skor): b+hag+hanya sA s+yA kr-i ye ti nya/ de 'di bya ba zhes pa'i g+hanya la nya'o// bya ba'i tshig sngon na yod pa g+ha nya'i mtha' las bdun pa'i don la nya 'di la tshon mang thug pas rtse bar byed/ 'gyur te/ sh+ye na pA ta la nya/ []na/ ba rda/
223a1(sgra skor): kun / na / na ma sna rkyen dung hU~Ml dgal su sngags 'byu / man ma 'dzu ma mtha' las mchas mngon da smra brjod don na/ nan rgyu/
223a2(sgra skor): de bzhin du/ tai laM pA tA/ tad d+hI ti ta dI nga/ de brjod pa dang de rig pa'o// de brjod pa dang de rig pa'i don la gnyis pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/ in+na da yaHaSh+Ta b+ha ka ra NaM a d+hi te bA Ni ni ri ShiT mas sa
223a3(sgra skor): rnams mnyi ma ldan pa'i bA ta la nyim sa kyi rkyen ta ma zhes pa mu ma rda ga/ zhes pa'i don la/ be yA ka ra Na pI Na na ri ShiH/ de bzhin du/ in+na da yaH chogs zhes pa'i bang srod ldan ni so rgya brag das mA hA ni/ tshaM ma'i lpags Na drwa la/ khA ga matan dran pa su man+ta d+ha thAg/ brgyag pa la tsu rdzag+sas rnam/
223a4(sgra skor): aSh+Ta byA ka ra NaM be tI pA Ni ni r-i ShIH/ zhes pa'i don la/ me l+yA kA/ a kAma? s+ya sam/ 'ad khyod zug yang rdza Ni/ ra Ni ni r-i ShaMHkra mAM di b+h+yo bun/ kra ma la sogs pa rnams lasa? bun+sa'o// krA ma la sogs pa rnams las de brjod pa dang de rig
223a5(sgra skor): rna mi ga spyod pan cig []/ chen pa tho Na dz+rag[] pa'i dron la bun 'gyur te/ nA dbyangs don bu A kaM/ kra ma kaH/ \u0f7fdA d+yA kaH/ te dA smi nas+t+ri ti she tan+nam+ni/ de 'di na yod pa zhes pa yul la de'i ming la'o//
223a6(sgra skor): de 'di na yod pa zhes yul gyi ming yang go bar byed pa'i don la bdun pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur te/ u dum+ba ra Ni chen cig mo sa ti a smin po na/ na mar rnams ma pa'i 6/ zhes pa'i don la/ oM dum+ba ra/ sa mar yo /
223b1(sgra skor): tI nan d+ho// de las rdzogs pa la'o// du yos rdzogs pa'i don lnga gsum pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/ sa shAm+ba n+ma ni r+b+yA / zhes pa'i don la/ kau \u0f7fs+t+rI na gA ti/ ta s+yA ni b+hU sa// de'i gnas lnga'o// gan su snod pA l+yA drA
223b2(sgra skor): ming la drug pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/ shi bA nAM ni bA saHzhes pa'i don la/ shai baH/ a dU ra b+ha dan tsal kyis gang ba/ grong khyer mdzod ldan ku ga su la'amaN 'phel la Ti ta na sogs kyis rnaMm/ bash+tsa/ mi ring pa nyid las kyang ngo // mi ring ba
223b3(sgra skor): nyid brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' la an la sogs pa 'gyur te/ des rnams kyi gnas/ bi di shA nA zhig pa Na phel yang du ra b+ha baM/ zhes pa'i don la/ pai bi dasha/ dza na pa de lu pa/ ljongs la dbyi'o// gnas kyi don can gyi rkyen rnams ljongs
223b4(sgra skor): brjod pa'i don yin na rnam dbye mang tshig la 'jig ste/ paM tsa lAH/ ba ra NA dul rnams mi'i ring ba nyidapa di b+h+yash+tsa/ ba ra Na la sogs pa rnams yul mi ring ba a 'phel pa/ las kyang ngo // ba ra Na la sogs pa rnams kyi mi ring ba'i don gyi rkyen

224a1(sgra skor): la bdun pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa rnams 'gyur te/ ma thu rA yaM dz+nyA taH/ zhes pa'i don la/ mA thu raHprA br-i laSh+ma ka/ prA br-iSha las thaka'o// prA br-i Sha'i sgra las der skyes pa'i don la bdun pa'i mtha' la thaka
224a2(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ b+hA bri ShikAr/ ta tra b+ha baH/ dwe la dngos po la'o// de'i dngos po brjod pa la tsam bag tu skyes pa bdun pa'i @ can tu skyes / 'phel sa mtha' la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/ ma tho rU sAM b+hA ShaH/ zhes pa'i don la/ mA thu ruH/

224a4(sgra skor): las kyang ngo // lus kyi cha shas las kyang dngos po la yata 'gyur te/ dAn+taM/ !kar+b+h+yAM/ hAstAM/ ots+tsha/ pA d+yaM/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ phyogs nyid/ sde mtshan nyid/ a d+h+yAd+b+ha de Ta Tha ke/ a d+hAt+sa la sogs pa rnams las thaka
224a5(sgra skor): a d+h+yAt+tha la sogs pa rnams las dngos po la/ A d+h+yAt+ma kaM/ nang pa nyid/ ny-id/ rnob nyid/ ga pa nyid/ ma chu nyid/ 'byud te/ nang pa nyid/ A d+hi dwai ba kaM/ lhag pa'i sgrasan/ ai ha lo ki kaMH/ ta ta A ga twoH/ de las 'ongs pa la'o// de las 'ongs pa'i

224b2(sgra skor): mo thu raHni bA so a s+ya/ zhes pa'i don la/ mA thu naHte nu prok+taM/ des rab tu gsung ba la'o// desa? rab tu gsung rang gnas nas 'ang ba'i don la gsum pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur te/ b+ha ga ba tA prok+taM/ zhes pa'i don la/ aHb+hA ga ba taM/

224b4(sgra skor): apA Ni gran+maH/ ta ma yis rab tu gsungs ye s+ya daM/ de'i 'di la'o// de'i 'di zhes pa'i dron la drug pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur te/ u pa go ri daM/ Ni pas byas pa'i gzhung / zhes pa'i don la/ au pa ga baH/ ra thA d+yata/ ra tha las ya ta'o// ra thA
224b5(sgra skor): l+r-iNi las byas pa'i gzung / las de'i 'di zhes pa'i don la yata 'gyur te/ ra tha s+ye ngaM/ zhes pa'i don la/ rA b+h+yAM/ g+hA mA d+ya kha nyo/ grA ba'i b.lang i ma las ya khanya dag go/ b+h+ra ma las lhag nye ba'i lang yi ma lA ya dang khanya drag 'gyur te/
224b6(sgra skor): grA me dza traH/ thong du skyes/ grA mA dA ga tAH/ blong nas 'ongs/ grA me b+ha ba/ l+r-ing nyid/ shing rta 'di/ zhes pa rnams kyi shing ta 'di/ daM na la/ lagrA myaM/ bong ngam grong nas 'ongs sam thong du 'gro/ grA mI NaH/ khaka nya 'phel don kha sI nar bsgyur/ na d+h+waM di b+h+yo D+ha ka/ na dI la sogs pa
225a1(sgra skor): rnams las D+ha ka'o// na dI la sogs pa rnams las lhag ma ste skyes pa sogs don tshan gsum po de rnams la DA ka 'gyur te/ nA de yAH@[]A mu ne yaH/ rna sa sas m+b+ha sa sa mnas samamams /

225a3(sgra skor): sa nas skyes sams nas 'ongs sam sa gzhi/ pau rAstAH/ dU prA ga bA gu da ka pra tI tso ya ta/ di ba prA tsaM tsaM pA tsaM u dI tsa/ pra tI tsa las ya ta'o// di pa sogs 'di rnams las lhag phyog su skyes lam y-i tsan sa 'os pa 'am byo sa Tu byagasu skyes po lam nu phyogs nas yongs sa nung /

225b6(sgra skor): gtsul me I ya bu brgyud kyi de pa na la A ma yin pa zhes ya byes/ ri byi'i bu 'am bya'i bu la skyes pa/ ra ba du skyes pa 'am ra ba nas 'ongs pa 'am ra ba/ ta dI yau/ las skyes pa las de nas 'ongs pa'am de/ ya dI yaM/ gang sa skyes pa 'am gang nas 'ongs pa lam gang / pra t+ya yot+ta ra de las skyes pa 'am nas so o pa sa de/

226b1(sgra skor): ha sogs kyi nang tshan dza nA dang pa ra dgA las rkyen tsha pha rol la kuka A ga ma 'gyur te/ dza ni ka yaM/ i lam mi las skyes pa/ pa ra kI yAM/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ de ba s+ya bA/ de ba'i yang na'o// de ba las tsha pha rol la kuka A ga ma
226b2(sgra skor): yang na 'gyur te/ de pa kI yaM/ de bI yaM/ yuSh+ma da sma do ra n+ya ta ra s+yaM ngan dang pa' la che tsha I ya sus A ga ma ka gnas kyi don u brjod don/ pha'os lam pha rol tu skyes pa ma pha rol tsas 'ongs lakhany+tsa/ yuSh+mAd a smad dag las ba nya yang na'ang ngo // yuSh+mad a sma de dag

226b6(sgra skor): bdag gam bdag las skyes pa 'am bdag las 'ong ba/ lhag ma'i don gyi rkyen khanya dang a Na pha rol la ta pa ka dang ma ma ka dag tu 'gyur te/ las 'phel ba la kha In/ tA pa kI naH/ tshud cid dam khyod nyid las skyes su/ tA pa kaH/ maN 'phel ba/ la' 'phel ba imra/ mA ma
227a1(sgra skor): k+Shi nAH/ mA ma kaH/ maNa' phelas ma d+hAn+naH/ ma d+h+ya las ma'o// ma d+h+ya lasa? lhag ma la ma 'gyur te/ ma d+h+ya maHA desh+tsa/ a di las kyang ngo // A di las kyang lhag ma la ma 'gyur te/ A di maH/ a d+ha so&n+ta lo pash+tsa/ a d+has
227a2(sgra skor): kyi mtha' dbyi ba 'ang 'angs nyid dam bidag las rgya // a d+ha saM las lkog ma la ma 'gyur zhing mtha' dbyi ba dbus ma 'am dbus smyos pa 'amang dbus nam chos la'ang ngo // a d+ha maH/ a sAM pa ti ke/ mnyam pa rang ba ma sa ma 'am legs pa la a'o// ma d+h+ya las
227a3(sgra skor): mnyam pa'i don la a 'gyur te/ ma d+h+yAH/ krU lA ta thanya/ dus lasA thanya'o// dus brjod pa con la lhag ma la thany+ra 'gyur te/ ngan pa'am ngan pa las skyes pa 'am pa la/ mA si kaH/ Ar+d+ha mA si kaH/ ta6 tha 'jig []/ m+bat+sa ri kaH/
227a4(sgra skor): das lanyam pa las 'an ba 'am sa ma pa/ poni na ma ma ngas ma byas su/ ni shrA pra do Sha b+h+yAM tsa/ ni shA pra do Sha rig las kyang ngo // ni shA dang pra do Sha dag las lhag zlab ma zla ba ma skyes ga la ba tri yis zlab byed dam zlab byang nas mas pa tsha mo sa sa
227a5(sgra skor): ma la thanya 'gyur te/ nai shi kaH/ 'phel la ba is/ prA do Shi kaM/ !Ta 'phel ba e ka/ shwa sistu Ta tsa/ shwas lus tu Ta 'ang ngo // shwas las lhag ma la Thany+ra 'gyur zhing tuT A ga ma yang ste ra te/ shro bsti kaM/ d+hA rA dI na tsa/ dwA ra la sogs
227a6(sgra skor): yar mo 'am mtshan mo skyes lam mtshan la ma yong dam mtshan mo'i nga tshe 'am grongs skyes sa ma thong lam 'as/ pa rnams kyi 'ang ngo // dA ra la sogs pa rnams kyi pha rol tu rkyen 'phe la las sa 'a da migs kyis mi tshaM A gam sa yig nga ma chung las skyes/ pa'i rgyu mtshan can
227b1(sgra skor): byung na rtags de dag gi dang po 'phel bar mi byed par aM tsa A g+ha ster ro// dAr sogs ni/ dA ra sA ra byal+la sha shwasti swa du mr-i du shA su shwata sgyu rnams so// sar+b+ba tAN tsaM ta lo bAsh+tsa/ rtag tu aN ste ta dbyi ba'ang ngo // he man+ta
227b2(sgra skor): lus lhag ma la aN rtag tu 'gyur zhing ta dbye ba'ang ngo // he mA naH/ 'grel bar yang na thAnya'o zhes bshad pas/ haM man+ti kAHs+thA yaM tsi raM prAd+d+he pra gau& byA ye b+h+yoSh+Ta nA lau tun+tu/ sA yaM tsi raM prA hUM sa yi dang / mang tshon gyi mam sa
227b3(sgra skor): tswi raM dang / prah+ne dang / pra ge rnams dang / mi dkun nam thun ka skyes pa te ma n+ta li maNa'aphel ba ta phyis su/ zad pa'i rtags rnam [] 'i ma gyi kun pam 'akun ka m+b+his pa/ la dus brjod pa la UT dang yul dag 'gyur te tuT A ga ma 'ang ngo // swa yaM kA le/
227b4(sgra skor): zhes pa'i don la/ s+yA yaM ta nAM/ srod dus/ tsi raM ta nAM/ de bzhin du/ prA h+ne ta nAM/ pra ge ta naM/ sna mo'i du/ 'di dag gi ma mtha' dang e dag ni tshig phrad kyis bsgrubs pa'o// mi zad pa la/ do ShA ta nAM/ mtshan mo'i du/ mr-i Sha ta nAM/ br-id dus/
227b5(sgra skor): sayaM la Sh+ku Ta Ta Ti TA sogs kyi don la 'gro ba'i ming can yu a na tuT yang na yul 'ad byangs don dus ring po 'am yun ring po/ nyi ma dang po'i dus/ Ta 'am yul tu Ta/ h+ya sA nAM/ 'grel pa ra 'ung dra ngas nga/ tsi ratA ru t+sa ra ri b+haHtAH/ tsi rata pa ru ta Sh+kuHlam yul tsaT/ Sh+kuT 'am yul tu Ta/ rgyun gyis dus/ pa rA ri rnama?
227b6(sgra skor): las tA 'o// tsi rata sogs 'di rnams la dus brjod pa kha twA 'gyur te/ lus o tsi rat+na/ rab pa shA nga [] kyi la la nga la / pa rut+ne/ \u0f85m+ba rA r-it+no/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ prag s+ya ga lo pash+tsa/ pra ga'i ga
228a1(sgra skor): dbyi ba 'ang ngo // bra ga las dus brjod pa la tA 'gyur zhing ga dbyi ba 'ang ngo // brat+sA/ a gra bash+tsa di man/ a gra pash+tsa ta las i mna'o// a gra dang pash+tsa ha dag las lhag ma lA i man 'gyur te/ a gri ma ga nyim kya/
228a2(sgra skor): pash+tsi maM/ ha nywa la na na dpya ma ngon pati 'a sogs kyis 'i gyis/ an+nad+b+h+yAM/ an+ta las kyang ngo // thugs rnag phyis su 'khon/ ma'i dus/ an+ta las kyang lhag ma la i man 'gyur te/ in+yA maM/ i man na dbyangs don/ ta s+ya bi kA raH/ de'i rnam ma ma snres pa ma thems las pa/

232b4(sgra skor): sa rdza sa la/ 'dri long ngam chogs khang legs pa/ 'gyur te/ sA mAn tIr+the bA si/ zhes pa'i don la/ sa tIn+mAH/ sa mA no da re sha yi taH/ sa mA na u da ra la nyal ba la'o// sa mA na u da ra la nyal ba'i don la ya 'gyur te/ sa mA no da re sha yi
232b5(sgra skor): te/ zhes pa'i don la/ sa mA no nga rAg N+DI gnas ma tshungs par gnas/ sa man la yas ma 'a'i sa 'os sam nas/ bosti gnas la dungs par gnas/ so da rA d+yaH/ so da ra las ya'o// swa mA na sar 'gyur bas so dA ra las kyang nyal ba la ya b+h+yom skyes pa la nyal pa/

233a1(sgra skor): kyang ngo // a mra las dngos po brjod pa la sgra dang tshe dag kyang 'gyur te/ A grI yar+tha/ A g+h+r-i yat+ma/ t+yasmr-i hi ti/ de'i rgyud du phan pa la'o// de'i ched du phan pa'i don lnga byan mtha la s+yAn+d+ha la d+ha t+ta/ zhes rdza/

238a5(sgra skor): ![] rin/ ma gyis bya sa ngas/ phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba'i mtha' la tshad kyi don gyi rkyen rnams rtag tu dbyi'o// dI bi staiH/ tri bi sti/ d+ha b+hA k+Shau/ pu ru Shahasti b+h+yA ma NA tsa/ pu ru Sha ha stin ngag las an 'ang ngo // pu ru Sha dang

238b1(sgra skor): hastinA la/ aH/ i na t+ya ba t+ye/ bu brgyud ma yin pa la aN la ina'o// bu brgyud brjod pa ma yin pa'i aN pha rol la rtags in mtha'i Ti dbyi ba ma yin te/ hAsti naM/ tastI dA yA saM/ pA/ hA stingag+hAH/ 6[]ta sI mU traH/

238b6(sgra skor): tshig la ma yin no// khengs tshig brjod pa'i ki ma la tshad kyi rkyen rnams 'gyur gis la Ta 'tshe ba las ci dbyi 'os Ti phyis ma de'i don/ ba ma yin te/ kA saM khyA e ShaM de shA nAM/ yul de rnams la grangs ci/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ yat+ta d+hA ma pi Da ti

239a2(sgra skor): ta ya ba'o// grangs las cha shas brjod pa la ta yab 'gyur te/ bany+dza ba ya ba ya s+ya/ zhes pa'i don la/ pany+tsa ta yaM/ dr-i tri b+h+r-i tA ya s+yA ya dz+nyo/ dwi tri dag bco dang ta0[]9e+e gyikI las ta ya ba kyi a ya tsa yang na'o// dri dang tri dag

243b5(sgra skor): las ma tupa kyi don la i la tsa 'gyur te/ il[]tun+di lA/ tun+da b+hAn/ i naM tun+di/ ban ldan/ \u0f7fna/ pyA tun+di kaH/ asmA yA me d+h+waM srA dzo bI niH/ as mA yA me d+hA/ sra dza las bi nI'o// as mtha' can rnams dang /
243b6(sgra skor): mA yA/ me d+hA/ sra dza rnams la ma tub kyi don la bo ni rgyal rnam pa 'gyur te/ rnam byam yin/ ni ci'i ni don rjen sesu pa ma na kyis/ twe b+h+rUM sI/ ta'i 'dis/ 9She ti dza sAn/ \u0f7f'i sa si ta pa s+t+ri mi /
244a1(sgra skor): sa ta bas+thAn/ rma b+hi/ []/ ya me d+hA Sh+Ti/ e tA bAnra/ prag+b+hi/ ya ma bAn/ mi zin+ta d+ham+b+ha ra kaH/ n+ta dag las A ra kan+Da/ d+hin dang br-in+da dag las ma tu don la
244a2(sgra skor): katsa 'gyur te/ ng+ga ra ka/ []/ sbru/ d+hA / ldan ma/ sa saN br-in+d+ha ra kaH[]br-in+da b+hAn+ta/ saM la bar+N+Na b+hU mi na na/ pha la bar+d+ha drug las In na'o// pa la berta dag las ma tu bkrI don la i na
244a3(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ a rakaH/ tsan/ inas pha li napa/ mthub d+hA pa la bAn/ Sh+Te sam darti bAn/ ra thA ts+tsha k+Shar+ra tha las kyang // choms ldan/ ra TA las mau tu pa kye don la aM na na? 'gyur te/ i nanaDa thi naH/ maHa ra tha bAn/ shI nr-iSh+Ta tAM
244a4(sgra skor): b+h+yA b+hU lutsa tA d+ha sa ha ne/ hI tayuSh+mA tr-i Sha nargya sarnams las kyang de mi bzod pa la A lutsa'o// shIt+tha uSh+TA tr-i Sha rnams las de mi bzod pa'i don la A / luH 'gyur te/ shwe tA nA sa ha
244a5(sgra skor): to/ zhes pa'i don la/ A sa? shI tA luH/ de bzhin du/ sA sum suSh+mA luH/ As tatr-i ShA luH/ hi mAts+tsha/ hi ma las kyang ngo // hi ma las kyang de mi bzod pa la A lu tsaM 'gyur te/ Asa?Hhi mA luH/ ba lA dU laH/ ba la l+la l+r-ing nyis mi bzod/
244a6(sgra skor): U la'o// pa la las de mi yin tsa zangs bzod pa la U ya li che ga/ badzin tu skom ya 'gyur te/ pa lU la th+ya/ stob la mi bzod pa/ ba tAts+tsa/ pa ta las kyang ngo // pa ha las da mi bzod pa la bo ba mi bzod pa A la 'gyur te/ rlung mi bzod ya ba tU laH/
244b1(sgra skor): taHparba ma ru d+h+waM/ bAr+b+ba mU rut+yA dag las ta'o// barba dang ma ruta dag las de mi bzod pa la ta 'gyur te/ ri parba teH/ ma ru tAH/ Ur+Na yAHyus/ Ur+N+Na las yus 'o// Ur+N+Na las de mi bzod pa'i don la yus 'gyur te/ Ur+Na nA sa ha te/ zhes pa'i
244b2(sgra skor): don la/ U r+t+r-i yuH/ bA tsau grI niH/ bA tsa las g+mi ni'o// pA tsa lA de mi bzod pa la maru la ta dz+ha ra la dz+ha rnams kyi zhes pas te gongam phyis/ rnye mi brtsod pa/ glai ni 'gyur te/ bA b+hI// dag mi bzod pa ma dag ldan nam smra mkhas/ A la dza Ta tsau ba hu d+hA Sha Ni/ sma ba la mi pa'o pa mang po'i don/
244b3(sgra skor): papa la A la tsa A Ta tsa dag go/ pA tsa las smad pa rtogs par byed pa la A lA tsa dang A Ta tsa drag/ bca smini ga 'gro ba'i ming can na'i mi rta rnams kyi nas pas kagasu man mags kyis ring po/ 'gyur te/ A laHpA tsA li/ \u0f7f[\u0f7f]ba tsa TaH/ s+thA min+ne shwaR+Ye/
