244b5(sgra skor): e rA saH/ []pai dza yan+taH/ a.u ra saH/ []tsi tu raH/ d+yA pa li ta/ aHdzA D+h+we sa auHprA TaH/ an+ta.a b+hUH/ i aH/ b+h+ra tA tI swA R+Sha b+h+r-i kuk+Sha/ b+hU ta a ti sA ra dag las kuka 'ang ngo // b+hU tA dang / a tI sA ra dag
244b6(sgra skor): gagazhang 'brum pa na/ 'phrang ring ca no/ las ma tu pa zang can/ mkhas ldan/ sbrad dag ba can/ kyi don la i ni 'gyu sa ma tsam dang can/ sprin cano/ mchod pa can/ zhing ku ka A ga ma yang ngo // bi la i ni ku A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don su sogasu/ prA ta kI/ rlung ning can/
245a1(sgra skor): ar+thi sAr k+Shi/ 'grel bar lu d+hA sa pa/ dIT+TA ts+tshaH/ b+h+yAMr+dz+dza la m+bu byu // d+hI bA ts+tsha las k+Sha ma stsub kyi don la i ni 'gyur shi srAg+sa sngags yang ngo // ShI b+hU ts+tshak+Sh+mI/ hAsmAdz+nyAhU~M/ sgyu las rigs la l+maSh+Ta/
245a2(sgra skor): i ni tsun a gam ro sa rgyab na/ rigs brjod pa'i ma tub kyi don la i ni 'gyur te/ a has+thI/ kaM shA b+h+yAM ba b+ha yusti tu ta ya saH/ kau she dge las pa b+ha na sa can/ in a A ga T+Te/ yus ti tu ta yas rnams so// !
245a3(sgra skor): dang shaM dag las ma tub kyi don la/ bA dang / b+ha dang / yus dang / tI dang / tu dang / ta dang / yus rnams 'gyur 'i blang sate/ kam+baH/ sham+baH/ kam+b+haH/ shram+b+haH/ su kaM yuH/ lusashAM yuH/ kan+tiH/ kan+tiH/ kan+tuH/ shan+mAH/ kan+taH/

245b2(sgra skor): phyogs kyi sgra rnams las bdun pa lnga pa dang po zhes pa'i bar gyi rkyen gang yin pa de rnams rnam dbye'i don la 'jug rdul can/ zhing las can/ zhi bskyod pa can/ yong su 'joms can/ ste rnam dbye'i ming can gyi rkyen zhes ming 'dogs byed do// ki sasa?
245b3(sgra skor): nA ma ba hu b+h+yo&d+hA di b+h+yaH/ dwi la sogs pa rnams ma yin pa'i sarba nA ma rnams dang ki ba hu rnams las so// dI la sogs pa rnams ma yin pa ste bor ba'i sarba nA ma rnams dang kaM pa hu~M rnams 'chad 'gyur gyi rkyen ta si la sogs rnams

246a1(sgra skor): smos pa'i sarba nA mA sogasu ma zad rtags thams cad las kyang lnga pa'i don la ta sil 'gyur te/ bud+d+ha taH/ bud+d+ha ta/ de ba ta/ de b+hU ta so gus so// i dam i sha/ i dam i shA'o// rnam dbye'i ming can gyi rkyen pha rol la

246a4(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ pa ri taH/ a b+hi taH/ sap+ta myA s+thU la/ bdun pa las tA la'o// dri la sogs pa ma yin pa'i sarba nA ma rnams dang ba hu dang kIm rnams las bdun pa'i don la tra la yang na 'gyur te/ ku tA/ tikasmin/ sarba tra/ sarba smin/

246b2(sgra skor): gis ata ki ma kA ta ta'i de'i dus kyi don gang shing mi kyi sang ngos rtags kyi a phyis sbyor sogs kyi dgos pa yod na ki ma las bdun pa'i don la ha yang na 'gyur te/ ku ha/ sarbe kA mya ki ma rtsil 'am gang lA/ ya ta ngaHkA le dA/ sarba e ka a n+ya ki ma yad ta ta

246b5(sgra skor): mtha' dus la 'jug pa nai rti la yang na 'gyur te/ i dam sa thab la rnam 'dis la masar 'gyur rtagace/ la/ rti lA/ e to taM ra thoH/ ra tha dag las e ta i ta dag go// rnam dbye'i ming can gyi rkyen ra yig thong tha yig thog ma tsAn pha rol la i
246b6(sgra skor): dam ni ram pa bzhin e ta dang i ta ru 'gyur te/ e tarti/ ha ma a d+hu nA/ a d+hu nA'o// i dam ni a d+hu nA zhes par 'gyur te dus dang 'brel pa'i bdun pa'i don la chog phrad do// dI nAM tsa/ dI nA 'ang ngo // i dam la bdun pa'i
247a1(sgra skor): mtha' du la 'jug pa lA d+hI nAM yang 'gyur te/ i dI n+taM/ ta do d+hA tsa/ tAd las dA 'ang ngo // tad las bdun pa'i mtha' dus la 'jug pa la dI nAM dang dA'ang 'gyur te/ ta dI naM/ t+yA d+hA/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ pu na ro da/
247a2(sgra skor): pu na ra las dA'o// pu nar las bdun pa'i mtha' dza dus/ e dam li dI n+di ai dam i sha 'os i ngas i shang 'bru / can dus la 'jug pa la dA yang na 'gyur te/ du nAN+DaM/ a nA d+ya ta nAM rti la n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ de ring ma yin pa la rnyil yang na'o//

247b2(sgra skor): brjod pa la thu mu 'gyur te/ itAM/ ki mash+tsa/ kim las kyang ngo // kim las kyang rnam pa brjod pa rnam pa so la tha mu 'gyur te/ rnam \u0f7f/ ka thaM/ dika shany+dza r-i stir/ ji ltar/ rnam pa thams cad / b+h+yaHsap+ta mI pany+tsa mI pra tha mA b+h+yo de g+ni sha kA le Shasta tiH/

247b6(sgra skor): titsa/ as+t+ri las kyang ngo // rkyen astA ti pha rol las kyang pUrba la sogs pa rnams rim pa bzhin pu ra la sogs pa rnamasu 'gyur te/ pU tra la as+thA ti i brjod su ma sur du 'gyu bu pu rastA ta/ nang lag du'i shar las/ 'og gi log lam ma logs a d+hasmA ta/ a d+ha la astA ti/

248a2(sgra skor): gagazhanam gzhan las sam gzhan du nges par ya m+mA TI ga sa ga nasasas na du/ gnyis thog nam sa ma 'o tu/ gzhan phyags sa sa gzhan phyogs nas sam gzhan phyogasu/ ka can du bya ste/ a prastA ha/ a bA rastA ta/ dak+Shi Not+ta rA b+h+yA ma ta su tsaM/ dak+Shi Na uSh+ka ra dag la

248a6(sgra skor): la au ril dang a riSh+Ta til 'gyur zhing Ur+N+Ne u pa ru 'gyur pas u pa rtswa sngon ma'i sa ny+tsa la am+b+ha ti phyis pa'o// shar nas 'o / ri dr-ing / steng daphyog su/ u pa riny+tsA ta dag tshig phrad do// paSh+Tu ta/ pash+tsa ta'o// a pa raM pash+tsa ru

248b3(sgra skor): phyogs su/ i mo brjod dani chog phyog sa/ s+yA / Na/ ut+ta ra rnams las thag ring po ma yin pa laM e nas yang na 'gyur te/ a d+hA re Na ba sa ti/ dak+Shi Ne na ba sa ti/ ut+ta re NA ba sa ti/ lnga pa min pa zhes pas lnga pa'i mtha' la mi
248b4(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ ngakri ut+ta rA dA ga taH/ ring po yin na e nas mi 'gyur te/ tasi la ut+ta ra to hi ma bAn/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ 'og gi nye bar gnas/ lho'i nye bar gnas/ byang gi nye bar gnas/ dany+tsi pA mA tAta/ phyogs tsam las kyang ngi// phyogs brjod pa
248b5(sgra skor): tsam lA'ang bya nas 'angs/ e nas 'gyur te/ pUrbi NA/ dak+Shi Ne na/ rgya thag ring las na a bA re Na/ ut+ta re Na/ dak+Shi NA dA tsa/ dak+ShI Na las A tsa'o// dak+Shi Na las lnga pa b+hor bya'i bdun pA dang dang po'i mtha' las Atsa 'gyur te/ dak+Shi d+hA
248b6(sgra skor): ba sa ti/ nywa Na gnas g+hAd+tha rAk+Shi tA ra ma N+Di mo// myos/ lho phyogs lnga pa min pa zhes rgya phyogs bya phyogs pas lnga pa la/ rak+Shi tA dA gA tA n+ya spyanas / A hi tsa dU re/ ring po las A hi'ang ngo // ring po brjod pa dang 'brel
249a1(sgra skor): pa'i dak+Shi Na la bdun pA dang dang po'i mtha' la A hi 'gyur te 'ang gi sgras a tsa'ang ngo // da kI tA ba sA ti/ rak+Shi tA hi ba sa ti/ ut+ta rAts+tsha/ ut+tA ra las kyang ngo // ut+ta ra las kyang a tsa dang A hi ngag 'gyur te/
249a2(sgra skor): ut+ta rA ba sa ti/ aHut+ta rA hi ba sa ti/ saM khyA yA bi d+hAr+the d+hA grangs las rnam pa'i don la d+hA'o// grangs/ mi ca rdzogs gan kyi sgo rnams las rnam pa'i don la d+hA 'gyur te/ tsi tuHpra kA rAM/ zhes pa'i don la tsa tur+N+Na/ dwe/
249a3(sgra skor): bzhin du/ i pag ring ba ma stong banas ka d+hA/ dI d+hA/ Sho D+h+we/ rnam pa drug/ Shan+ta/ pany+tsa d+hA/ sogs so// e kAN+Do d+h+ya muny+dza n+ya tA ra s+yaM/ e ka la d+hA'i d+hA munya yang na'o// e ka las rnam pa'i rnam pa don gyi N+yain d+hA ni d+h+ya muny+dza zhes pa ri yang
249a4(sgra skor): na 'gyur rna te/ e ka d+hA ma []sbyin/ e ka d+hA/ ai d+h+waMn+tau/ e d+hA 'ang ngo // dri dang tri dag lus rnam pa'i don gyi rkye nA d+hA ni ai d+hA zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ dwai dz+nyo/ dI d+hA/ dze dz+nyA/ trid+hA/
249a5(sgra skor): sad+hAd+ha t+ya mar 'gyur tu mngon su dzad demi rnam pa yA s+ye bA sha ba/ smad pa la b+hU sha pa'o// smad sa pa brjod pa las rang don la pa sha ba 'gyur te/ kut+sI to b+hI ShaH// zhes pa'i don la/ b+hi Sha krA \u0f7f/ 'grel par rnam pa ni nyis/ rnam pa gsu
249a6(sgra skor): lung drangs pa/ bA sha kalpe ka mye/ 'dod pa la/ pA sha pa kalpa dag po// 'dod pa'i don la'ang pA sha pa dang ka mya dag 'gyur te/ pyA y+yar+thASha myaM/ pa pa zhes pa'i don la/ 'a ga gaN+DI gapa ra byas ngas mags pa yas+thAb+h+yAM/ rA yaska lAM/
249b1(sgra skor): a NaH3/ iN lAs ShA'o// rtags iN so sor bsdu ba'i pha rol gyi rnam bcad ni rkyenA pa sde dang ka sde dang po can pha rol la Sha yig tsu 'gyur te/ sarbiSh+Ta kaM/ pU ra d+hASh+TA ge tI yA dan/ rdzogs pa las tI ya las tsha la ana?'o//
249b2(sgra skor): rdzogs pa'i rkyen tI ya'i mtha' can lus tshwa 'am skal pa'i don la aNA 'gyur te/ dwi tI yo b+hA gaH/ zhes pa'i don la/ dI tI yaH/ de bzhin du/ tsi shA ga ma 'os[]tr-i tI yaH/ prA ge k+ShA da d+yas b+h+yo&ts+tshan+na si/ sdeng sbyor ma yin pa lA

249b4(sgra skor): bar la cha la an 'gyur te/ 5tsa tun+daH/ en de sha maH/ sogs so// ShaSh+mASh+Ta mA b+hUnya tsa/ ShaSh+Ta aSh+Ta ma dag las ny+ra'ang ngo // ShaSh+Ta dang aSh+Ta ma dag la che la nya'ang 'gyur te/ ShASh+TaH[]ShaSh+TaH/ ASh+Ta maH/ ASh+Ta

249b6(sgra skor): rU pya tsaM/ drug pa las rU bye yang ngo // drug pa'i mtha' las dus sngon du byung ba brjod pa la rU pya rgyu ldan ma yang ba su par zhing tsa ra Ta 'do// rgyan kying ma ldan mtshang ba brdzud/ b+h+yo/ / kr-iSh+Na s+ya b+hU ta pU rtson gzhin na rgya ma marba gau zhes
250a1(sgra skor): ba'i don la/ kr-iSh+Na rU pyAHho// yang na tsa raHsbyar bas/ kr-iSh+NA tsa raHgo// de bzhin du/ b+hU ta pU rbA yA shu b+hA/ zhes pa'i don la/ shu b+hU rU d+yaHshu b+h+yAM tsi rAH/ a ti shA ya ne ta ma biSh+Ta nau/ phul du byung ba la ta ma pa iny+dzan dag go//

250a3(sgra skor): la g+hu la/ iSh+TAn na dbyangs don Ti'i 'os Ti phyis/ ti nga sh+tsa/ ting las kyang ngo // pa tsa ti lca bu ting gi mtha' las kyang phul du byung ba brjod pa la tA mA ba rnams kyi nang ma sung ka 'gyur te/ a ti sha yen pa mangs

250a5(sgra skor): la mapa dang gis ti mi na pa zhes a mra e chab tu tshang gi sa nyi la nyam sa bum chag du yang ya te phul du byung ba brjod pa dang nye bri tshig ste tshig gzhan gong na yod pa las kyang phul du byung ba brjod pa la ta rang dang I yA sun drag 'gyur te/ a ya ma na lo
250a6(sgra skor): ra ti sha ye na la g+hu/ ta stupa 'i sasu mas phyin dpya mngon pa'i ba mug parbabs rdum gyir sa/ zhes pa'i don la/ ma la ya g+hu ta ra ba gtu bya ma 'i sa bcwa sa ba byos tsho gyi/ la g+h+ri yAnra/ rkyes mas/ de bzhin du/ nye nI sa ma 'as kyang rgya nga/

250b5(sgra skor): mtha' can rnams dang mi zad pa rnams las pha rol gyi rkyen g+ha'i ming can las A mu 'gyur te/ aM ti shwa ye na kim/ zhes pa'i don la/ kiM ti rAM/ kai tA mAM/ te 'i mcho// de bzhin du/ prAh+me ta rAM/ prAh+ne ta mAM/ pa tsa ti ta rAM/ tsa ti
250b6(sgra skor): ta mAM/ u ts+tshe ram a mra/ u ts+tshe ta rI/ nyes mthong la u ts+tshe sta mAM/ ta mas y+ra ma?/ sogs te A mu'i mtha' can rnams kyang mi yi dig mchog/ sem la tangs dang sA su u brjod don/ yin ga mchog/ gom la tem dang was/ mang+ges ta ba A mra to mi snga ma mchog sa mtha la sa us can pa Shas hA rgA
251a1(sgra skor): zad pa'o// rdzas ma yin pa zhes pas rnam bcad kyi rdzus yin na A mu mI 'gyur te/ uts+tshe tA raHtA ru/ lta bu'o// tuts+tshan+da sI/ kr-i las sne ba sbyor la'o// kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen tr-in dang tAMtsa'i mtha' lhas rig byed kyi sdeb sbyor
251a2(sgra skor): lngalas kyang phul du byung ba'i don la iSh+Ta na dang I ya suna? 'gyu ro// tu riSh+Ta me yas+thA/ smai'i in+da na i man I yaM sa sun rnams la'o// tr-in dang tr-itsA'i N+ye nau krI tr-i ni de phan gyi rkyen ony+dza na dang i man dang I ya sun+do pha rol la dr-id+yA

251a5(sgra skor): yAn/ dz+yA tsa/ dz+ha'ang ngo // iSh+TAn dang I ya sun pha rol la prA shA s+yA nI dz+ya zhes par 'gyur te/ iHya dz+relpA/ dz+ha la I ya sun/ dz+nyA dA dI ya saH/ dz+ha las I yas kyi Ita'o// gas
251a6(sgra skor): oM ma pram pra sha s+ya dang br-id+d+ha dz+ya du 'gyur pa'i tshwa kyi pha rol gyi I yas kyi I ni Ata du 'gyur te/ btsug mtshus man cas dzA yAn/ rgyas 'i la su malam du rgya ma khrims kyi rmi ma mag 'a sa ming cus sogs br-id+d+ha s+ya tsa/ br-id+d+ha'i 'ang ngo //
251b1(sgra skor): iSh+Ta nA dang I ya sun pha rol la br-id+d+ha zhes pa 'ang dz+ya zhes par 'gyur te/ a ti sha ye na br-id+d+haH/ zhes pa'i don la/ dz+yeSh+mAH/ dz+nyA yAn/ an+ti ka bA D+ha yorni da sA d+hau/ an+ti ka dang b+ha D+ha drag gi ne da sA d+ha drag go// rkyen iSh+Tan dang I yA sun
251b2(sgra skor): dag pha rol la an+ta ka ni de da dang bAM D+ha ni sA d+ha zhes par 'gyur te/ tsas rnam pa'am nas pa yul du byung ba/ kr-ir+Nul in+dan/ tsha mil/ kr-id+hi ma ma dun tsham nas pa/ ni diSh+TaH/ nr-i tsa shos/ ne dI yAn/ sA d+hiSh+ThAH/ !ausAM d+hI yAn/ s+thU la d+hu r-i yu ba hra srA k+Shi
251b3(sgra skor): prak+ShA d+hA dz+nyA pa NA dI pa re pUrba s+ya tsa gu NA/ s+t+rai la d+hu ra yu bA hraswa k+Shi pra k+Shu rnams kyi pha rol gyi dang po'i yaH ste snru mas kyang yon/ gas ldan sa kyi 'ong sargya l+r-is blan ni la sug rdo rjesad+ha Sh+Tes kyis/ tan no// sogs
251b4(sgra skor): ba 'di rnams kyi rkyen ISh+Tan dang I yo sun+na dang i man pha rol gyi dang po'i rtags kyi mtha' na yaN so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na dbyi ste/ rtags kyi dang po'i a tsa dang po 'ang yon tan du 'gyur te/ s+tha ShISh+ThaH/ 6sa ma sas+tha bI yAm
251b5(sgra skor): da bi Sh+Nu / ma ring la/ drA b+hi ya nA/ ma da ba wa ya piSh+TaH/ lu ba la iny+dzan dang I ya sun ci phyis mdo 'dis laH'i yi ge wa phyis u ston e tsa'i a la sogs/ ya bI yA na/ sa da pa/ ha sISh+Ta N+ya ches grang sa? hra sI yAn/ sa pa i n+dan dang shI ya sun Ti phyis mdo 'dis pan mo'i mam phyes A snron e tsa'i sa la soT/
251b6(sgra skor): rlung sa y-i ra dang I ya su phyis mang ris pa Na'i yi ger phye dru'i bu sngon ma ca sa g+ho k+She piSh+TaH/ 9coMk+Sha Tak+ShI pI yA nra/ b+h+yad+d+ha ts+tsha g+ho dISh+Tha b+he nga rje su bye po so gyi sa na/ rnam pa 'i dra kyi phye ma po dam mis ma phyin ra thar tshos/ k+Sho dI yan+da/ i man ni pi thu
252a1(sgra skor): la sogs pa'i srogs kho tra swa dang / k+Shi pa dang / k+Shu d+hA gsum la 'jug pa nyid de s+thU la sogs 'di rnams thams cad la 'jug pa ma yin no// hA si maH/ i k+She pi mur/ i k+Sho di maH/ bri yA sti rasI ro ru ba hu la ku ru br-id+d+ha
252a2(sgra skor): traidz+dzad+ham+b+ha bain+d+ha rA kA r+b+hu prastA swa bAn+d+ha hrI garba rI pa d+hA m+b+hi / b+hI y-i s+thir s+thi r+ya wA ru 'dul swA kr-id+d+ha Sh+T+r-iHd+hIk+Sh+Na bin+d+ha ra k+Sha ba rnam [] / rnams kyi the s+t+ra smai bar dze hi

252b1(sgra skor): gu ru d+hir+g+ha rnams pr-i thu la sogs pa'i nang tshan yin pas i man 'gyur te/ pre mrar+tha dga' ba nyid/ ba ri maH / ma[]/ baM hi na i eg ri mgadrA g+ha ma ga tsa ba hAr+Ya bo b+hU tsa ba hog ba hu lA dbyi ste ba du'i b+ha'o// kha hu'i pha ro b+hA I ya sun iSh+ThAn i mA d+h+waM b+h+ya na rkyen de nA kyi thog mI yi byi zhing ba
252b2(sgra skor): tu'ang b+hU zhes par 'gyur te/ b+hU yA nra/ \u0f7fsa sh+tsa b+hU maHnyanyaM/ thil ya sa ma kyims cur gyur yon tam su tshu la sa su na pa tu na gyis 6/ iSh+Ta s+ya yiny+tsa/ iSh+Tan gyi yiT 'ang ngo // ba hu la aSh+Tan sbyin pa na iSh+Tan gyi i dbyi zhing ba hu la b+hUr 'gyur la iSh+TaH
252b3(sgra skor): I yaM sun mdo 'dis i byi sang d+hur 'gyur/ bstsal i man mdo dis i phyis bsa? d+hu ru 'thur la yaiT A ga ma yang 'gyur te/ b+hU yiSh+mAH/ yu bAlpa yoHka nA n+ya ta ra s+yaM/ yu ba al+la dag gi ka na yang na'o// iSh+Ta na smI ya sun dag pha rol la yu ba dang al+la dag ni
252b4(sgra skor): ka na zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ k+Sha niSh+mAH/ ka nI yAnra/ sa da 'am ches rung ba ya na ya biSh+TaH/ sa !/ ya bI yAna?/ alpiSh+Tir+ra/ iny+dzam i sa sum/ al+lI yAn/ bin+ma toR+YAka/ bi ma tu bA dag gris 'adz+rIg go// rtags de bin dang
252b5(sgra skor): ub 'am awa i ny+dzan yu ba 'am awa ka nar 'gyur Ti gyis/ ches dang sa sam chu gi/ khu ba 'am a wa la I ya sun rtags gnar 'gyur Ti phyir/ lu ba sa iny+dzan dang I ba sun Ti phyis s+phu la pU sogs kyi mangs yaNa'i yi ga ba phyis u ljon e tsa'i a la sogs/ chemi nyung ba/ TA tu ba kyi mtha' can yin la rkyen i Sh+Ta na dang I ba sun
252b6(sgra skor): rol la bin dang ma tu pa 'jig ste/ sra dziSh+mAr+ra/ nyin gyi mapa' can pa ni sa i n+dan dang sI ya sun mad 'dis byin 'jig/ sra d+hI yAn/ tA dziny+dzAr+ra/ Na n+ya khyimapa na sa rgyal i n+dan da la sun mdo 'des ma chus Ta/ tra dzI yAn/ pra shaM sA yai rU pa yaH/ kha bsgyur ba la rU pe ya'o// mi
253a1(sgra skor): mkhas pa la mkhas par rgya lta bu'i don la rtags dang ting mtha' las kyang rU pa ya 'gyur te/ pA shastAHba TuH/ zhes pa'i don la/ ba Tu rU byA/ de bzhin du/ pa tsa ti rU baM/ I Shang pa ri sa mAp+to kalpA ba de sh+ya dwe shrI yA raH/ cung zad
253a2(sgra skor): yongasu ma rdzogs pa dag la kalba pA de sh+ya bo shI yaMr rnams so// bya ba gang yin pa de phal tshur rdzogs # sa pa zin pa cung zad tshum mo su ma rdzogs pa'i drin ting mtha' dang
253a3(sgra skor): rtags rnams las kal+la pa de sh+ya de shI ya ra rnams 'gyur te/ IM Sha dU no bi d+hA na/ zhus pA'i don la/ bridA tAlpAn+ya cung bang ma ma pa'i mkhas pa/ de bzhin du/ ya shaskalpar/ chung ba dang man pa'i grangs pa saT/ bi dAd+de sh+yaH/ wang da man pa'i mas su bi dwedz+dza shi yaH/
253a4(sgra skor): paM tsa ti kalpaM/ ba tsa ti de sh+yaH/ pa tsa ti dai shI yaH/ bi b+hU ShA su pr-i pa hu t+sa ra s+thA ta/ su pa~M na po li ga sra pa dargya mngon pa su sad+d+ha su la bu ma sogs kyi mngos pa pa ma da/ rgya de ni lu myam don bsu mnas kyis mas do/ las bA hu tsa yang na ste dang pora'o//

253a6(sgra skor): rkye bcu sngon du banag tsang byangs do// ba hu paM Tur+tha/ rgya ya dang na pa'i mkhas pa/ pra Tu kalpaH/ pra kA ra tsa ne dzI tI ya ra/ rnam pa brjod pa la dzA tI ya ra'o// rnam pa brjod pa'i don la dzA tI ya ra 'gyur te/ ba Tu pra kA r-i g+ha ta ma ni ma'i yos chung bang nga na tsa mangs pa/

253b2(sgra skor): 'i rang bzhin/ ti ya skyes do// sogs pa 'dri rnams pha rol la rtags atsa gcig pa mA yin pa'i mtha'i bud meng du brjod pas rkyen dI ba dang dI'i ngag thung ngur 'gyur te/ brAh+ma NI la/ ta ra sogs sbyar bas/ b+hU r+m+ma NI ta rA/ br-Ih+ma ta mA/
253b3(sgra skor): brAprAh+ma NI rU br-i/ rA ba TAH/ brAh+ma NI kalpA/ ladzas/ prAh+ma NI tsi lI/ la dr-is brA h+ma NI b+hu bA/ \u0f7f ya sa/ brAh+ma Ni go tA/ mAr dzAg/ brAh+ma mr-i tra/ !thAH/ brAh+ma Ni ha tA/ ta yA sogs te mAdo 'dis/ dI mtha' thung ngurA bsgyur ba'o// na t+yAHrnamatsham mtshas k+Shi pa T+TaH/
253b4(sgra skor): ma ma ma zlas ma/ cung 'ang dam ni tsa gral mo/ zung dang dmin pa'i brim che mi/ cung zad dmar pa'i bral gyi mo/ bram ma ma' rigs/ a n+yai ta ra s+yAM na dr-I'aM cu bdang man pa'i bras / yang na'o// dI mtha' ma yin kyang bshad ma thag pa'i rkye na rnams pha rol la na dI'i mI nga can

253b6(sgra skor): yin kyang la b+d+hi dang ta rI dang tan+d+hi rnams ni thung ngur mi tshig tu bcwa ma / mi 'gyur te/ byen byed kyi tshig sa/ dpal mchog ma 'am mchog tu phun sum tshogs pa/ lak+Sh+mI ta rA/ ta rI ta rA/ rgya mchog ma/ tan+ti ta rA/ sma stan mchog ma/ sogs so// u gi ta sh+tsa/ u ka
254a1(sgra skor): 'tho snas kyang / gas smra/ s+ho s+ho bas+t+ra ba'i yi ge 'gro dz+wal byin pa'i mtha' swA d+hunad+hA'i ming can stsogs pa rol la drung dur yang nA 'gyur te/ bai ng+ya A rA.AHsa na
254a2(sgra skor): sa ti ta tA rI/ sa tr-I tA mA/ b+hA gi bAtAH/ 'di las gong du ka'o// 'di las zhes pa grangs med pa sarba nA ma rnams k+Shi Ti'i sngon du a ka tsa'o zhes pa mam ma kyim rnaMs su mab du l+r-i pa pa rgya yim tshun nam pa []
254a3(sgra skor): la'im no zags kyim pa 'i kyi me dis cung dung gyur bdang mi 'gyur ba ya ya / las grong du don gang yin pa de wa kA 'gyu ro zhes spyir btang ba'o// a dz+nyA te/ mi shes pa la'o// mi shes pa'i don brjod pa la ka 'gyur te/ ka s+ya a yaM a shAd+ya hi suNi/
254a4(sgra skor): zhes pa'i don la/ A []de bzhin du/ pa ya s+t+waM/ kAr+b+hi te/ snad pa la'o// s+yAd pa'i don li'ang ka gyur te/ A 9/ zhes pa'i don la/ a shA ka/ 'grel par/ de ba d+hAt+tA lta bu rtags yi ge gnyis gnyis
254a5(sgra skor): byas pa gnyis bsgrigs pas rtags makau pha rol la yang na dI'o zhes bshad pas d+hId+hakrA d+h+wed+me bak+ShaH/ a d+hUyas san+tam+b+ha m+ba kAr+d+hak+ShaT+Ta/ mri bde ba sar+b+ba nA ma rnams kyi

259b2(sgra skor): sa pa tra naiSh+mA drA las shin tu 'khrugs pa la'o// sa pa tra dang nISh+ya tra dag las shin tu 'khrugaso ba'i don la kr-inya sbyor ba la TAtsa 'gyur to/ []a so pa tAM sha r-i mr-i ga kA ye pra be a u che ba smai/ shA ya ti/ zhes pa'i don la/
259b3(sgra skor): sa pa tAM ka ro ti mr-i gaM/ de bzhin du/ niSh+ma traM shwa raM ma pa raM nIrbA mA ya ti ka ba tse na/ zhes pa'i dron la/ \u0f7fnIts+tsha d+h+r-i ka ro ti ke ba tse nA/ nIny+tsu lAn+ne skye dang bam pa'i mas rigs kyi sris 'amigs par a ko ShA Ne/ niSh+Ta la las shugs med pa
259b4(sgra skor): sgo dang bcas 'bigs par byed ri dwags/ mda' sgro pha rol tu ma song ba go chas/ la'o// nik+ku la las bar du gnas pa'i sgro mi 'gro bar byed go nas/ shu bas med pa'i don la kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/ niSh+NA sha ya ti dA Di maM/ zhes pa'i don la/ niSh+ku lA
259b5(sgra skor): ka ro ti dA Di maM/ su kha pri yA dA nu lo myaM/ su kha pri ya las rje su mthun pa lnga'o// su kha dang prI ya drag las rje su mthun pa brjod pa lasa? kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/ byas myed phyir byed swe 'ab+h+yAM/ su khA ka ro ti/ Thade tra \u0f7fsa mthun par byed/
259b6(sgra skor): shubs med par byed se 'bya/ \u0f7fpri yA ka ro tI/ dga' ba rbesu mthun par byed/ duHkhAt+sa ti lo mye/ duHkha las rje su mi mthun pa la'o// du kha las rje su mi mthun pa brjod pa las kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/ raHduHkhA ko ro ti/ rtes mi bdun gsug
260a1(sgra skor): shu lAt+ma ke/ shU la las chos pa la'o// shU la las tshogs pa brjod pa la kr-inya sbyor ba la b+h+ra tsa 'gyur te/ shU le na pa tsA ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ shru lA ka ro ti/ sa d+hA da sha pa the/ sa twA las mna' ma yin pa la'o// sa
260a2(sgra skor): t+yatu las mna' ma yin pa gzhan la kr-inya sbyor ba la D+hatsa 'gyur te/ sa t+ye na kre tA pyaM/ zhes pa'i don la/ ba d+hA ka ro ti/ ma d+hA tA srag pa 'jigs mtshad par byas ri bA pa Ne/ nas 'ding gis mtshad par byed/ ma dra las skra 'dreg pa la'o// ma dra las sgra 'drag
260a3(sgra skor): pa brjod pa la kr-ita sbyor ba lA DA tsa 'gyur te/ ma traM pa ri bA pa naM ka ro ti/ bden pam cho ma? zhes pa'i don la/ bden gyis tshang / !ma d+hA ka ro te/ b+hu d+hAts+tsha/ b+ha dra las kyang ngo // b+ha dra las kyang sgra 'dreg pa brjod pa las kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur
260a4(sgra skor): te/ b+ha dA ka ro ti/ rkyen tsI pa ti DA tsa rnams sgra bregs nas bzang por byed de chos byed pa'i ngan/ kyi mtha' can kyang mi zad pa'o// i ti pA pa / Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU d+hAt+tad+d+hi ta pra t+yA yAsa? mAp+tAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las dre phan
260a5(sgra skor): bang por byed/ gyi rkyen rnams rdzogs so// / de rnams kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA kA ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bI su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i
260a6(sgra skor): shing rta zhes bya ba las/ de phan gyi rkyen ngos gzung 'jug yul dang bcas pa rag pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// // da ni 'phros don thor bu cung zad 'chad par bya ste/ ni t+yA bip+pa yoH/ khyab par 'dod pa las rtag tu'o// /
260b1(sgra skor): khyab par 'dod pa la 'jug pa na brjod pa'i tshig gang yin pa de gzugs gnyi su rtag tu 'gyur te/ ba tsa ti pa rga ti b+hu k+ShaM/ ud+h+yai suts+tshe stiSh+Tha ti/ wak+Sha br-ik+ShaM sany+dza ti/ b+hU mo grA mo ra ma NI yaH/ ba reNAn+ma ne/ pa ri spangs pa la'o// spangs pA lA
260b2(sgra skor): zhugs pa'i tshig dang sbyor ba las pa ra'i sgra gnyisu 'gyur te/ ba ri ba ri baM kaM b+h+yoHbr-iSh+To da baHa sa / u paR+YA d+hA d+hA saHsA mI pyaM/ u pa ri a d+hI A d+hAs rnams kyi
260b3(sgra skor): ba lnga'o// u pa ri la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi grong dang dus dag nams ma yin pa rnams las lha mar bag las nye ba la 'jug pa la gzugs gnyis su 'gyur te/ u pa ri u pa r-i grA ma/ oM d+hi a d+hi su/ aM a d+ho&d+d+ho par+b+ba tAM/ bAk+tha de rA
260b4(sgra skor): maM tri ta s+yA sU yA saM ma ti ko pa kut+ka na b+har+b+ha ne 'u/ khro ba dang smad pa dang mi sdug pa rnams la go bar mi bzod pa dang yang dag par 'dod pa dag la bos nas brjod pa sted dang gA'i hrI thong+ga/ lhag par lhag par bad pa/ 'og nas 'og tsu ri bo tshig dang po
260b5(sgra skor): khro ba dang smad pa dang mi sdug pa brjod pa na lan gnyis sogs ma brjod na go bar mi bzod pa ste go mi nus pa dang yang dag par 'dod pa dag la kun tu bos nas brjod pa'i tshig dang po de gzugs gnyisu 'gyur te/ he
260b6(sgra skor): sun+na ra he sun+da ra to br-i thI saun+daR+YaM/ nye mdzem pa kye mdzes pa khyod kyi mdzes pas mi byed/ zhes pa ngan tshig dang / rtse lha gyi sa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod do/ he de pa he de ba tAM ban+d+ho si/ zhes pa yang dag par 'dod pa dang / sums ngan pa sugs par bu/ durbi nI ta durbi nA te/
261a1(sgra skor): d+ha nAM dz+nyA pi/ zhes pa khro ba dang / he d+ha nuSh+ka byanr-i te d+ha nuH/ zhes pa'ang smang ba dang / he tsau ra he tsau ra g+hA ta yi Sh+ya mi tAM/ zhes pa mi sdug pa rnams so// e kaM ba hu b+h+r-i hi bta/ e ka 'bru mang po 'dra'o// khyab par 'dod
261a2(sgra skor): pa la e ka gnyisu da ni shes zo na 'dug/ kye gzhu 'dzin pa kye gzhu 'dzini pa khyod kyi gzhus don med/ kye chom rkun kye chom rkun khyod song zhig/ gyur pa ni 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba dang 'dra ba ste e ka sA ma'i rnam dbye dbye'o// e kaM kaM ak+Sha raM/ A ba d+he tsa/ kun gnod pa la' // kun+da/
261a3(sgra skor): gnod pa ste sema? kyi dgra bor gyur pa'i gnod pa dang sbyor ba la gzugs gnyisu 'gyur te/ gra ta ga ta/ pra kA re gu Na pa tsa na s+ya/ rnam pa la yon tan gyi'o// rnam pa rtogs par byed pa l-i yon yi ke re re ram gcig gcig/ tan gyi gzugs gnyisu
261a4(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ pa Tu pa TuH/ mA la mU le s+thA la/ 'grol par lung drangs pa/ kri yA sa ma b+hi ha re song sang/ tsa/ bya ba yang dag par mngon par 'phrog pa la'o// bya ba'i tshig yang dag par mngon par 'phrog pa/ brjod pa la gzugs gnyisu 'gyur
261a5(sgra skor): te/ lun+thi hi mas pa ma[] I go lu nI he/ yang 'grel par lung drangs p+ta/ karma bya ti hA re sar+b+ba nAm+bo d+he staHlas phan tshun byed pa la sarba nA ma rnams kyi gnyiso// lAs phan tshun byed pa rtogs par byed pA la sarba nA ma rnam
261a6(sgra skor): gtsang bar byed macod par byas kyi gzugs gnyi su 'gyur te/ sa mA sa bats+tsha ba hu laM/ tshig sdud ltar mang po la'o// gzugs gnyisu brjod pa can mang po tshig sdud ltar snga ma'i rnam dbye dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba dang mo rkyen rnams thung ngur
261b1(sgra skor): 'gyur ba sogs kyang bya'o// !a n+yo&n+yaM bi pra na mAn+ti/ sa u n+yo&n+yaM d+ha dzaM yan+ti/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ a tiR+Ya shab+da s+ya ni t+yaM sa mA sa bta/ i ta ra'i sgra ni rtag tu tshig sdung bzhin no// i ta ra'i sgra ni gzugs gnyisu byas bya na rtag
261b2(sgra skor): tu tshig sdud bzhin bya ste/ bram ze par rkun phyag byed/ i ta re ta ra/ phan tshun pa bar bya/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ s+t+ri na pu sa ka yo rut+ta ra pa da s+ya b+hA A ma b+hA bo bAts+yaH/ bud med dang ma ning dag las tshig phyi ma yang na A mo gyi dngos por
261b3(sgra skor): brjod do// skyes pa'i rtags ma yin pa'i bud med bzhan dang gradas/ dang ma ning gi rtags pha rol la tshig snga ma gzugs gnyisu gyur pa de'i phyi ma'i mtha' Am du yang na 'gyur te/ a n+yo&n+taM s+t+rI/ pa rasma rI na buM sa kaM/ a n+yo&n+yA mi me
261b4(sgra skor): brAh+ma Nau b+ho dzaM ya taH/ yang na/ a n+yo&n+yaM/ sogs so// i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU tA d+hi ruk+ta s+yA mAp+tAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA kA ra Na'i mdo las gnyisu brjod pa rnams rdzogs so// byang bang min tshun/ pha ral la la ma ning // / de rnams
261b5(sgra skor): tha 'i di sa ya tsun za bar byed lan dun nam bzhan dang gzhas kyis badz+ra sprod pa'i bstan bcos tshan po pA NI ni byA kA ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin brisu bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shIng rta zhes bya
261b6(sgra skor): ba las/ 'phros don tshig gnyisu brjod pa bshad pa'i sde tshan rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// / bla ma dang dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tsha lo// de ltar rtags drug tshig tu bsgrub ba
262a1(sgra skor): mi zad pa'i sde rags rim du bstan pa/ bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen/ byed pa can gyi le'u/ tshig sdud bzhi/ de phan gyi rkyen/ thar byung 'phros don dang bcas pa de rnams kyi sub kyi bya ba mtha' dag bshang zin nas/ nga ni
262a2(sgra skor): rnam dbye sde mtshan gnyis pa byings las tshig tu bsgrub pa ting gi bya ba rnams bshad par bya ste/ de yang 'grel pa'i thog mar ji skad du/ prA kr-i tiHsA dza ya t+ya drA ya yA d+hA tA dwi rU pA yA/ bya dz+ya te shab+ha rU pA Ni pA ra pa t+ya ya saM ni d+heHde bod skad du/
262a3(sgra skor): dang po rong bzhin rgyal ba de'o// gang gi byings la sogs pa'i gzugs// gsal bar byed pa sgra yi gzugs// pha rol rkyen dang sbyor ba'o zhes pa byung te/ dang por rang bzhin gyi rgyal ba sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyi thugs rje dang
262a4(sgra skor): smon lam gyi mthu las/ gang brjod par bya ba'i gzhi byings la sogs pa rnams la sgra de gsal bar bya ba'i brjod bya'i don ston pa'i gzugasu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ pha rol gyi rkyen dang sbyor ba'i cho ga la sogs pa byung ba'o zhes pa'o// /
262a5(sgra skor): d+hA toHbyings las so// byings tshu rol tu yod pA lngas byings de tshig tu bsgrub pa'i phyir pha rol tu luT lo sogs pa'i rnam dbye rnams 'jug g+ha zhe smai rnam dbyi t+yai sogs kyi 'jug yul bstan pa'o// laT la sogs pa ci zhe na/ laT liH/
262a6(sgra skor): luH/ l+r-im loH/ lang / ling / lung / smon pa'i ling / l+r-ing rnam so// de rnams kyi loT nas lo Ta'i bar lda na 'gro ba'i ming can dang / lang nas l+r-ing gi bar lnga po rnams nga 'gro ba'i ming can no// sa mA ne laT/ da ltar ba la laT la/
262b1(sgra skor): yig bcu po de rnams kyi nang nasA dA ltar ba'i bya ba'i don la byings las laT 'gyuraro// a TA bi tau/ aT dag 'gro ba'o// laTa'i Ta yig dang la'i srog gi a yig dag 'gro ba'i ming can te dbyi'o// tit+ta sti sip+tas+thA mi p+pasmA snA tAM dz+nyA thA sA b+hU d+hA
262b2(sgra skor): miT ba hi ma hing / ti pa ta sa d+hI sib thas tho mipa bsams ta A tAM dz+nya thAs A thAM/ d+h+r-i i Ta ba hi ma hing ngo // la Ta'i Ta dang a phyis pa lta bu la yig bcu po dA rnams kyi rjes 'brel rnams phyis pa saM la yig srog med rnams ni tib
262b3(sgra skor): la sogs pa bco brgyad po 'di rnamasu 'gyu ro// laHpA rasmai pa daM/ la rnams pa rA smai pa da'o// la yig 'gyur ba'i ti pa la sogs pa dang po dgu po rnams pa rasmai pa da staM gzhan gyi ched du bya bo'i tshig ces bya'o// tA dA nA b+h+rat+ma ne pa do/
262b4(sgra skor): tAng A na dag At+ma nai pa da'o// tang zhes pa la srog med kyi 'gyur ba tA nAs+dza nga'i bar dgu po rnams dang A na zhes pa kr-ita sogs kyi rkyenra shA na tsa dang kA na tsa dgra At+ma nr-i pA da ste bdog gri ched du bya ba'i tshig ces bya'o// shweny+dzat+kar+ha
262b5(sgra skor): ri pa rusmai pa daM/ lhag ma byed pA la pa rAsmai pa da'o// bdag gi ched du bya ba'i tshig rnams ma yin pa'i lhag ma ste ti pa la sogs pa dgu po rnams pa ra smai pa da zhes bya ste byed po gzhan gyi chung du bya ba'i tshigo/ a nu tA d+ha dita
262b6(sgra skor): At+ma no pa daM/ a nu dAt+ta dang ngita dag gi At+ma nai pa da'o// byings gang la 'ang a nu dAt+ta ste atsa skad gdangs dma' bar 'gro ba rnams dang ngita ste nga 'gro ba rnams At+ma no pa nga ste bdag gi ched du bya ba'i tshig gi rnam dbye rnam
263a1(sgra skor): su 'jug ste bdag don gyi dbyings zhes bya ba'o// sA ri ti hits+tsha u b+he/ sA ri ta dang nyi kyi gnyis kA'o// byings gad+hA la swa ri ta ste sgra skad gsung 'bring po rnams 'gro ba dang ny+tsi ta ste/ nya yi glu 'gro bu rnams ni byAdag dron dang /
263a2(sgra skor): gzhan don gnyis ka la 'jug pas gnyis ka'i byings zhes so// she ShaM pa ra smai pa daM/ lhag ma par smai pa da'o// gong du boshad pa'i a nu dAt+ta dang / nga 'gro ba dang / swa ri ta dang / nya 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa ste de rnams bor ba'i lhag
263a3(sgra skor): ma rnams ni gzhan don gyi byings zhes bya'o// ti ris+t+rai NaM tI Ni pra tha ma ma d+h+ya mot+ta mAHting gi gsum gsum rnams dang po dbus ma phyi ma rnam so// ting zhes pa so sor bsdu ba s+thi ti nas dri'i byar yin la/ de rnams bco brgyad po las
263a4(sgra skor): At+ma ne pa da dgu dang / pra rAsmai pa da dr-igu lus gsum gsum du gnas pa la snga ma gsum skyes bu dang po dang dbus ma gsum skyes bu dbus ma dang phyi ma gsum skyes bu phyi ma'o// tA n+ye kra pra tsa na dri ba tsa na ba hu ba tsa nA n+ye
263a5(sgra skor): kA shAHde rnams la gcig tshig gnyis tshig mang tshig rnams so// tipa la sog sde pa gsum gsum du bcad pa de rnams re ri la'ang gitsig tshig gnyis tshig mang tshig rnam su yod do// shi She pra tha ma/ lha gu ma la dang baM'o//
263a6(sgra skor): tipa la sogs pa rnams kyi skyes bu dang po dbus ma phyi ma gsum las nye ba'i tshig ste dang por bzhag pa'i tshig de yu smad dang asma gnyis ma yin pa ste/ spangs pa'i lhag ma tshig gang dang sbyor yang skyes bu dang po
263b1(sgra skor): gsum po 'jug go zhes pa spyir btang ba'o// yuSh+ma d+hu ba de sa mA d+hi ka ra Ne s+thA ni n+ya pi ma d+h+ya maHyuSh+mad nye ba'i tshig mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa gnas pa las kyang dbus ma'o// yuSh+mad nye ba'i tshig tu gnas pa las mnyam pa'i lhag
263b2(sgra skor): par byed pa ste dwe dang sbyor ba'i byings de la skyes bu dbus mA gsum po 'jug go/ ausmA d+yut+ta ma/ asmad la phyi ma'o// nye ba'i tshig a s+sada? yin nA de dang sbyor ba'i byings de la skyes bu phyi ma rnams 'jug go// de ltar 'jug yul
263b3(sgra skor): bshad nas daM ni dwe rnams kyi cho ga rnams br-ishad par bya ste/ b+hU yod pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la da ltar ba lo laTA'o zhes pas laT/ ting shat+tirba d+hA tu kaM/ ting gau sha 'gro po byings thams cad pa'o// tI sogs kyi bar rkyen shwa
263b4(sgra skor): 'gro ba 'jug pa de la byings thams cad pa'i rnam dbye zhes brda chad byed do// kar+t+ta ri sha po/ byed pa po laM shra pa'o// byings thams cad pa zhes brda chang byas pa'i rnam dbye rnams pha rol la byings las byed pa po la shab 'gyur te/
263b5(sgra skor): sha pa byin/ laTa'i/ aT 'gro ba yin pas phyis lA tIpa tu bsgyur/ mtho'i ha la 'o zhes pas pa phyis/ sha yig drang po yig dag 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/ b+hU a ti/ swarba d+hA tu kAr+d+ha d+hA tu ka yoHbyings thams cad pa dang
263b6(sgra skor): byings phyed bdag las so// byings thams cad pa'i ming can gyi rkyen rnams dang / 'og nas 'byung ba'i byings phyed pa'i ming can rnams pha rol la rnam dbye de rnams ster yul gyi byings de'i mtha' ika so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge
264a1(sgra skor): yod na yon tan du 'gyur te/ b+ha ba ti/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig go// gnyis tshig la/ dag b+ha da ta/ mang tshig la la d+hi ru bsgyur/ b+hU/ a d+hI/ dz+nyo&n+taHdz+ha'i an+ta'o// ti sogs kyi rnam dbye'i dang po'i d+he
264a2(sgra skor): yig srog med ni an+ta zhes par 'gyur te/ b+ha gan+ti/ rnams yod/ skyes bu dbus ma rnams la'ang / gong ltar bsku bA r+d+ha ya sa tas mamaman tan 'jugs sa pas/ b+ha ba si dashi yang b+ha ba tha \u0f7f rnams yod/ b+ha ba thA/ skyes bu phyi ma rnams kyang / b+hU/
264a3(sgra skor): d+hU la/ l-i pa dzaM d+ha lam i pru ga~M r+Na An+ta drangs yon tan o \u0f7f ma mam sogs a'i yon tan ras/ gnyis dag gi snga ma'i gtsun du so/ b+ha bar 'gyur pa'i ba ra snga ma rnams d+hA ya/ 5/ shas ston la si sa dang / b+ha ba/ mi pa/ a to sa pa rnam su 'gyur po dIr+g+ho ya nyi/ ya nya la ata kyi ring
264a4(sgra skor): bo'o// rkyen dang rnam dbye byings thams cad pa'i ming can yanya so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la mtha'i e yig ni ring por 'gyur te/ b+ha b+h+ra mi'o/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la'ang de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/
264a5(sgra skor): dag yod b+hA bA baHb+ha bA ma rnams yod/ de rnams tshig grogs dang sbyar ba ni/ Ta sa b+ha ba ti/ o tau b+ha pa taHt+ye b+ha ban+ti/ skyes b+hU la/ larba gapa la mi 'a gro bo ldan migs kyis rgya la mdo 'dis ring po/ bu dang po dang / satwaM b+ha ba si/ yu bAM b+ha ba thaH
264a6(sgra skor): rnasasan la pas dang mas kyi la rgya ldan tshas pa sa mga.U yaM b+hu bya thA/ a rnamapa yod/ de yang/ na nga/ de rnams yong / skyes pra dI busau ma drang / sra a haM b+ha bA myi/ rka / oM A bAM b+hu b+hu ba/ an dan yang/ dz+dza ai s+yA b+h+ya yAM b+hA bA ma dag nga
264b1(sgra skor): de rnams skyes bu phyi ma rnams te/ gzhan gyi tshod kyi tshig rnams so// 'grel bur lung drangs pa/ b+hU prA b+hA b+hUd+d+hA nA pa di/ b+hU thob pa la At+ma ne pa da'o// byings d+hu thob pa la'ang 'jug ste de'i tshe rnam dbye At+ma ne ba dA rnams 'jug ste
264b2(sgra skor): b+hU la/ laT/ la tar 'gyur/ shapa/ b+ha bA tA/ TitaHAt+ma ne pa dA nA Te re/ Ta 'gro ba'i At+ma ne pa da rnams kyi Ti'i e'o// l-iT la sogs pa Ta 'gro ba At+ma ne pi da rnams kyi mtha'i To nI e yig tu 'gyur tAM/ b+ha ba te/ gnyis tshig la/
264b3(sgra skor): b+hI la/ laT sha ba la A tAM du 'gyur/ Ti i b+he ba A taM/ sArba d+hA tu ka me pita/ byings thams cad pa pa 'gro ba ma yin pa'o// byings thams cad pa'i mong can rnams kyi nad nas pa yig 'gro ba rnams ma yin / pa ste bor ba'i rnam
264b4(sgra skor): dbye gzhan rnams lnga dgos pa'i dbang gIng 'gro ba'i ming can+da zhes brda chang byeng ngo // A to ngi tirang 'gro ba'i Ata kyi'o// tshu rol b+ha ba lta bu a yig mtha' can gyi pha rol gyi rnam dbye 'gro ba'i ming can rnams kyi dang po'i
264b5(sgra skor): yi ge de A yig yin na a yig de i ya zhes par 'gyur ro// dag b+hA te tau/ mang tshig la yang a i yar mi 'gyur gzhan ma gong bzhin bsgrubs pas/ b+ha ban+te/ ma / de rnams At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po rnamaso//
264b6(sgra skor): la/ 4Ta/ sha pa rjes 'brel phyis nas la A tI du 'gyur/ Ta 'gro ba'i zhes pas Ti e nga 'gro ba Ata kyi 'os A i la/ ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os ya phyis yon tan/ D+hA la/ laT shapa la d+har 'gyur/ dz+ha las a phyung dz+ha an+tar/ ts+tsho 'gro ba zhes pas Ti e ata kyai yon tan nos gnyis dag gi snga ma'i gzugs/ skyes bu dbus ma
265a1(sgra skor): rnams la/ b+hU la/ laT sha ba la thAs su 'gyur/ b+ha bA thAs/ thA sAHsweHthAs kyi se'o// Ta 'gro ba'i la yig 'gyur ba'i thAs ni se zhes par 'gyur te/ b+ha ba se/ 9/ gnyis tshig la/ b+ha be the/ 28/ mang tshig
265a2(sgra skor): la/ Ta/ b+ha ba d+hA/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ b+ha ba~M/ ho pa gnyis tshig la/ b+ha bI bo he/ d+hA sa sa ma pan gyimam sa sa kyim sa d+hA sa napas su rgyam tsho / d+hA sa sangs bya ba'i ba sa pa tsa'i 'tsho sa tha mi la sa

270b2(sgra skor): ts+tshiHsi tsaM/ ts+li'i so tsa'o// lung pha rol gyi rkyenats+tshi nI si tsi zhes par 'gyu ro// gA tistA b+hU pa b+hU b+h+yaHsi tsi pa rasmai pa de Sh+Ta/ gA ti gnas pa g+h+rA pA b+hU nA masna las da rAsmai pra dA rnams la si tsI'o// grA tI gnas pa ste bying sA gaM sku la l-I/

270b4(sgra skor): rdzu dang trunya dag gi pha rol tu byung ba'i lung gi pa ra smai ba da'i ti sogs dgu po la byings thams cad pa zhes mong 'dogs byed de rnam dbye de rnams pha rol la b+hU dang lUnya dag la yon tan dang 'phel ba sogs mi byedado//

275b1(sgra skor): su thung du bsgyur/ lha ba ti'i sa 'os ar song / a thAs pa car sa b+ha lar bsgyur/ d+hA'i zug pas sug A ga ma byin ka gnas don u badzad don la e la rangs/ liTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ ba b+hU bA t+ye/ b+hU pa liT rjes badres gyis das la a ta s+thA
275b2(sgra skor): Ta' gro ba sogs mi mtha' er 'gyur/ liT la byis a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byis gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/ b+ha ba ta'i a 'os u ar bsgyur a b+h+yA sa la tsar 'os b+ha wa bsgyur/ b+hU'i luka ma suka A ga ma byin/ ka gnas don u brjod don la tsA la na ya/ liTa'i At+ma ne ba da'i skyes bu dang
275b3(sgra skor): po'i mang tshig la/ pa b+hU bi re/ b+hU la liT rjes 'brel phyis nas la dz+har bsgyur/ liT 'i tar+d+ha dag gi e nang min tshwam san+ta i re tsar bsgyur/ maba'i nyal las pa phyis liT la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa'i byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os u thung ngur bsgyur/ b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u ar bsgyur/ a s+ya sa ma tshar pos
275b4(sgra skor): ad+hA'i bug thos dug A gas ga gnas don du brjod dan yin pas khyis la sel / liTa'i Ut+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+hU bi She/ b+hU la liT rjes 'brel phyis nas la ba su bsgyur/ nas kyis sos bram par bgyur/ li sa bri a zlus med pa'i chom byi sa gnyis 'ar

285b1(sgra skor): sbyar ba dang rkyen sogs kyis sa nga/ lung gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ a tse d+hi/ citas sung yang sring sogs kyis bye sa la inaT gnas don/ la sib du bsgyur/ ita kyi'ang ma yi byis/ lung la rnaM sa byid ma car bsgyur/ e da gyis khyim byen na nga
285b2(sgra skor): i TA sanas don/ saka mtha' u pa d+hA thung du dag gi 'os byi mo la yon tan a ma tsa'i a br-i/ la sa iT A ga saT gnas don/ iT las IT la 'os mi na 'jig aka 'dra ba la ring sa pa bul sogs kyis sa rba u phyi mar rnam bcang/ lung gi pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang
285b3(sgra skor): mang tshig la/ a tse ti Sh+TAM/ a tse tiSh+Ta/ tsita la/ lung lung yang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la iTaT gnas don/ la pas dang bar bsgyur/ de yang tas thas pa mi ba sogs kyis taM dang tar bsgyur/ lung la tswi 'os rbi byin ts+li sitsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/ i dang tsa phyis/ byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don/ suka ba yu pa d+hA bung
285b4(sgra skor): cag gi sos/ byis pa yon tan kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa/ pa Sha Tu la Sha Tu log ta gnyis Ta Sha drangs/ lung gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tse ti rba/ titas lung lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byis la iT Ta gnas don/ la mi du bsgyur/ nyas thas pa mis sogs kyis mi pa am du
285b5(sgra skor): bsgyur/ lung pa Ti 'os ts+li byin/ ts+li'i si tsa 'os sa tser bsgyur/ tsa dang i phyis/ byings phyed pa'i bam la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don/ bu ga mtha' u pa d+hA thung ngu sogs kyis byings la yon tan kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen sogs kyis sa Sha/ a tse tiSh+wa/ u tse/ hita la/ lung lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis iT Ta gnas don/
285b6(sgra skor): bis dang mas su bsgyur/ ngita la rtag tu 'os sa gnyis phyis/ lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/ ts+yai si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/ tsa dang i phyis/ bal dang po'i iT 'os iT Ta gnas don/ buka mtha' dang u pa d+hA thung ngu dag gi 'os byings la yon tan kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ba dang ma la drangs/ tsi ta la

307a4(sgra skor): nam ti sogs dang / ling la/ na mai ta sogs so// loT+ra la/ na ma tu sogs so// lang la a na ma ta sogaso// lung la/ a naM sI nya sogs dang / l-iT la/ ne nA ma/ ne ma tuHne muHsogs so// luT la/ nan+ta sogs so// smon

307b1(sgra skor): sogs so// luT la ha yi tA sogs so// smon pa'i ling la ha Ata sogs so// l+r-iT la/ ha yi Sh+ya ti sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a ha yi Sh+yAta? sogs so/ !da la rnam par rgyu ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang laT sogs par smai bA da
307b2(sgra skor): rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang lung la 'phel ba byed pa'i khyed par tsam ma gtogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ lAT la/ dA la ti sogaso// ling la/ da le ta sogaso// loT la/ dra la tu sogs so// langa? la/ a da la ta so Da

308a2(sgra skor): byings tr-I rgyal bar byed pa la'o dang nyi pha la rnam par rgyu ba/ b+ha dza bsten pA/ tra pU ShA dro tsha ba rnams kyi A b+h+yA sa dbyi zhing e ru yang 'gyur te/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ phe la tuHphe luHskyes bu dbus ma g+hAsa?

308b1(sgra skor): At+pa rata sogs so// lung la/ ar+d+hA tAM sog so// liT la/ t+yAt+tA ra/ tA tru ra tuHtAt+sa ruHsogs so// lun+su la/ tA ri tA sogaso// smon pa'i l+r-ing l+yA/ rbAn+matA stsog so// l+r-ing la/ d+hu rISh+ya tI sogs so// l+r-ing l+ya/ at+sa ri Sh+yatA sogs so//
308b2(sgra skor): 'grel pararA lung drangs pa/ a ma gyi / cag / swap+tA tuSh+TaM Sh+kan+d+haM bAM sa twa ni ShI d+h+r-iHsupa kyi byings Sh+TAM Shany+dze wI ba rnams kyi sa nyid ma yin no// suMpaM kyi byings rnams dang / byings Sh+TaM s+tha dang / kun tu chog s+phu dag lnga'o dang / ShaSh+mA/

308b5(sgra skor): s+ya tha krU rAstA k+Sha ro byA/ saM'i thA yig dang tha yig yang na'o// Sh+Ti bu gnyis brjod pa'i a b+h+yA sa'i ming can shwa ra ston ma'i khany+tsa lhag pa'o// Sha phyis pa'i thA yig ni bi yigA nyid dam yang na thA nyid du 'gyur te/ liTa'i skyes

309a1(sgra skor): ShI bi tA sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ b+hA byAt+tha sogs so// l+r-iT lA/ Sh+Ti bi Sh+ya ti sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ aSh+NI bi Sh+yA ta sogs so// dzo rgyal ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la luT la sogs pa rasmai pa

311b6(sgra skor): can ma yin pa pha rol la a ma A go ma yang na 'jug ste/ tsI si tsar bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi oM me ma yin pa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a kAts+tshi tra/ na mi ma ga zum

312a5(sgra skor): b+h+yen+te/ mdo 'dis ts+tshik+Sha ru b+h+r-i stAr/ ka phyis pas/ skyes bu drung po gsum la/ a mr-i kAti/ a kr-i k+Sha tAM/ a kr-i k+Shan/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a kr-i k+ShaHa kr-ik+Sha taM/ oM kr-I k+Shata/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum+ba la/
312a6(sgra skor): kr-i k+Sha/ a kr-i k+Sha piM/ e kr-i kA ma/ me She la la Ta sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum laM/ tsa kaR+Sha/ tsaM kr-i Sha tu/ tsi l+r-i la~M/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa kirI ba/ tsa kar+b+ha/ tsa kr-i Shi buM tsau kr-i 'o// skyes bu phyi ma gsum
312b1(sgra skor): la/ tsakaR+ShA/ tsa kran+d+hi ba/ tsa kaR+Shi ma/ kr-i Sha la luT sbyar/ a nu dAt+ta'i 'ang r-ita u pa d+hA'i yang na'o zhes pas+ya am A ga ma yang na bar byas pas/ a ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ kraSh+T+wA/ kraSh+TA rau/ kraSh+Ta raHsogs so//
312b2(sgra skor): A.am mA byin+d+ha pa'i phyogs la/ byAka mtha' u pA d+h+r-i thung ngu sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ kaR+ShA/ kAn+dA rau/ kaR+Sha raHsogs so// smyon pa'i ling la/ kr-i Sh+yata sogaso// l+r-iT la/ a ma A ga maM yang naM bar+yA byas pas/ a

317b6(sgra skor): d+hiHla/ dzu d+hi si la d+hi/ lung sa gas kyi byings la aT/ ts+tsha sog sa rgyam po jig/ mang 'dis NAM dus khu Tu sogs kyis du phyi/ us la tshig mapa' min pa las sos/ gnyis dag gi gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ mtha' sogs kyi sa ka dang iT sbyar bas/ a d+hA sIta/ a d+hA siSh+TAM/ a d+h+waM si Shu

328b6(sgra skor): ang lo r-itra/ a doR+Ya tAM/ a daR+shan/ sogs so// ts+li si tsar bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ sr-i dzi dro shor+N+Na l+ya ma ka ti/ sr-i dzi dr-i sha dag l-i dz+ha la ka 'gro ba ma yin pa la a ma'o// byings sr-i dza
329a1(sgra skor): rnams par bcas pa la'o dang / dr-i shir gnyis la rkyen dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can ka 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa rnams pha rol la amra A ba mya 'jug ste/ ma yig ni ma
329a2(sgra skor): 'gro ba atsa'i mtha' las pha rol zhes pa'i dron no// thak+Sh+yar+N+NastA sogs kyis// las la rta dag gi kA 'os/ Shaka rdzun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha kaM Sha 'dus pa r+ra/ a drak+ShI ta/ a draSh+TaM/ a trak+ShuHsogs/ l-iTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/
329a3(sgra skor): da daR+sha/ da dr-i/ da dr-i sha tuHdrA dr-i shuH/ bi b+hU ShA sr-i dzi hr-inoHsr-i dzi dr-i sha dag las 'dram ka'o// sr-i dza rnam par bcas pa dang dr-i shi r+ra lba ba dag lus pha rol g+h+r-i dz+hal las dz+hal la 'am si tsa phyis/ dras+dzas+tha s+dza so gso byas kaSha rdul 'dzu lo kama?
329a4(sgra skor): loT+ra bsgyur de/ thal lA au ta ster ba dang mi stir bya gdam nga can du bya ste/ da daR+shi tha/ da draSh+mA/ skyes bA dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ da dr-i sha thuHnga dr-i sha/ skyes bu phyi ma ma bsum+b+ha la/ da daR+sha/ dadrin gang
329a5(sgra skor): dr-i shI ma/ lu TA lA/ sr-i dzaM dr-i sha dag lA dz+ha la ka 'gro ba ma yin pa la/ a ma? l+r-i dze pri ka dag la dz+ha la ga sogs kyis aH/ r+pa k+Sha N+Da dzA sanas kyis ka Sha/ Sha Tu la du sa paT/ 'os/ a ma A ga ma byin/ draSh+mA/ drat+tA rau/ draSh+Ta raHsogs
329a6(sgra skor): so// smon po'i ling la/ dr-i sh+tsa ta/ dr-i shIstAM/ pr-i shwA suHsogs so// l+r-iT la/ a ma A ga ma dang / pra shwa b+h+rasma sogs kyis sha Sha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka/ kun nas ngasbyor rba N+Ti mas kyim ga ba rtul rgyas//
329b1(sgra skor): ba sogs kyis sa Sha sogs byas pas/ drak+Sh+ya tI/ drak+Sh+ya taHdraSh+yAn+ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing lA/ a drak+Sh+ya tra/ a drASh+Ta tAM/ a drak+Sh+ya na/ sogs so// !nga nA mche ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs pa rasma pa da
329b2(sgra skor): rnams sbyor/ dan+ma sany+tsau swany+dza sogs kyis sha paM la na phyis pas/ da sha ti/ sogs so// ling la/ da she ta so/ sogs so// loT la/ da sha tu/ sogs so// lang la/ a ba shata/ sogs so// lung la
329b3(sgra skor): brabrAsh+tsA b+hUs+dza sogs kyis sha Shar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ a daM k+Shi ta/ a daM Sh+TAM/ a daM k+ShuHsogs so// l-IT+ra'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da nganra/ da dAn+ma tu/ da da nUHskyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pa da n+tiH
329b4(sgra skor): dngad de b+h+r-i/ de dAna? thuHda dan+yA/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ rnal lam dz+ha li la mam san phyi sa// dmyal la dz+ha las taT/ pa da nra/ da da nr-i ba/ da daM nA ma/ luT la/ prash+ma b+hUstA sogs kyis sha Sha dang / Sho Tu la ShA Tu 'os ta Ta byas pa/
329b5(sgra skor): daM Sh+Ta/ daM b+hU rau/ di Sh+Ta raHsogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ da sh+yA ta/ da sh+tsastaM/ ba sh+na suHsogs so// l+r-iT la/ bra sh+tsa b+hUs+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/ sau laSha
329b6(sgra skor): D+ha deg gi ke/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha byas pas/ daM k+Sh+ya ti/ daM k+Sh+ya taHdaM k+Sh+yan+ti/ sogaso so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la'ang / a daM k+Sh+yata/ a daM k+Sh+ya tAM/ a daM k+Sh+yan/ sogs so// gup+ti dz+had+d+haHsan/
330a1(sgra skor): gu pa ti dza ki ta rnams las sana'o// byings gu pU sbed pa dang smad pa dag la'o dang / tI dza rno ba la ste bzod pa la yang ngo dang / kita nges par gnas pa la ste nang sel bar byed pa
330a2(sgra skor): la yang ngo zhes pa'i byings gsum la so na pha rol tu 'gyur te/ san gyi na yig no sran yang dag la'o// zhes byings gnyis brjod pa'i don no// san+ya ngoHsan yang dag la'o// san dang yang dag pha rol lo/ byings
330a3(sgra skor): a b+h+yA sa med pa'i gnyis brjod par bya'o// pUrbat+sa naHsen gyi snga ma dang 'dra'o// byings la san byin pa'i gyi mtha' yang snga ma dang 'dra ba ste byings nyid du gnas pas byings byings su bsgrub pa'i sen zhes bya'o//
330a4(sgra skor): 'grel par lung drangs pa/ gu pA deHkra mA n+nin+da k+Sha ma ru g+hA ye ShuSh+Ta san+ni Sh+ya te/ su pa srogs las rim pa bzhin smad pa bzod pa nang sel ba rnams la san 'dod do// gong du bshad pa'i gu pa sogs la sana? 'jug
330a5(sgra skor): pa de yang rim pa bzhin te/ byings gu pA smad pa la 'jug pa dang / ti dza brjod pa dang / ki ta nad sel ba la 'jug pa rnams la san 'gyur bar 'dod la/ sbed pa sogs don gzhan la ni 'jug pa ma yin te/ ki ta la/
330a6(sgra skor): san/ san yang dag la 'os// byings gnyis brjod/ hal dang po/ lhag po 'os/ ta gong ma phyis/ ku ta dag gi tsu 'os ka gong ma tsa/ tsi kA ti/ zhes pa la laT sogs pa ra smai pa rnams sbyar/ byed pa po la sha pa/
330b1(sgra skor): rjes 'phel phyis nas/ ata kyi yon tana? la 'os/ gnyis ngag gi gcig pha rol gyis gzugs su byas pas/ laT+Ta la/ tsi kIt+sa ti/ dwi kit+sa taH/ tsi kit+san+ti/ sogs so// ling la/ tsi kit+se ta/ tsi kit+se tAM/ tsI ki d+h+we yu
330b2(sgra skor): loT lA/ tsau kId+b+ha t+yA/ tsi kIt+s+ya taH/ tsI kid+b+ha tAM/ tsaM kid+da nra/ sogs so// la lA a tsi kit+sAt+ta/ oM tsi kISh+Tha tAM/ aHnas pa byed/ kidz+dza naM/ sogs so// byings byed pa rnams la/ bal dang br-i'i iT pa
330b3(sgra skor): ata kyi dbyi 'os byings mtha' a phyis pas/ lung la/ a tsi kit+sa ti/ a tsi kit+siSh+TAM/ a tsi kit+si 'u/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ kAsa? dang rkyen lasa? bod pa ma yin po la liT la Am 'os/ byi tas la A ma
330b4(sgra skor): sbyar A mo las so zhes pas/ l-iT 'ang 'jig/ kr-inya/ b+hU as sogs l-iT dang bcas pa rje su sbyar bswa/ tsi kit+sa mA sa/ tsi kod+l-i tsaM kA ra/ tsi kr-idz+dzi ba b+hu ba srogs so// luT la/ balpa[:]dang po'i iT dang /
330b5(sgra skor): oT kyi dbyi 'os/ a phyis/ tsi kid+bi tA/ tsi kri tA tA rau/ tsi kIt+si tA ra/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ aT kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ tsI kit+sata/ tsi kr-ir+N+Na swaM/ tsi kit+s+ya s+yAHsogs so// l-I Ta la/ wal dang po'i
330b6(sgra skor): iT dang / ata kyi dbye 'oso+o/ tsi kit+sASh+ya ti/ tsi ki tr-iSh+yetaHtsi kitI Sh+yan+ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ o tsi kit+saSh+yato/ a tsi ki Sh+ya tAM/ a tsi kau Sh+ye tAM/ oM tshaM ki tI Sh+yan/ sogs so// ki taHsaM dza
331a1(sgra skor): h+yeH/ kita las the tsam la'ang ngo // kiti las the tshom la 'jug pa lA yang sman 'gyur te/ cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra bas/ rba tsa kiM r+pa trI/ sogs so// r-i te rI yang /
331a2(sgra skor): rI ti las I yang ngo // r-ita 'gro ba la ste yang dag par dga' ba la 'ang ngo zhes pa ngo bo'i rkyen i sbyar du sa r-i ti las yang dag par dga' ba'i don la 'jug pa na pha rol tu rkyen I sa byed yang 'gyur te/ I
331a3(sgra skor): yang sbyar ba'i mtha' yang byings nyid do// I yAng ge nga yig ni At+ma ne pa nga rnams 'jug pa'i don no// r-ita la i yang / laT shA pa sogs sbyar bas/ r-itI ya te sogs te/ dper brjod rgyas pa 'og tu
331a4(sgra skor): 'chang ngo // de rnams kyi b+hU la sogs pa byed pa po'i don lA shu pa 'jug pa rnams kyi byings pa rasmai ba nga 'jug pa rnams la/ laT sogs la yi go bcu'i 'gyur ba'i pa rasmai pa rnams sbyor ba'i cho ga spyir btang
331a5(sgra skor): dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams bshad zin to// bsod nams stobs rgyas kyis mtshon ma gyur 'gro ba yis/ tshe rabs du mar bsogs pa'i sdig slob ma lus kun/
331a6(sgra skor): yaMs dug lnga'i me ny+tsa chu yis bcil ba bzhin ring min byang chub snying po'i go 'phang myur thob shoka/ ces mi dbang po lha bas sgo gsum tshig dril gyis smon lame btab pa'o// /
